name: CeraVe Foaming Cleanser with Niacinamide for Normal to Oily Skin 236ml
description: Perfect for sensitive, normal to oily, or blemish-prone skin, CeraVe’s gentle Foaming Cleanser washes away the day and deeply cleanses skin — without leaving it feeling dry or dehydrated. In fact, this hardworking cleanser will actually help to promote a healthier and more hydrated complexion by repairing and supporting your skin’s moisture barrier. This gel-like texture turns to a soft foam when powered up with water, leaving your skin feeling refreshed and purified. As with all CeraVe superheroes, at the core of this cleanser is a cocktail of three essential ceramides (lipids that are essentially the ‘glue’ of your skin barrier). Flooding your skin with these ceramides helps to keep that skin barrier in tip-top health, helping to maintain moisture levels even while cleansing your skin. CeraVe’s unique ‘MVE Technology’ means you get even more from these ceramides; it ensures they’re gradually released over time to ensure long-lasting nourishment and hydration. Worried about sensitivity? This does-it-all formula is fragrance-free and hypoallergenic too.

description: Stay safe in the sun without streaking thanks to this invisible finish SPF. Housed in a non-greasy and fragrance-free formula, this is the skin-friendly SPF we want on our complexion through every season. description: Clinically shown to deliver instant and long-lasting hydration for up to 24 hours, NuFACE's Hydrating Aqua Gel can be used with your microcurrent device of choice (simply smooth a mask-like layer over your skin) or on its own to visibly smooth and plump your skin. Created with the powerful combination of hyaluronic acid and glacial water, this hydrating gel is uniquely designed with NuFACE IonPlex™, so the youth-prolonging microcurrents are effectively delivered to the skin’s surface and down to the muscle. There’s no need to remove this hydrating gel – simple massage it in after your treatment, or any time your skin needs a moisture boost.

name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Clarifying Lotion 200ml
description: Reactive skins rejoice! For La Roche-Posay have specifically formulated this treatment toner to help regulate oil without disrupting your skins natural balance. Sweep this astringent, but non-stripping, toner over cleansed skin to help regulate sebum production (oily skin, thank us later) and reduce the appearance of dilated, enlarged pores. Lacing your routine with the gentle micro-exfoliant, LHA and moisture-locking glycerin the Effaclar Clarifying Toner will keep excess oil at bay while perfectly prepping your skin ahead of your daily regime. Clearer, brighter skin is finally on the horizon thanks to La Roche-Posay's infamous Effaclar line.
how_to_use: Apply toner gently with a damp cotton wool pad to the face and neck, morning and evening.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Alcohol Denat,. Glycerin, Sodium Citrate, Propylene Glycol, Peg-60, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Disodium Edta, Capryloyl, Salicylic Acid, Citric Acid, Parfum/Fragrance.

name: The Ordinary Resveratrol Serum 3% + Ferulic Acid 3% 30ml
description: Featuring two of the most renowned, powerful antioxidants used in skin care, The Ordinary’s Resveratrol 3% + Ferulic Acid 3% is a highly concentrated method for defending against free radicals and defying signs of ageing. Produced by some plants to protect them against environmental stressors, the resveratrol in this formulation is 100% derived from Japanese knotweed, while ferulic acid comes from the cell walls of plants (such as oats and the seeds of apples) where it plays a key role in protection and self-preservation. Traditional formulations tend to incorporate resveratrol at 1% and ferulic acid at 0.5%, whereas this unique fluid features an exceptionally high (3%) concentration (and no water, silicones, oils or alcohol) to maximise the age-defying effects. The key benefit of these two potent ingredients is their ability to neutralise free radicals, therefore preventing the production of collagen and elastin from being inhibited (which will keep skin plumper and more youthful). Resveratrol 3% + Ferulic Acid 3% can be applied alone or, to enhance the benefits further, combined with The Ordinary’s {Vitamin C Suspension 23% + HA Spheres 2%} or {Vitamin C Suspension 30% in Silicone} to create an outstanding antioxidant network.
how_to_use: Apply alone or after water-based serums, before oils or heavier creams. Alternatively, mix with other treatments to enhance their antioxidant capacity significantly. This product can be mixed with The Ordinary {Vitamin C Suspension 23% + HA Spheres 2%} or {Vitamin C Suspension 30% in Silicone} at each application to form an outstanding antioxidant network of Vitamin C, Ferulic Acid and Resveratrol. Do not refrigerate.
ingredient: Propanediol, Resveratrol, Ferulic Acid

name: Charlotte Tilbury Charlotte's Magic Eye Rescue
description: Charlotte's Magic Eye Rescue dramatically enhances elasticity and firmness with a cocktail of cell-energising winter daphne stem cell extract, rice and soy peptides, saccharide isomerate and free radical-fighting vitamins A, C and E – all alongside a proprietary 'botanical eye contour complex' that works to increase 'stretch', resilience and density for younger-looking eyes. If you've been wondering how busy supermodels can step off multiple planes and catwalks without looking like sleep-deprived shells of human beings, you're in the right place. Reparative and protective, this replenishing cream has an instant skin-smoothing and 'lifting' effect – ideal for disguising signs of a too-late night – while the inclusion of moisturising coconut oil and shea butter helps to lock in precious moisture to restore skin's 'bounce' and softness.
how_to_use: Step 1: Apply the Charlotte's Magic Eye Rescue to your ring fingers and gently dot under the eyes on the top of the cheekbones. Step 2: Gently tap above the eyes across the brow bones. Repeat the tapping in a circular movement around the eyes to help reduce puffiness. Step 3: Continue to tap gently under the eyes and across the tops of the cheekbones for a few seconds to allow the cream to work its magic for a wide-eyed, youthful effect.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butylene Glycol, Polysorbate 60, Olus Oil (Vegetable Oil/ Huile Végétale), Peg-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Peg-8, Ethylhexyl Stearate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Sorbitan Stearate, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Olive Oil Peg-7 Esters, Phenoxyethanol, Saccharide Isomerate, C12-16 Alcohols, Cera Alba (Beeswax/Cire D'abeille), Glyceryl Stearate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Squalane, Ethylhexylglycerin, Chlorphenesin, , Hydrogenated Lecithin, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Palmitic Acid, Xanthan Gum, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Disodium Edta, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Sorbitan Isostearate, Sodium Hydroxide, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Protein, Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin, Superoxide Dismutase, Citric Acid, Tocopherol, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Pca, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Retinol, Daphne Odora Callus Extract, Sodium Dextran Sulfate, Nicotiana Sylvestris Leaf Cell Culture, Aluminum Hydroxide, Plumeria Rubra Flower Extract, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ascorbic Acid, Lecithin, Potassium Sorbate, Retinyl Palmitate, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492).

name: Caudalie Beauty Elixir 100ml
description: A healthy, skin-feeding facial spray for a glowing complexion, Caudalie’s Beauty Elixir blurs the lines between a toner and a priming mist. A favourite amongst make up artists working the fashion circuit, it can be used under of over your make up to enhance its longevity and enliven dull complexions. It uses extracts of grape, rosemary, bitter orange, rose, myrrh and peppermint to both minimise the visibility of your pores and pep up the skin. Suitable for all skin types (especially those urbanites amongst us prone to a slightly grey complexion) this is perfect for toning, prepping skin for make up or for waking up your complexion whenever it's in need of perking up.
how_to_use: Use to set make up, as a toner, to tighten pores, for an instant glow, eliminate bacteria, refresh and re-energise skin.

(010/018) *Origine Végétale - Plant Origin.

name: Lanolips Tinted SPF30 Balm - Rhubarb 12.5g
description: Part lip balm, part lip gloss, Lanolips Tinted Balm SPF30 is a 3-in-1, multi-tasking treatment available in four hues to enhance your natural lip colour while also deeply hydrating and nourishing parched skin. Pick from ‘Rose’, a sheer pink tint that gives lips a healthy glow; ‘Rhubarb’, a sheer fruity tint that deepens your natural lip colour; ‘Perfect Nude’, a sheer universal nude and ‘Red Apple’, a sheer vivid red that brightens your natural lip colour. A multi-award-winning balm that also boasts a broad spectrum SPF 30 to protect lips from the sun’s damaging rays, this protects as it enhances their colour and hydrates.
how_to_use: Apply to lips or cheeks as needed and keep below 25c.

name: Versed Silk Slip Conditioning Lip Oil 9ml
description: Like lingerie for your lips, Versed's Silk Slip Conditioning Lip Oil glides effortlessly over skin to smooth dryness as it dresses your kisses in a subtle, healthy sheen. This nourishing, vegan oil imparts a beautiful sheen to your lips while keeping them soft and hydrated throughout the day. Leaving chapped lips supremely smooth, this formula is enriched with vitamin E (a stellar source of antioxidants), as well as a hydrating cocktail of jojoba, camellia and sesame oils. Though the oil is easily absorbed and non-sticky - perfect for on-the-go application - the moisture will be sure to hang around.
how_to_use: HOW: Squeeze and swipe. WHERE: Lips. WHEN: As often as you please. GOOD TO KNOW: Pack on a thicker layer before bed for extra-smooth and moisturized lips in the AM.

name: LANEIGE Lip Sleeping Mask 20g Grapefruit
description: If you struggle with dry, chapped lips but aren't a fan of lip balms, the Lip Sleeping Mask is here to help as you slumber. Working to gently slough away dead skin cells from the surface of your lips, this formula encourages a smooth, 'elastic' and supple feeling - working hard overnight to perfectly prep lips for make up application come morning. Available in five delicious scents, 'Original' berry, 'Grapefruit', 'Lemon Sorbet', 'Sweet Candy' and 'Vanilla', each sweet treat of a treatment uses a proprietary Berry Mix Complex, which uses antioxidants like vitamin C to smooth rough lips and protect them from the elements. The brand's patented Moisture Wrap technology creates a moisturising layer of beta glucan - which is a moisture-slurping humectant that soothes redness as it works - with hydro ion mineral water, evening primrose root extract and Hunza apricot extract all working to deliver lasting hydration too.
how_to_use: Before going to bed at night, apply an adequate amount on the lips using the built-in spatula. The next morning, gently wipe the lips clean with tissue or cotton pad.

name: The INKEY List Super Solutions 10% Azelaic Acid Serum 30ml
description: Developed with dermatologists, THE INKEY LIST’s new line — SuperSolutions — has arrived on our virtual shelves to help you tackle everything from stubborn scars to persistent redness. Here to relieve your skin of redness, the SuperSolutions 10% Azelaic Acid Serum is swift to absorb and quick to soothe and calm inflamed skin. Clinically proven to minimise redness in as little as four days, this non-pilling serum has been infused with micro-fine green colour particles and 10% azelaic acid to help conceal the appearance of redness and bring down irritation. A soothing dose of 0.3% allantoin further cocoons sensitive complexions, and thanks to its non-tacky formulation you won’t be left with a sticky base that ruins your make up either. From rosacea to uneven skin tone and occasional redness to irritation, this is the (skin care) solution for you.
how_to_use: Apply a pea-sized amount to cleansed face and neck morning and/or evening. If you are using this solution alongside other serums, you can layer them in any order. We always recommend to patch test before you use it for the first time.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Azelaic Acid, Propanediol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Acacia Senegal Gum, Xanthan Gum, Allantoin, Glycerin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polysorbate 60, Sorbitan Isostearate, Maltodextrin, Sodium Hydroxide, Hydrolyzed Gardenia Florida Extract, Gardenia Florida Fruit Extract, Polylysine.

name: NUXE Rêve de Miel Lip Balm New Formula
description: An ultra-nourishing, long-lasting lip balm, one jar of Nuxe Raªve de Miel is sold every 28 seconds throughout the world! An intensive nutritive formula, the potent blend of Honey, plant oils, Shea Butter and Grapefruit Essence delivers consistent hydration and protection (particularly in colder, wintry climates) without any irritating stickiness. Perfect as an overnight lip treatment, to relieve any discomfort and plump the lip contour, this can also be mixed with a bit of brown sugar to gently exfoliate lips, or massaged into cracked cuticles to accelerate healing. It can also be applied to especially dry patches if you have any eczema or psoriasis, this will soothe itchiness and encourage skin to repair itself. Your desk drawer/handbag/bedside table - and when you're not looking, husband/boyfriend - need one.
how_to_use: In winter and summer, apply Ultra-Nourishing Lip Balm to your lips and contour as often as required. At night, apply in a thick layer to your lips and lip contour area for an intense repairing effect. At night, treat yourself to some gentle exfoliation.... In the palm of your hand, mix a spoonful of sugar (preferably brown) with some Lip Balm and apply using light circular movements to gently remove dead skin. Rinse off and apply a thick layer of Lip Balm for an intense repairing action. Apply Ultra-Nourishing Lip Balm locally to areas of dry skin on your face. Apply in a thick layer to your cuticles to soften them before a manicure.
ingredient: Acacia Honey 5%, Shea Butter 13%, Plant Oils (Chilean Rose, Sweet Almond) 9.5%, Grapefruit Essence 2.5%, Vitamin E 1%. Beeswax, Shea Butter 13%, Vegetable Oil, Lecithin, Behenoxy Dimethicone, Sweet Almond Oil 8.5%, Honey 5%, Dimethicone, Octinoxate, Grapefruit Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Soybean Oil, Rosa Moschata Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Allantoin, Lemon Oil, Candelilla Wax, Calendula Extract.

Pick from ‘Rose’, a sheer pink tint that gives lips a healthy glow; ‘Rhubarb’, a sheer fruity tint that deepens your natural lip colour; ‘Perfect Nude’, a sheer universal nude and ‘Red Apple’, a sheer vivid red that brightens your natural lip colour. name: Byoma Hydrating Serum Refill 30ml
description: This ultra-lightweight, moisture boosting serum enriched with hydrating heroes gives your skin the tall glass of water you never knew you needed! Transform your visage into a true vision of glowy and bouncy skin — we guess it’s true what they say: good things do come in small packages. A saying even more true when you replenish your stock with a refill instead of chucking out your colourful packaging. Though small, it’s definitely mighty! Formulated with a unique barrier boosting tri-ceramide complex of ceramides, cholesterol and fatty acids that marry well with the powerhouse pairing of sqaulane and glycerin, your skin is left feeling replenished and renewed. A brightly packaged bottle with an endless supply of skin-loving goodies that’ll surely stand out in your bathroom cabinet. Kiss redness, dryness and flakiness goodbye and trade that in for kissable skin that’s happier, healthier and most of all — hydrated.
how_to_use: Apply 4-6 drops to cleansed skin, gently pressing until fully absorbed. Use on damp skin for optimum hydration. For drier skin, double the drops. Follow with moisturiser to seal in the hydration. Once you run out, replenish your stock with a refill pod.

name: COSRX AHA/BHA Clarifying Treatment Toner 150ml
description: A gentle everyday exfoliating toner, CosRx AHA/BHA Clarifying Treatment Toner is the perfect foil for problem-prone complexions – with resurfacing AHAs to melt the ‘glue’ that binds dulling dead cells to skin’s surface (trapping dirt, pollutants and impurities which can contribute to breakouts), while eliminating embedded oils and make up which cause congestion and blackheads. Ideal for those susceptible to pimples, this helps to prevent your complexion from harbouring spot-causing bacteria, while refining skin’s texture and restoring radiance.
how_to_use: After cleaning and drying your face and neck, spray liberally onto a cotton pad. Gently sweep the cotton pad all over face and neck. Pat for better absorption. Proceed with the next steps in your skin care routine.
ingredient: Mineral Water, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Water, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Water, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Lactate, Glycolic Acid, Water, Betaine Salicylate, Allantoin, Panthenol, Ethyl Hexanediol

name: Tan-Luxe The Gradual Illuminating Tanning Lotion 250ml
description: For a brilliantly believable and beautifully buildable bronzed glow at any time of year, this gradual tan lotion is the perfect antidote to pallid, sun-starved skin syndrome. Suitable for use on both face and body, the weightless, lotion-oil hybrid formulation glides on wherever it’s desired, smoothing, conditioning and toning skin while building up natural-looking sunkissed radiance. Steering well clear of tell-tale ‘tangoed’ territory, The Gradual by TAN-LUXE is a revolution in fake tan, giving all of the glow with none of the streaks, smell or stress.
how_to_use: Prep Exfoliate using a gentle scrub 24 hours before tanning. Lightly moisturise dry areas such as hands, feet, knees, ankles and elbows prior to application. Apply Apply to skin as you would a normal body moisturiser, lightly covering hands elbows and feet. Thoroughly wash hands after use. Develops over 2-4 hours delivering a subtle, gradual glow that you can apply daily, or as desired to build a tailor-made depth of colour. Maintain Exfoliate and moisturise skin regularly to maintain an even, luminous glow. Caution We advise a patch test is done 24 hours prior to use. Do not apply on broken, irritated or sensitive skin. Avoid contact with eyes. If a reaction occurs, discontinue use immediately and seek medical advice. Does not contain sunscreen and will not protect against sun exposure. Product colour may vary due to natural ingredients.

name: Caudalie Vinopure Purifying Gel Cleanser 150ml
description: Brimming with blemish-battling ingredients for combination skin, the Vinopure Purifying Gel Cleanser clarifies via a delightful gel-cream texture to keep skin feeling clean, fresh, soft and luminous – all without drying out. Gentle enough for twice-daily use, this innovative formula harnesses a medley of essential oils (think: lavender, peppermint, rosemary and lemongrass) to swiftly soothe inflammation, battle bacteria, tone, refresh and decongest. Working to tighten the look of pores and reduce excess sebum, this cleanser also uses a natural salicylic acid to unclog pores, while antioxidant-rich organic grape water moisturises, soothes and improves skin barrier function. Totally vegan, soap-free and made with 99% natural-origin ingredients, it even calls on grapeseed polyphenols to protect and encourage a youthful, healthy-looking complexion.
how_to_use: Morning and evening. Massage gel onto damp skin, while avoiding the eye contour area, to create a light foam. Rinse with water.

name: Glow Recipe Blueberry Bounce Gentle Cleanser 160ml
description: Fresh from South Korea, Glow Recipe’s newly reformulated Blueberry Bounce Gentle Cleanser shares the secret recipe for a Seoul-worthy glow. Beautifully ‘bouncy’, this rich gel cleanser works into a gentle lather to erase make up and impurities while also deeply hydrating skin, so much so that you might well no longer need to use a hydrating toner. Offering two benefits in one, it can be used as a moisturising cleanser and a quenching, deep-cleaning mask when left on for five to eight minutes. Brimming with blueberry, a renowned antioxidant powerhouse, this cleanser protects, strengthens and clarifies skin, while gentle alpha hydroxy acids (including glycolic and lactic acids) exfoliate dead skin cells for renewed radiance. With the adition of hyaluronic acid, this leaves your complexion soft, hydrated, dewy and bouncy, as well as perfectly prepped for skin care that follows, this cleanser is more than a little covetable!
how_to_use: TO USE AS A CLEANSER: Dispense one pump into wet palms and rub hands to create a lather. Massage gently onto wet skin for one minute, then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. Admire how bouncy your skin looks and then follow with your usual skincare regimen.

name: LANEIGE Glowy Makeup Serum 30ml
description: With a lightweight formula that's suitable for absolutely all skin types, LANEIGE's Glowy Makeup Serum is the multitasker your make up routine has been calling out for, as it softens and smoothes texture and helps your make up to stay put. All. Day. Long. To flood even the thirstiest of skin in moisture, this formula features a ceramide hydration gel, which locks in hydration and helps to strengthen your skin's all-important moisture barrier. Oh, and did we mention the glow this serum gives? That's largely down to 100% natural pink diamond powder which imparts a head turning, reflecting glow while also reflecting light (which, in turn, helps to minimise the appearance of any texture - think fine lines or pores - on the skin.) Finally, to keep your make up in place for hours, you'll find 'Light Fit Prep Technology'. Sounds fancy, right? This all-important ingredient creates a lightweight adhesion on the skin, locking your make up in place for even longer.
how_to_use: Use alone as a serum or under make up as a primer. [SERUM] Use as the final step in your skincare routine. Apply 2-3 drops to face. Pat until fully absorbed. [MAKEUP PRIMER] Use directly before foundation application. Apply 2-3 drops to face. Pat until fully absorbed.

name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution 30ml
description: When it comes to post-acne care, solutions often involve a visit to a dermatologist and eye-watering price tags. Enter an alternative from champions of affordable, effective skin care, The Ordinary. The Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution supports skin after breakouts, gently targeting redness, uneven tone and texture. This lightweight serum features soothing aloe barbadensis leaf juice powder to hydrate dry patches and take down lingering redness. Lesser known — but seriously effective — ingredient N-acetyl glucosamine (NAG), derived from bio-technology, effectively targets the appearance of uneven skin tone, tackling the marks breakouts leave behind. Peptides help to smooth away textural irregularities, while boosting the skin’s barrier for more resilient skin. An essential in your blemish first aid kit.
how_to_use: Use in the morning and/or evening, after cleansing. Follow with your favourite moisturiser. Do not use at the same time as acids, vitamin C, resveratrol and ferulic acid or salicylic acid.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Propanediol, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, N-Acetyl Glucosamine, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, Biosaccharide Gum-2, Pentylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Isoceteth-20, Hydroxymethoxyphenyl Decanone, Sodium Lactate, Lactic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin.

name: Dr.Jart+ Cicapair Sleepair Intensive Mask 30ml
description: Had it up to here with red blotches and irritation? Turn your attention to the Cicapair Tiger Grass Sleepair Intensive Mask to soothe and replenish damaged, sensitive skin while protecting against environmental aggressors. Aiding the recovery of compromised skin, this intensive treatment works to calm redness and repair stripped skin. Powered by centella asiatica – otherwise known as tiger grass – and the herbal complex of houttuynia cordata, yarrow and chlorophyll, it reduces the look of flare-ups and encourages the healing process. The Green Sleep Complex featuring moringa extract works to absorb skin irritants (think: fine dust) and form a lightweight, protective barrier. With an ointment-like cream texture, it wraps and seals your skin with lasting, soothing moisture.
how_to_use: Apply over dry, freshly cleansed skin. Leave on overnight and rinse with water in the morning.

name: Biossance 100% Squalane Oil 100ml
description: Celebrating their core ingredient and bottling a bank of nourishing properties, the 100% Squalane Oil is a heaven-sent hydrating essential. This ultra-moisturising formula encourages the natural cell renewal processes within your skin while sealing in essential hydration for lasting softness. Designed to mimic squalene - a natural molecule present in our skin that diminishes over time – this moisturising ingredient comes from 100% plant-based, renewable sugarcane and enhances elasticity as well as protecting your skin. Spoiled for ways in which to work it into your routine, here's a few we love: smooth over face and body for instant (and featherweight!) hydration; as an intensive moisture mask for stressed-out lengths; layered over lips to battle dryness and prime before colour; to grant a healthy-looking glow any and everywhere; even as an ultra-soothing shave oil. What's more, in a clinical study, this incredible oil was seen to accelerate cell turnover five days faster than that of non-treated skin! We are obsessed...
how_to_use: For Face: Rub a small amount together between hands to warm. Pat gently onto face, neck and décolleté. For Body: Massage a few pumps onto skin immediately after showering, paying close attention to areas needing extra hydration like arms, legs, and knees. For Hair: Rub a small amount between hands and smooth through dry or wet hair to add shine and tame flyaways, split ends and frizz.
ingredient: Squalane Oil.

name: RevitaBrow Advanced Eyebrow Conditioner 3ml
description: Pioneering, conditioning treatments, RevitaLash harnesses clinically-proven technology to nourish and strengthen eyelashes and brows – hydrating, protecting and elasticising, to enhance flexibility and help prevent brittleness and breakage. Awarded a coveted ‘2014 Best of Beauty’ award by beauty bible Allure, RevitaBrow Advanced is one of the world’s leading brow conditioning treatments – encouraging even fragile hairs to realise their full, glossy, lustrous potential. Phenomenally effective, RevitaLash was born out of a loving husband’s quest to help his wife regain her confidence during a battle with cancer. Dr. Brinkenhoff – an ophthalmologist of over 30 years – soon realised the revitalising potential of his formulation, and RevitaLash now has a loyal and global following in over 50,000 spas, salons and retail establishments, and remains a proud supporter of breast cancer research and education.
how_to_use: Step 1 Remove makeup and residue. Keep in mind, oil-based makeup removers and cleansers can leave behind a film which may create a barrier between your brows and the brow conditioner. It is important to wash off any residue. Let dry prior to application. Step 2 Apply a few short strokes of RevitaBrow® Advanced onto each eyebrow. It is not necessary to apply more frequently than once per day. Let dry completely before applying additional beauty products. Step 3 Apply daily and consistently for best results. Note: Only a small quantity is needed to beautify your eyebrows. If using the right amount, your Revitabrow will last this long:

name: Sunday Riley GOOD GENES Glycolic Acid Treatment 50ml
description: A multi-purpose treatment, Good Genes Glycolic Acid Treatment works hard to un-do the damage caused by sunlight, acne, pollution and less-than-healthy lifestyle choices! The potent blend of ingredients combine to plump fine lines, fight hyper-pigmentation, heal scar tissue and boost circulation so skin looks smoother, younger and more vibrant. The starring ingredient in this reformulated treatment are tiny glycolic acid molecules (which can sink deeper into the skin than other forms of alpha hydroxy acid) which break apart pore-clogging debris, gently exfoliating away dead, dulling cells to reveal the radiance beneath and minimise the signs of congestion, fine lines, wrinkles and dullness. Alongside this, lactic acid exfoliates further, prickly pear extract reduces irritation and lemongrass extract brightens and clarifies skin. The treatment can be used daily to give your complexion a moisture and radiance boost, or applied as a treatment mask to increase circulation and get skin glowing ahead of a special occasion.
how_to_use: Apply to clean skin as an exfoliating serum, morning or night.
ingredient: Water/ Aqua/ Eau, Dimethicone, Glycolic Acid, Squalane, Caprylyl Caprylate/Caprate, PPG-12/SMDI Copolymer, Potassium Lactate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Propanediol, Stearic Acid, Glycerin, PPG-24-Glycereth-24, Bis-Stearyl Dimethicone, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Fruit Extract, Saccharomyces Cerevisiae Extract, Cymbopogon Schoenanthus Oil, PEG-100 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/ Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Ceteareth-20, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorphenesin, Xanthan Gum, Sorbitan Isostearate, Potassium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Citral, Geraniol, Limonene

name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Sensitive Moisturiser 40ml
description: Suitable for sensitive skin (even that of babies!), the La Roche-Posay Toleriane Sensitive Moisturiser is a nourishing, soothing prebiotic moisturiser that works hard to repair and protect your skin's barrier without overloading it with irritation-provoking filler ingredients. With a rich, silky texture that melts into skin to flood it with long-lasting hydration, this formula uses glycerin, ceramides and vitamin B3 to comfort and soothe skin, while also reducing sensitivity over time. You’ll also find La Roche-Posay’s 1700 year old (!) spring water, which is protected from any sorts of pollutants until it reaches the surface, where the brand use it for its spa-worthy, antioxidant-packed properties.
how_to_use: Apply to the face and the neck morning and evening after cleansing.
ingredient: 60991209, Aqua/Water, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Propanediol, Pentylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Xanthan Gum, (Code F.I.L. B210728/2).

name: Ultra Violette Clean Screen Fragrance Free Sensitive Facial Skinscreen SPF 30
description: Developed, with fussy, easily-irritated and sensitive complexions in mind, the Clean Screen Fragrance Free Sensitive Facial Skinscreen SPF 30 is perfect for blemish prone and combination skin—protecting you from the sun’s perilous rays without any artificial fragrances or alcohol. Impressively lightweight and in a refreshing gel texture, this gentle sunscreen boasts SPF30 protection and a no-fuss, natural-looking finish that won’t mess with your make up (or skin!). Making short work of redness with its soothing capabilities, titanium dioxide is what gives this formula its broad-spectrum protection, while plant-derived pentavitin pumps the complexion with moisture. Think: plump, juicy skin with a side of satisfied glee. You’re welcome.
how_to_use: Apply every day, even when you’re staying indoors. Apply as the final step in your skincare routine, right after or instead of your moisturiser, before your make up. We recommend at least five pumps to cover your face and ears.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Titanium Dioxide, Methylene Bis-Benzotriazolyl Tetramethylbutylphenol, Silica, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Caprylyl Glycol, Polysorbate 60, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Saccharide Isomerate, Decyl Glucoside, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides).

name: Glow Recipe Plum Plump Hyaluronic Serum 30ml
description: Your one-way ticket to gorgeously plump, glowing skin, Glow Recipe's utterly adorable Plum Plump Hyaluronic Serum is a must-add to your collection if you already swear by the brand's glow-giving formulas. This bouncy and lightweight serum (that also boasts a delicious plum scent) is your go-to for plump, bouncy, instantly-radiant skin. Thanks to a potent cocktail of pure next-gen, pure hyaluronic acid (this formula boasts five different weights of the iconic ingredient for maximum absorption) that absorbs in a flash and leaves skin feeling totally quenched. But it doesn't stop there, it's also bursting with vegan collagen and silk protein, which help support the skin’s barrier and guard against free radicals. Finally, the addition of juicy Kakadu, Illawarra, and Burdekin plum boast high concentrations of anti-inflammatory vitamin C and contains minerals like magnesium, calcium, zinc, & potassium to fight against free radicals. A must-have for your morning routine, this Plum Plump Hyaluronic Serum deeply hydrates, promotes bouncy skin and softens too.
how_to_use: Apply 1-2 drops onto clean skin and gently pat into the skin for optimal absorption. Apply daily, morning and night, and follow with moisturiser. For maximum potency, store in a cool, dry place, out of direct sunlight. Tightly close cap after usage.

name: Biossance Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Oil 30ml
description: Cultivating the universally adored benefits of vitamin C, the Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Oil dramatically brightens and firms your complexion, bestowing a healthy-looking radiance you won't be able to move on from. Brimming with powerful antioxidants, it instantly revives dull, lacklustre complexions, levelling texture and tone, while encouraging a more supple and firm complexion. Derived from sugarcane, the squalane in this formula imparts instant hydration and works to seal that moisture within the skin for long-lasting comfort. An oil-soluble form of vitamin C acts as a brightening powerhouse, protecting against free radicals, balancing your tone and preventing future discolouration. The infusion of Chios crystal oil (gathered from trees native to Chios, Greece) encourages a more firm complexion with skin that feels ultra-soft and appears pillowy plump, while Damascus rose extract illuminates your complexion for a natural glow. Beyond fitting perfectly into your skin care ritual, this oil also gives a divine sheer glow when mixed with your favourite foundation or patted over make up for an enviable highlight.
how_to_use: Gently press a few drops onto clean skin morning and night. Use it after your serum and moisturiser to lock in long-lasting hydration. You can also add a drop or two to your foundation for extra dewy coverage.
ingredient: Squalane, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride , Pistacia Lentiscus (Mastic) Gum, Rosa Damascena Flower Extract, Geraniol, Citronellol.

name: Byoma Balancing Face Mist Refill 100ml
description: Spritz and spray your way to a balanced, healthier and hydrated complexion with the BYOMA Balancing Face Mist that’s suitable for all skin types. Already well-versed in this skin saviour but in need of a top up? Simply keep your colourful container and stock up on a handy refill. In true BYOMA fashion, this Balancing Face Mist is of course infused with a unique blend of barrier boosting tri-ceramide complexes, and combined with the powerful duo of allantoin and probiotic ferment, your skin is left feeling renewed and all-the-more moisturised. This ultra-lightweight, pH balanced, refreshing mist is the ultimate quick fix to instantly balance and soothe your skin, effectively supporting your microbiome for a healthier, glowing complexion. How lush! Who doesn’t love a bit of ease and functionality? Simply pop this mist into your bag on your way out for a quick on-the-go pick-me-up (don’t worry about sticky residue) and you’re good to go! Protect your precious skin against environmental stressors that may cause redness and inflammation and keep your skin feeling soothed, shielded and soft throughout the day… Dermatologist tested and approved, oil-free, non-comedogenic, alcohol and fragrance-free, vegan and cruelty free.
how_to_use: Shake well before each use and mist onto clean, dry skin. Follow with your favourite Byoma serums + moisturiser. Use as part of your daily regime as a toner or anytime your skin needs a refresh throughout the day. Once you run out, replenish your stock with a refill pod.

name: CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser 473ml
description: Perched comfortably in every bathroom cabinet and praised for its efficacy (and purse-friendly price), CeraVe’s Hydrating Cleanser rescues your skin from the brink of dehydration. Whether you’re winding down after a long night out or revving up to start your day, glow right from the start of your routine with this non-foaming, gel-like cleanser. Bursting with three essential ceramides (1, 3 and 6-11), gently remove the make up grime and dirt that threatens to clog your pores. Offering increased protection with the help of barrier-boosting benefits, consider this to be a glow skin affair where dryness and tighteness are no longer welcome.
how_to_use: For optimal results, use AM and PM. Massage cleanser onto wet skin, then rinse.

name: Sol de Janeiro Bom Dia Bright Cream 240ml
description: It's not just SZA who sees good days in your future... Scented like paradise - no exaggeration - Sol de Janeiro's Bom Dia Bright Cream is here to help you indulge in a skin-smoothing self-care moment with its nourishing blend of cupuaçu butter and fruit AHAs. Designed to help you glow from head to toe, this decadently rich body cream will have your skin soft to the touch in no time at all. It's enriched with Amazon's answer to shea butter - cupuaçu butter - to lock in moisture and boost elasticity, as your skin quickly and easily absorbs it. A duo of alpha hydroxy acids derived from mango and banana fruits then gently exfoliate to smooth rough patches, leaving remarkably soft, radiant skin in its stead. As if that wasn't enough, vitamin C helps to support collagen production and visibly brightens, diminishing the look of dark spots. We've never been so ready for bare-leg weather...
how_to_use: Smooth on daily, morning or night, for moisturizing and retexturizing benefits all over. For speedier results, use 2 times a day on areas prone to ingrown hairs due to hair removal (underarms, bikini line, legs, etc.), as well as bumpy, rough spots (upper arms, thighs, and bum bum).

name: Sunday Riley A+ High-Dose Retinoid Serum 30ml
description: One of the most bio-available non-prescription forms of vitamin A products on the market, A+ High-Dose Retinoid Serum is a pro-strength formula for those who want serious results without the unwanted side effects of traditional retinol formulations (reduced appearance of side effects like flaking, redness, and irritation compared to high-strength retinol and retinoid products is visible after one use). Combining a 5% retinoid ester blend, a 1% liposomal-encapsulated retinol blend and a 0.5% blue-green algae blend with natural, retinoid-alternative activity, this serum powerfully youth-boosts and improves the look of congested and UV damaged skin. Still on the fence? In addition to reducing the look of fine lines, A+ features encapsulated CoQ10 to help improve the appearance of weathered and damaged skin, while Hawaiian white honey, bisabolol, cactus extract and ginger balance and soothe for a calmer, more even-toned complexion. Available in mini and mightier editions (30ml and 50ml respectively), there's a size for everyone's bathroom cabinet – whether you're already a loyal Sunday Riley devotee or yet to dip your toes into their skin-enhancing waters...
how_to_use: Apply 1-2 pumps to clean, dry skin as a night-time pro-treatment.

Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract

name: Tower 28 Beauty BeachPlease Luminous Tinted Balm
description: In shades of coral, dusky plum and peach that are inspired by the Santa Monica sunset, Tower 28 Beauty's multi-purpose BeachPlease Luminous Tinted Balm blends seamlessly to grant a healthy, sun-kissed flush. Designed to cloak your lips and cheeks with weightless colour, this vegan and cruelty-free formula has the same enlivening effect as a day spent lazing in the summer sun. Never cakey or heavy, the silicone-free, creamy pans diffuse effortlessly to achieve a second-skin flush that looks like you, only on holiday. The sensitive skin-friendly formula is made with a medley of skin-loving, plant-based ingredients (think: green tea extract and aloe vera) to comfort your skin with each application. Choose between six sunset-inspired shades: 'Magic Hour', a rosy nude; 'Golden Hour', a vibrant orange; 'Happy Hour', a coral pink; 'Rush Hour', a flattering peach; 'Power Hour', a terracotta tone and 'After Hours', a dusky berry hue.
how_to_use: For cheeks and lips. Just tap tap, blend, and layer for bolder colour!

name: The INKEY List Polyglutamic Acid Dewy Sunscreen SPF30 50ml
description: Finding the perfect sunscreen for you can be a hard task but here to make lightwork of the skin care commandment you dare not skip, the Polyglutamic Acid Dewy Sunscreen SPF 30 sends waves of optimal hydration to parched pores and leaves an undetectable finish. Adored for their power to attract and lock in moisture for a smooth finish, polyglutamic acid, glycerin and squalane band together to form the ultimate 8% hydration, can-dew trio. A broad spectrum SPF 30 SPF sunscreen that provides UVA and UVB protection, this non-greasy and non-piling formula makes the perfect, universally flattering base for make up or bare skin days, for all skin types and tones.
how_to_use: Shake well before use. Use as the last step in your AM skincare routine, after moisturising. On cleansed skin, apply liberally to face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure. We recommend applying the product to 3 fingers first to get the right amount (this equates to about 3/4 of a teaspoon). Reapply frequently, particularly if perspiring, swimming or towelling. Protect this product from excessive heat and direct sunlight.

name: The Ordinary 100% Cold Pressed Virgin Marula Oil 30ml
description: Providing a pure, unmitigated natural skin (and hair) saviour, The Ordinary’s 100% Organic Cold-Pressed Virgin Marula Oil is brimming with vitamins, essential fatty acids and antioxidants to boost skin’s radiance and smooth stressed-out strands. To ensure that not one of the oil’s benefits is compromised, this formulation is cold-pressed (heating can cause degradation), while the non-greasy extract is brimming with free radical-fighting antioxidants to protect and condition your skin, while smoothing and softening hair. The Ordinary’s formulation is completely unrefined, leaving it with a natural scent – no added nasties in sight.
how_to_use: Hair Application—Work through damp, clean hair daily or as needed. Skin Application—Apply a few drops to the entire face once daily or as needed.
ingredient: Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil

name: The INKEY List Brighten-I Eye Cream 15ml
description: Ever get to that stage where your under-eyes look like you haven’t slept properly in a year? Guilty. THE INKEY LIST’S answer to dark circles, pillow-like puffiness and dryness around the eyes is the Brighten-I Eye Cream. Responsible for your soon-to-be brightened eyes, Brightenyl is an active ingredient that is 4x more potent than vitamin C. It works to restore and even the tone of your eye contours by reducing dark circles and minimising redness. Paired with blurring and hydrating properties, this cream smooths the contours of your eyes for a totally attainable well-rested look. Whether you need the perfect base to build upon or some one-stop illumination, Brighten-I is sure to give your under-eye a boost.
how_to_use: Use AM and PM. Apply to a clean eye area. Pat product into eye contour.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Cyclopentasiloxane, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glyceryl Stearate, Candelilla/Jojoba/Rice Bran Polyglyceryl-3 Esters, Trichilia Emetica (Mafura) Seed Butter, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Mica, Sodium Levulinate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, Polysilicone-11, Benzyl Alcohol, Aminobutyric Acid, Barium Sulfate, Sodium Anisate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Sodium Gluconate, Silica, Centella Asiatica, Ethylhexylglycerin, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Diglucosyl Gallic Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, Trihydroxystearin, Tin Oxide, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glucomannan, CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).

name: FARMACY Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm 50ml
description: A beautiful aquamarine cleansing balm, FARMACY’s Green Clean is a nourishing, solid-to-oil cleanser that eliminates impurities to leave your skin velvety smooth and contented. With moringa tree extract to neutralise dirt and pollutants, alongside sunflower and ginger root oils to deep-clean and condition, this gentle formula is suitable for all skin types – including dry, stressed-out or sensitised. Papaya extract has a natural skin-brightening effect (eradicating dulling dead skin cells), while an aromatic blend of lime, bergamot and orange essential oils works to revitalise a lacklustre complexion (and inspire a feeling of wellbeing).
how_to_use: Scoop a generous amount with the spatula. Use fingertips to massage into the skin with gentle upward and outward circular motions. Rinse off with a splash of water or wipe off with a warm, damp muslin cloth for ultimate comfort.
ingredient: Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Peg-20 Glyceryl Triisostearate, Peg-10 Isostearate, Polyethylene, Phenoxyethanol, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Amino Esters-1, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Amber Powder, Cananga Odorata Flower Oil, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Water, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Echinacea Purpurea Root Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Moringa Pterygosperma Seed Extract, Disodium Phosphate, Citric Acid.

name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar H Iso-Biome Moisturiser
description: Formulated with blemish-prone and oily skin types in mind, the La Roche-Posay Effaclar H Moisturising Cream for Sensitive Blemish-Prone Skin is a minimal ingredient, ultra-hydrating moisturiser. Cooling thermal spring waters are infused into the fine, creamy formula to help refresh lacklustre and fragile skin. The non-greasy texture absorbs quickly, while working to promote a soft complexion by creating a veil of moisture, to nourish even the most sensitive of skin types.
how_to_use: Apply the moisturiser morning and evening onto cleansed skin.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Squalane, Dimethicone, Panthenol, Zea Mays Starch/Corn Starch, Niacinamide, Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Myristyl Myristate, Bixa Orellana Seed Extract, Stearic Acid, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Glyceryl Stearate Se, Sodium Hydroxide, Myristic Acid, 2-Oleamido-1,3-Octadecanediol, Palmitic Acid, Hydroxyacetophenone, Capryloyl Glycine, Caprylyl Glycol, Vitreoscilla Ferment, Citric Acid, Maltodextrin, Xanthan Gum, Parfum/Fragrance.

name: Sunday Riley C.E.O. Glow Vitamin C + Turmeric Face Oil 35ml
description: Unlike most vitamin C products, which only treat the upper levels of skin, this beautifully glow-giving concoction stars oil-soluble vitamin C carried by superfood oils to reach the deepest levels of skin and impart the brightest, most hydrated glow possible. The formula stars THD Ascorbate, a gentle and powerful free radical-fighting lipid soluble form of vitamin C that stays stable in oxygen and water. THD Ascorbate at 3% is considered a quasi-drug in Japan for its brightening powers and skin-stimulating benefits. Alongside this, golden turmeric oil (extracted from the roots) is ideal for boosting skin’s radiance and making its tone more even. These potent stars are balanced by calming evening primrose, antioxidant-powered ginger root extract, age-defying bisabolol, vitamin A-rich red raspberry seed oil, neroli and vitamin-rich jojoba. Quickly-absorbing, Sunday Riley’s C.E.O. Glow Oil sinks in and delivers a healthy-looking lustre.
how_to_use: Massage 2-3 drops as needed into face, neck and décolletage. Can be blended or layered with any face product.
ingredient: Rubus Idaeus (Red Raspberry) Seed Oil, Caprylyl Caprylate/Caprate, Neopentyl Glycol Diethylhexanoate, Simmondsia Chineses (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Seed Oil, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Seed, Octyldodecanol, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Oil, Hexyldecanol, Pentylene Glycol, Ribes Nigrum (Black Current) Seed Oil, Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Bisabolol, Linalool, Limonene, 4-t-Butylcyclohexanol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil Unsaponifiables, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Cetylhydroxyproline Palmitamide, Geraniol, Farnesol, Cardiospermum Halicacabum Flower/ Leaf/ Vine Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Zingiber Officinale, Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Sterols, Hydroxyphenyl Propamidobenzoic Acid, Citronellol, Citral, Rosemarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Eugenol.

name: Paula's Choice Clinical 20% Niacinamide Treatment (20ml)
description: Boasting an incredible concentration of the ultimate multitasking ingredient, this exclusive Clinical Niacinamide 20% Treatment from PAULA'S CHOICE dramatically refines the look of uneven texture and visible pores. The first-ever formula to harness niacinamide at a safe and effective 20% concentration, this advanced serum is designed to transform the look of visible pores, orange-peel texture and rough bumps. Adored for its spectrum of benefits, niacinamide - a.k.a. vitamin B3 is responsible for minimising the visibility of pores, improving uneven skin tone, fortifying barrier function, diminishing dullness and softening fine lines and wrinkles as well as reducing the redness that follows a blemish *takes a much-need breath*. This hero ingredient is then complemented by purslane, acetyl glucosamine and an antioxidant blend of liquorice extract and vitamin C to illuminate and refine your tone. Don't believe us? The results speak for themselves… In a consumer self-assessment of 113 people who used the serum twice daily for four weeks, 81%(!) of users agreed that it improved the texture of skin!
how_to_use: Apply a few drops of Niacinamide 20% once daily after cleansing, toning, and exfoliating. If you use it at night, layer with other treatment products as needed and follow with moisturiser; if you use it during the day, finish with a sunscreen rated SPF 30 or greater.
ingredient: Water (Aqua), Niacinamide (skin-restoring/skin-replenishing), Pentylene Glycol (solvent/texture enhancer), Butylene Glycol (slip agent/hydration), Glycerin (skin-replenishing), Acetyl Glucosamine (skin-replenishing), Ascorbyl Glucoside (vitamin C/antioxidant), Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract (skin-soothing/antioxidant), Spiraea Ulmaria (Meadowsweet) Extract (antioxidant), Portulaca Oleracea (Purslane) Extract (antioxidant), Camellia Japonica Flower Extract (antioxidant), Epigallocatechin Gallate (green tea-derived antioxidant), Boerhavia Diffusa Root Extract (skin-soothing), Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract (antioxidant), Allantoin (skin-soothing), Lecithin (skin-replenishing), Pullulan (texture enhancer), Panthenol (hydration), Silica (absorbent), Xanthan Gum (thickener), Sclerotium Gum (thickener), Propanediol (hydration), Sodium Phytate (chelating agent), Phenoxyethanol (preservative), Ethylhexylglycerin (preservative).

name: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Cleanser 150ml
description: Leave skin looking and feeling soft and bright, COSRX's Low-pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser is the perfect AM cleanse for those beauties that want to wake up their complexions without straying into overly dry, 'squeaky clean' face territory. This mild-yet-effective cleanser (available in a full size or handy travel size) is the ultimate in multitasking skin care. Not only does it 'rev' up and refresh tired skin while removing oil and dirt build up, but it also protects the skin from environmental aggressors that cause dryness or damage throughout the day. This is because the lightweight gel - which creates a satisfying lather with a little rub between your fingertips - is formulated with a slightly acidic pH. In turn, this helps to balance your skin's pH and strengthen that all-important moisture barrier. The result? Glowy, healthy skin that you're guaranteed to love.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Polysorbate 20, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Sodium Chloride, Butylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Parfum, Allantoin, Sodium Benzoate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Citric Acid, Styrax Japonicus Branch/Fruit/Leaf Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Betaine Salicylate, Saccharomyces Ferment, Cryptomeria Japonica Leaf Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Leaf Extract, Pinus Palustris Leaf Extract, Ulmus Davidiana Root Extract, Oenothera Biennis Flower Extract, Pueraria Lobata Root Extract, Ethyl Hexanediol, Limonene.

name: Dieux Skin Forever Eye Masks - Dieux Tattoo 2 oz
description: Quite literally the one and only eye mask that you’ll ever need with a new and improved tattoo design by tattoo artist, David Enth. Dieux Skin Forever Eye Masks are the much needed solution to wasteful skin care that are effective, hygienic and hard-working. Plus, plus, plus! Its super soft silicone texture latches onto your skin and seals in gels, serums and creams to make sure you get the most out of your products. Attend a virtual coffee meeting in Pinterest board-worthy self-care chic, or allow the masks to sit on your skin whilst you do your makeup for a night out.Stop throwing out single-use eye masks and say yes to sustainable skin care that also cares for the env-EYE-ronment! All you need to do is simply wash, dry, reuse and then you’re good to go! These eye masks make for a perfect hassle-free product that’ll stay in your bathroom cabinet…forever!
how_to_use: Gently apply hydrating eye cream or serum under eye area. Ensure product is evenly applied where the masks will rest letting the area get slightly tacky. Peel and stick eye masks to each eye and leave on for up to 10-20 minutes. After 10-20 minutes, remove eye masks and gently wash patches with mild soap and warm water. Dry and store in a cool, dark place — like this tin. For a cooling effect, store eye masks in-fridge or freezer prior to use.
ingredient: Silicone.

name: CeraVe Eye Repair Cream 14ml
description: Who said you need endless lotions and potions to keep your skin in tip-top health? For beauties that prefer a more minimal routine, CeraVe’s Moisturising Cream — perfect for enriching your face and body with nourishment and moisture — is one for you.  As with all CeraVe superheroes, at the core of this rich (but quick to absorb) formula is a cocktail of three essential ceramides (lipids that are essentially the ‘glue’ of your skin barrier). Flooding your skin with these ceramides helps to keep that skin barrier in tip-top health, helping to maintain moisture levels and keep irritation, sensitivity and eczema at bay. CeraVe’s unique ‘MVE Technology’ means you get even more from these ceramides; it ensures they’re gradually released over time to ensure long-lasting nourishment and hydration. Throw in a healthy dose of moisture-slurping hyaluronic acid, and this formula promises to really care for skin (even if it’s ultra-dry!). If you struggle with grumpy, pernickety skin that just doesn’t seem to get on with many creams, this may just be the answer — it’s fragrance free, non-comedogenic and hypoallergenic. Phew!
how_to_use: Apply to the face and body, as often as needed.
ingredient: Aqua / Water, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Petrolatum, Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Potassium Phosphate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Disodium Edta, Dipotassium Phosphate, Ceramide Np, Ceramide Ap, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Xanthan Gum, Carbomer, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol,. Ceramide EOP.

name: ICONIC London Prep-Set-Glow 120ml (Various Shades)
description: Get glowing with ICONIC Londons Prep-Set-Glow, a new and miraculous mist, which can be used before, after, or without make up for a gorgeously illuminated result. Refreshing and moisturising, the luscious fluid features subtle light-reflecting particles to leave you with a gorgeous gleam, whether you use it to prep skin for make up, set a finished look or to grant a stunning, glossy effect to a bare face. The 100% vegan formula is enriched with calming cucumber and chamomile extracts to soothe any sensitivity, as well as antioxidant-rich green tea and vitamin E to condition your complexion and revitalising caffeine to wake up even the most lacklustre skin. Youll swiftly become addicted to the radiant results. Available in three perfectly pearlescent shades, you may have a hard time choosing between the exclusive, limited edition 'Gold' (a molten, gold hue), Original (a champagne-toned shimmer to add golden shine) and Glow (a terracotta tone that bestows a rich bronze-y glow).
how_to_use: Use to prep skin before applying make up, to set a finished look, or to add a stunning glossy effect to a bare face.
ingredient: Original: Aqua, Glycerine, Butylene Glycol, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40 Hydrogenated castor oil, Phenoxyethanol, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Propylene Glycol, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Polysorbate 20, PEG-20 Glyceryl Laurate, Tocopherol, Linoleic Acid, Retinyl Palmitate, Panthenol, Caffeine, Arginine, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Tin Oxide, Parfum, Chlorophenesin, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate Gold: Aqua, Glycerine, Butylene Glycol, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40 Hydrogenated castor oil, Phenoxyethanol, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Propylene Glycol, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Polysorbate 20, PEG-20 Glyceryl Laurate, Tocopherol, Linoleic Acid, Retinyl Palmitate, Panthenol, Caffeine, Arginine, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Tin Oxide, Parfum, Chlorophenesin, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate

name: Caudalie Vinoclean Makeup Removing Cleansing Oil 75ml
description: Dissolve make up, SPF and the impurities built up from your busy day with Caudalie's Vinoclean Makeup Removing Cleansing Oil, made up of 100% natural origin ingredients to care for your complexion. Keep your skin supple and free from impurities with Caudalie's cleansing oil, designed to remove even the toughest pigments. Suitable for lifting away all kinds of makeup (including waterproof!) this cleanser can be used across the lips, eyes and face. Castor and sweet almond oils provide an ultra-gentle and kind-to-skin cleanse, the perfect first step in your night-time cleansing rituals.
how_to_use: Emulsify with warm water, then rinse.
ingredient: Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-4 Oleate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Parfum (Fragrance). (147/071)

name: Pai Skincare Rosehip BioRegenerate Oil 30ml
description: The ultimate multi-tasker for sensitive skin, Pai Skincare’s Rosehip Bioregenerate is one of the brand’s bestsellers, thanks to its extraordinary effects. Rosehip oil is renowned for its powerful skin healing, regenerative properties and Pai extracts the oil used in this formula via an ultra-advanced method. Volcanically sourced CO2 supercritical extraction (stay with us on this one…) is used to derive a unique blend of Andean rosehip fruit and seed oils, which is more effective, fresh and long-lasting than traditional cold-pressed oils. High concentrations of omegas 3, 6, 7 and 9, plus antioxidant carotenoids help to repair and protect skin against environmental stress and visible damage. The oil can be used to address a catalogue of complexion complaints without irritation, including dry, flaky patches, blemishes, dull skin tone, fine lines, scars and sun damage. With regular use, it will condition skin, improve firmness and elasticity and promote and clear, even skin tone.
how_to_use: Apply 2-3 drops to the palm of your hand and use fingertips to gently massage into clean, slightly damp skin on face or body. Allow the oil to fully absorb before dressing. For best results, we recommend using oils at night before bed and creams in the morning. For extra hydration, mix 2-3 drops of Rosehip BioRegenerate Oil with a pump of Chamomile & Rosehip Calming Day Cream.
ingredient: Rosa Canina Seed Extract* - Rosehip Seed Extract Rosa Canina Fruit Extract* - Rosehip Fruit Extract Tocopherol - Natural Vitamin E Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract* - Rosemary Extract Certified Organic by the Soil Association (*Organically produced 99% of product). Suitable for Vegans. Not tested on animals. Nut-Free Formula. Pai Skincare’s commitment to product purity means they never use artificial fragrances, alcohol (denat.), parabens (including japanese honeysuckle), phenoxyethanol, propylene glycol, formaldehyde (including sodium hydroxymethylglycinate), sodium lauryl sulfate or other skin irritants.

name: La Roche-Posay Pure Vitamin C10 Serum 30ml
description: Pure vitamin C in the form of ascorbic acid peps up dull and tired looking skin in this targeted hydrating serum, smoother and brighter looking skin is finally on the horizon. Harnessing the brightening powers of ascorbic acid, La Roche Posay transforms dull skin that’s lacking that certain ‘je ne sais quoi’ and leaves it looking radiant. Adding to the pigment-reducing properties of this serum is hydrating hyaluronic acid, infused to plump parched skin and draw in moisture to keep fine lines smoothed. The results don’t stop there though, with salicylic acid tackling dulling dead skin cells and texture, with a hefty does of ‘Thermal Spring Water’ to deliver all the soothing, skin-restoring perks that sensitive skin strives for. We’re positively glowing already.
how_to_use: Apply in the morning to face and neck. Avoid the eye contour.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Ascorbic Acid, Cyclohexasiloxane, Glycerin, Alcohol Denat., Potassium Hydroxide, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Polysilicone-11, Dimethicone, Propylene Glycol, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Peg-20 Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Adenosine, Poloxamer 338, Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Disodium Edta, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Laureth-7, Acetyl Dipeptide-1 Cetyl Ester, Xanthan Gum, Toluene Sulfonic Acid, Polyacrylamide, Tocopherol, Salicylic Acid, Parfum/Fragrance ( Fil B224007/0).

name: Medik8 Surface Radiance Cleanse 150ml
description: A constant bestseller in the results-driven range, Medik8's Surface Radiance Cleanser has an ultra-refreshing formula that gently exfoliates and refines your skin for a luminous effect. Start as you mean to go on with this purifying and brightening cleanser. The effective formula harnesses a bespoke exfoliating complex of mandelic, lactic and salicylic acid to smooth the surface of your skin and decongest deep within your pores. It's also infused with antioxidant-rich, naturally citrus-scented mangosteen peel extract to help protect your skin from damaging free radicals, while glycerin works to replenish moisture levels for comfortable, never-tight-feeling skin.
how_to_use: Apply a small amount of cleanser into the palm of the hand and massage into moistened face and neck. Gently remove by splashing with water and pat face dry. Recommended for normal to oily skin types - use once to twice daily. For drier skin types - use up to twice a week as a treatment cleanser. Please note: the visual and product name listed may differ to the packaging received due to product updates across the range. Rest assured, the formula and great results will remain the same.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Glycerin, Mandelic Acid, Salicylic Acid, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Citric Acid, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Fruit Extract, Yucca Schidigera Root Extract, Lactic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Maltodextrin, Disodium EDTA, Garcinia Mangostana (Mangosteen) Peel Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Peel Oil, Limonene, Linalool.

name: Emma Hardie Moringa Cleansing Balm with Professional Cleansing Cloth 100g
description: Totally deserving of its never-ending praise, you'll find a pot of Emma Hardie Skincare's cult 'Moringa Balm' in every savvy skin care guru's bathroom cabinet. The perfect first step in your end-of-day cleansing routine, this indulgent concoction dissolves dirt and make up while nourishing skin and dispelling your stresses - thanks to the extracts of orange and jasmine which surround your headspace with heavenly, soul-soothing fragrance. Laced with wild sea fennel, vitamin E and rose oils to rebalance and recapture radiance, this leaves your complexion impeccably clean and ethereally soft. It's brilliant for those who're prone to dullness - combatting congestion while boosting skin's dewiness - and when its massaged with your fingertips you'll stimulate the blood-flow to help 'feed' your cells and keep skin feeling 'plump' and looking luminous. The perfect way to take the day off, this doubles as a therapeutic treatment mask when applied to clean skin before bathing - just massage all over your face (and your neck!) before soaking for ten blissful minutes; the steamy atmosphere will help to 'de-gunk' your clogged pores and maximise the penetration of the strengthening and moisturising actives.
how_to_use: Moringa Balm: take no more than a 5p piece of the Moringa Cleasning Balm into the palm of your hand to create a cream. Apply to the face, neck and eye area and massage thoroughly into the skin. To remove, soak a cleansing cloth in warm water, squeeze out the excess and gently wipe over the whole face and neck, taking extra care around the delicate eye area. Emma Tops Tips: Use as an overnight facial treatment - the skin appears hydrated smoother and more youthful. Caution: If the product enters the eye, wash out thoroughly with plenty of clean water. Stop using this product if you develop redness or itching. Professional Dual-Action Cleansing Cloth: soak the Dual Action Professional Cleansing Cloth in warm water, squeeze out the excess and gently wipe over the whole face and neck, taking extra care around the delicate eye area. Use the muslin side of the cloth to remove excess make up and grime and the microfibre side of the cloth to deep cleanse, buff, brighten and tone the skin. Machine washable.
ingredient: Moringa Balm Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, PEG-8 Beeswax, PEG-6 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides, PEG-60 Almond Glycerides, Sorbitan Stearate, Palmitic/Stearic Triglycerides, Limonene, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Silica, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Oil, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Juniperus Virginiana Oil, Aqua (Water), Lecithin, Linalool, Butylene Glycol, Octyldodecyl PCA, Menthyl PCA, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Crithmum Maritimum Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Moringa Pterygosperma Seed Extract, Jasminum Officinale (Jasmine) Flower Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Disodium Phosphate, Citronellol, Citric Acid, Geraniol, Citral. Professional Dual-Action Cleansing Cloth Muslin side 100% Cotton Microfibre Side: 80% Polyester, 20% Polyamide

name: Paula's Choice Calm Nourishing Milky Toner 118ml
description: Dousing skin with layer upon layer of hydration, the CALM Nourishing Milky Toner is an essential in-between step to replenish moisture after cleansing and prep skin for the steps ahead... A must-have for sensitive skin, this soothing toner reduces redness and calms skin with a host of comforting ingredients: allantoin is a top-ranking performer at soothing and conditioning skin; ophiopogum japonicus root extract reduces redness and is replete with antioxidant benefits; marshmallow root extract helps to reverse and repair damaged skin while dispensing a dash of emollients. Saving sensitive skin in an instant and caring for your cells in the long run, keep using this skin saviour to boost and prolong your youthful appearance.
how_to_use: After cleansing, apply toner to a cotton pad and gently stroke over face and neck. Do not rinse. Follow with the rest of your morning or evening skin care routine. For daytime, finish with a broad-spectrum sunscreen rated SPF 30 or greater.
ingredient: Aqua (Solvent), Pentylene Glycol (Humectant), Glycerin (Skin conditioning agent), Propanediol (Viscosity increasing agent), C13-15 Alkane (Solvent), Panthenol (Humectant), Polyglyceryl-6 Oleate (Skin conditioning agent), Cetheth-20 Phosphate (Cleansing Agent), Sodium PCA (Skin conditioning agent), Ophiopogon Japonicus Root Extract (Humectant), Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate (Viscosity increasing agent), Cetearyl Alcohol (Emulsion Stabilizer), Allantoin (Skin conditioning agent), Sodium Hyaluronate (Skin conditioning agent), Dicetyl Phosphate (Emulsifying agent), Maltodextrin (Absorbent), Althaea Officinalis Root Extract (Skin conditioning agent), Ethylhexylglycerin (Skin conditioning agent), Sodium Phytate (Chelating agent), Pantolactone (Humectant), Tocopherol (Humectant), Phenoxyethanol (Preservative).

name: Weleda Skin Food Lotion - Light 30ml
description: A lighter - but no less hydrating - iteration of the best-loved Skin Food, Skin Food Light, now available in a pocket-friendly 30ml size, brings immediate comfort to dry, thirsty skin that's in need of a cooling, replenishing drink. Intensive care that sinks in easily, Skin Food Light 30ml boasts a medley of softening, strengthening, smoothing and barrier-boosting botanicals - including sunflower seed oil, shea and cocoa seed butters, rosemary extracts and chamomile - to supplement skin's own defences while 'locking in' moisture to maximise 'spring' and resilience. Silky, non-greasy and swiftly absorbed, this tube is a true handbag hero - as well as a pocket-sized sidekick - to care for chapped, compromised hands, scaly elbows or anywhere needing attention.
how_to_use: Smooth onto dry skin areas on the body or face and massage in gently. Allow to soak in.

name: Ultra Violette Extreme Screen Hydrating Body & Hand Skinscreen SPF50+
description: When the sun’s perilous rays strike, make sure you’re protecting your limbs and hands via the Extreme Screen Hydrating Body & Hand SPF50. Enveloping skin in SPF50+ with a dash of (well, four hours of, to be precise) water and sweat resistance to boot, this versatile formula gives a shimmery sheen, smells delightful and is incredibly hydrating. Plant-derived pentavitin pumps skin with moisture (think: plump, juicy skin with a side of satisfied glee), aloe vera soothes and vitamin E nourishes while fighting against pesky free radicals—the the DNA-damaging environmental aggressors that attack cells, breaking down collagen and accelerating the skin-ageing process.
how_to_use: Every single day, even if you’re only kinda going out in the sun. Slather on a solid dollop after your shower for your daily dose of glow, hydration and sun protection, and remember – you want at least 5ml per limb, so don’t be stingy!

name: CeraVe Moisturising Lotion with Ceramides for Dry to Very Dry Skin 236ml
description: Quench dry, dehydrated skin with the CeraVe Moisturising Lotion; a lightweight, non-greasy moisturiser that effectively hydrates skin whilst helping to restore the skin’s natural barrier. Ideal for dry and irritation-prone skin, the milky lotion utilises patented MVE® delivery technology to help drive the benefits of three essential ceramides and skin-plumping Hyaluronic Acid deep into skin for round the clock hydration. Suitable for all skin types. Fragrance-free.
how_to_use: Apply liberally as often as needed.

name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios Oil Control Fluid SPF50+ for Oily Blemish-Prone Skin 50ml
description: Making a porefect poolside pal and daily essential for oilier skin types, the Anthelios Oil Control Fluid SPF50+ for Oily Blemish-Prone Skin works to keep breakouts at bay whilst warding off excess shine, sun damage and overexposure to UV rays. Forming a comfortably matte finish, this white cast-free formula is powered by airlicium, highly protective Netlock Technology and thermal spring water which work together to instantly hydrate skin and fortify your moisture barrier. Come rain or shine, this weightless sunscreen supports even the most sensitised skin and shields against ultra-long UVA and UVB rays without clogging pores or leaving sticky residue in its trail.
how_to_use: For daily usage and sun exposure. Shake before use. Apply the sunscreen product just before exposure. Re apply frequently and generously to maintain protection, especially after perspiring or towelling.

name: Avène Thermal Spring Water Spray for Sensitive Skin 150ml
description: Packed full of minerals and trace elements, the Thermal Spring Water Spray by Avène envelops the skin in cooling hydration. The refreshing mist is a treat for sensitive and irritation-prone skin types, helping to nourish the skin barrier and protect against dryness. Avène's iconic thermal spring water is a naturally mineralised ingredient that instantly quenches the skin's thirst. Suitable for the face and body, the spray is subjected to a one-of-a-kind packaging process to ensure complete purity and effectiveness. The possibilities are endless: use to moisturise, cleanse, or prepare skin for subsequent products. After use, skin feels soothed and touchably soft with a balanced appearance. Available in 300ml, 150ml and 50ml sizes.
how_to_use: Use several times a day. Spray generously for several seconds, wait a moment and then gently pat dry with a towel.
ingredient: Avene Thermal Spring Water (Avene Aqua), Nitrogen.

name: Caudalie Vinopure Purifying Toner 200ml
description: A naturally purifying, wonderfully refreshing step to add to your routine, Caudalie’s Vinopure Clear Skin Purifying Toner battles blemishes while preparing skin perfectly for subsequent treatments. Perfect for treating combination skin, this wonderful concoction acts like a ‘vacuum for your pores’; it’s formulated with 100% natural salicylic acid, antioxidant, age-defying grape polyphenols, organic rosewater and antibacterial organic essential oils of rosemary and peppermint to purify skin without drying it out. With its 100% natural scent (it smells fresh and spa-like thanks to the essential oils and rose water) and weightless water-like texture, it delivers a light, surprising ‘breath’ of freshness with each application.
how_to_use: Apply both morning and evening, to cleansed skin, with a cotton pad. Do not rinse. Avoid eye contour area.

name: LANEIGE Lip Sleeping Mask - Sweet Candy 20g
description: Discover the best-selling LANEIGE Lip Sleeping Mask, an ultra-nourishing formula that encourages soft, luscious lips. Available in mouth-watering flavours, the lip mask plumps the lips with intense moisture, helping to minimise roughness and cracking due to dryness. The mask cloaks the lips with innovative Moisture Wrap™ technology. Infused with minerals and hyaluronic acid, it forms a protective film over the lips to help deliver hydration and lock in active ingredients. A Berry Mix Complex™ of raspberry, strawberry, cranberry and blueberry extracts offers antioxidant protection, as shea butter helps to soften and condition lips. Simply apply the mask before bedtime to help replenish the lips as you sleep. Complete with applicator.

name: La Roche-Posay Cicaplast Balm B5 Multi-Purpose Repairing Balm 100ml
description: A versatile skin saviour, the Cicaplast Baume B5 Multi-Purpose Repairing Balm soothes and hydrates skin, and works wonderfully for sensitive skin types. Infusing the brand's signature Thermal Spring Water blend with 5% panthenol, relieve tight, dry and cracked skin with this non-greasy and ultra-nourishing balm. Using the most minimal of ingredients, this multi-purpose balm uses glycerin to hydrate skin and cicaplast to replenish vitamins and amino acids, seeing your skin to a healthier place. Whether it's for repairing broken skin post-injury or for areas on your body that need a little more TLC, keep this skin staple close and you'll never look back...
how_to_use: Apply daily to clean dry skin in a generous layer. Can be used on the face and body, avoiding lips and the eye contour.

name: CeraVe Foaming Cleanser with Niacinamide for Normal to Oily Skin 236ml
description: Perfect for sensitive, normal to oily, or blemish-prone skin, CeraVe’s gentle Foaming Cleanser washes away the day and deeply cleanses skin — without leaving it feeling dry or dehydrated. In fact, this hardworking cleanser will actually help to promote a healthier and more hydrated complexion by repairing and supporting your skin’s moisture barrier. This gel-like texture turns to a soft foam when powered up with water, leaving your skin feeling refreshed and purified. As with all CeraVe superheroes, at the core of this cleanser is a cocktail of three essential ceramides (lipids that are essentially the ‘glue’ of your skin barrier). Flooding your skin with these ceramides helps to keep that skin barrier in tip-top health, helping to maintain moisture levels even while cleansing your skin. CeraVe’s unique ‘MVE Technology’ means you get even more from these ceramides; it ensures they’re gradually released over time to ensure long-lasting nourishment and hydration. Worried about sensitivity? This does-it-all formula is fragrance-free and hypoallergenic too.
how_to_use: Use morning and evening. Apply to wet hands and massage into the skin, then rinse thoroughly.
