name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios UVMune 400 Invisible Fluid SPF50+ Sun Cream 50ml
description: Stay safe in the sun without streaking thanks to this invisible finish SPF. Housed in a non-greasy and fragrance-free formula, this is the skin-friendly SPF we want on our complexion through every season. Give your skin the protection it deserves with the Anthelios UVMune 400 Invisible Fluid SPF 50+ Sun Cream. Sensitive skin can rest assured this has been endlessly tested for its mildness on the skin, and with UVA, UVB and Ultra Long UVA protection your skin has never felt more safe. We’ll take a lifetime supply!

name: OSKIA Renaissance Cleansing Gel (100ml)
description: The cleansing companion to Oskia’s best-loved, multi-award winning Renaissance Mask is everything we dreamed it would be *swoons*. Having left no-one in doubt of our devotion to the peachy-pink skin miracle, we’ve been falling over ourselves to lay hands on its exquisite cleansing counterpart. With the same heavenly Rose Chamomile fragrance and distinctive pink tint of the mask, the Renaissance Cleansing Gel quickly and gently dissolves make up and impurities whilst actively illuminating to reveal ultra-clean, hydrated skin that positively glows with contentment. Suitable for all skin types – particularly dull, uneven and blemish-prone complexions – it's available in supersize (200ml), full-size (100ml) and travel-sized (35ml) editions, so you need never be without its skin-saving powers.

name: Versed Smooth Landing Advanced Retinol Eye Balm 12g
description: Promising a wide-eyed and bushy-tailed look the Smooth Landing Advanced Retinol Eye Balm visibly softens fine lines while firming and restoring bounce to the delicate area around your peepers. With a luxe, balm-like texture, this eye-nourisher heroes granactive retinoid, a less irritating retinol derivative that stimulates your skin's natural collagen and elastin production and giving skin that gorgeously plumped up finish. Supporting this, you'll find a cocktail of moisture barrier-strengthening shiitake mushroom extract, nourishing vitamin E and moisturising, antioxidant-filled blackcurrant seed oil. Just tap, tap, tap into our eye area each evening and watch puffiness reduce, brightness seriously rev up.
how_to_use: Every PM, rub your ring finger on the balm, then gently tap it into the skin around your undereyes. Skip moisturiser on this area (you won't need it), but don't forget SPF the next day. GOOD TO KNOW: Your ring finger naturally has the lightest touch. Use it when applying eye products to avoid putting unnecessary pressure on that fragile skin.

name: Biossance Squalane and Probiotic Gel Moisturiser 50ml
description: Restoring balance to inflamed skin as it strengthens your skin’s natural barrier, the Squalane + Probiotic Gel Moisturiser helps to soothe redness-prone skin. Formulated to fortify your natural moisture barrier and infuse your skin with a wave of hydration, this ultra-gentle cream complements all skin types, working especially well with redness and irritation-prone skin. The 100% plant-derived squalane delivers and locks in essential moisture, while the probiotic (lactococcus ferment lysate) balances redness and encourages complexion clarity. In charge of correcting your tone, red seaweed calms the look of aggravated skin, while ginger extract visibly eases the appearance of redness and Swiss garden cress sprouts help to reveal radiant skin by diminishing dark spots and uneven tone.
how_to_use: Apply to cleansed face morning and night. May be used alone or under Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Oil if more moisture is needed.

name: Alpha-H Liquid Gold Exfoliating Treatment with Glycolic Acid 100ml
description: Starring 5% nature-derived glycolic acid (it comes from sugar cane), the Liquid Gold with 5% Glycolic Acid harnesses the cell-stimulating and exfoliating properties of alpha hydroxy acids, which melt the 'glue' that binds dulling dead cells to skin's surface, revealing the healthy 'new' skin cells beneath. What's more, by lowering skin's pH (from 5.5 to around 3), this overnight treatment stimulates cellular activity — accelerating the repair and renewal processes, as skin works hard to re-establish equilibrium. It bolsters synthesis of elastin and collagen (the 'scaffolding' that keeps skin firm), while penetrating deep within pores to eradicate spot-causing bacteria, all while the resurfacing action helps to diminish visibility of post-blemish scars, dark spots and brown patches, so your complexion quickly looks more even-toned and luminous. It's a must-have for anyone concerned with premature skin ageing, sun damage or problem skin conditions — just build up skin's tolerance gradually (to minimise redness). Apply with a dampened cotton pad, once a week for 2–3 weeks while skin acclimatises, then build up to 3 'neat' applications a week for maximum skin-brightening benefit.
how_to_use: Apply to cleansed skin every other night. Moisten the cotton pad with solution and apply evenly over the face, neck and decollete, avoiding your eye and lip area. For an intensive treatment leave on overnight without applying a night cream over the top. Always use a daily sunscreen with an SPF of at least factor 15 when using resurfacing products.
ingredient: Aqua, Alcohol Denat, Glycolic Acid (5%), Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Silk, Potassium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Extract.

name: Dr.Jart+ Cicapair Trial Kit
description: Uniting three Dr.Jart+ heroes, the Cicapair Your First Trial Kit is a must for anyone who suffers from easily-irritated or red complexions, with the {Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment}, {Cicapair Tiger Grass Re.Pair Serum} and {Cicapair Tiger Grass Re.Pair Cream} all making an appearance. Designed to even tone and perfect your complexion, the Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment is a one-stop correcting pot that levels your complexion to obscure blemishes and reduce the look of redness for a your-skin-but-better look. It acts as a physical barrier against damaging environmental aggressors, changing in colour from a muted green to a subtle, beige tint that cushions your complexion with an array of ultra-nourishing ingredients. The Cicapair Tiger Grass Re.Pair Serum harnesses inflammation-battling centella asiatica mixed with a strengthening botanical complex to not only soothe your skin but also accelerate the healing process and bolster the protective barrier of your skin. The Cicapair Tiger Grass Re.Pair Cream delivers a dose of ultra-nourishing moisture, with its soft and buttery texture sinking seamlessly into skin to ease discomfort and irritation via a cushioning layer of hydration.
how_to_use: Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment (15ml): After moisturising, dab a small amount evenly across face and blend. The cream will change from green to beige as you massage it onto skin, evening out skin tone. Cicapair Tiger Grass Re.Pair Serum (5ml): Apply 1-2 pumps on clean skin, morning and night. Cicapair Tiger Grass Re.Pair Cream (10ml): After applying serum, apply a moderate amount onto irritated skin. Press cream in with warmth of hands to allow for maximum absorption.

name: Byoma Creamy Jelly Cleanser Refill 175ml
description: Are you ready for this jelly? The ultra hydrating BYOMA Jelly Cleanser gently and effectively breaks down dirt, debris, excess oil and makeup whilst keeping your precious skin barrier intact. Already well-versed in this skin saviour but in need of a top up? Simply keep your colourful container and stock up on the refill instead of chucking it all out. In true BYOMA fashion, this jelly cleanser is of course infused with a unique blend of barrier boosting tri-ceramide complexes paired with antioxidant-rich licorice root and green tea extract. These hero ingredients deeply nourish your skin without compromising on the undeniable glowing results. Its easy ‘just-add-water’ instructions transform this super lightweight, pH balanced formula into a rich, creamy lather that gets rid of all the gunk and junk which threaten to clog pores without stripping away any moisture in the process. A whopping, full-sized brightly packaged bottle with an endless supply of skin-loving goodies that’ll surely stand out in your bathroom cabinet. No need to worry about your skin feeling tight and dry after a deep cleanse making this daily, one-step cleanser universally effective for all skin types in the AM and PM.
how_to_use: Massage 1-2 pumps onto damp skin in slow circular motions and rinse off with warm water. Can be used alone or as the second step in a double cleanse routine. Once you run out, replenish your stock with a refill pod.
ingredient: Aqua, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Cocamide Methyl MEA, Sodium Lauryl Sulfoacetate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Propylene Glycol, Glycerin, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Ceramide NP, Cholesterol, Phytosphingosine, Stearic Acid, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Oleic Acid, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Butylene Glycol, Allantoin, Decyl Glucoside, Lactic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Phenoxyethanol.

name: CeraVe Micellar Cleansing Water with Niacinamide & Ceramides for All Skin Types 295ml
description: Effortlessly remove make up and dirt in one fell swoop — without leaving your skin calling out for hydration — CeraVe’s Micellar Cleansing Water is gentle, effective and nourishing. Tick, tick, tick! This hardworking formula leaves your complexion feeling clean and refreshed, without having to resort to the rubbing or scrubbing that can leave your skin’s all-important moisture barrier compromised. Speaking of your skin barrier, as with all CeraVe superheroes at the core of this cleansing water is a cocktail of three essential ceramides (they’re the lipids that essentially act as the ‘glue’ of your skin barrier ensuring it stays strong). Flooding your skin with these ceramides helps to keep that skin barrier in tip-top health, helping to maintain moisture levels even while cleansing your skin. CeraVe’s unique ‘MVE Technology’ means you get even more from these ceramides; it ensures they’re gradually released over time to ensure long-lasting nourishment and hydration. To help calm, balance and purify skin further, you’ll also find complexion-soothing niacinamide.
how_to_use: Shake well, then saturate a cotton or re-usable pad To remove eye makeup: Hold over closed eyes for a few seconds, then gently wipe without harsh rubbing. To cleanse skin and remove face makeup: Gently wipe over skin until completely free of makeup and impurities. There’s no need to rinse. Suitable for use morning and evening.
ingredient: Aqua/ Water, Glycerine, Hexylene, Glycol, Poloxamer184, Disodium Cocoamphoacetate, Disodium EDTA, Niacinamide, Polyaminopropyl Biguanide, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, BHT, Ceramide NP, Phenoxyethanol, Ceramide AP, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Xanthan Gum, Carbomer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Ceramide EOP. (Code F.I.L. D215352/1).

name: CeraVe Blemish Control Gel Moisturiser with 2% Salicylic Acid & Niacinamide for Blemish-Prone Skin 40ml
description: Take control of unexpected breakouts and stubborn blackheads with the lightweight Blemish Control Gel moisturiser jam-packed with just the right amount of exfoliating acids. Designed to be applied all over or on specific areas for targeted use, this fast-absorbing moisturiser infuses 2% salicylic acid to banish blemishes and control oil plus lactic and glycolic acid to refine skin texture and unclog pores. In one clinical study, 52 people saw their blackheads appear reduced by up to 45% and spots up to 33% in just four weeks and eight weeks, respectively! As with all CeraVe creations, we can count on this formula to include their three must-have ceramides and niacinamide to lock in moisture and keep our skin barrier in tip-top shape.
how_to_use: Cleanse the skin thoroughly before applying this product, we recommend using CeraVe Blemish Control Cleanser. Recommended for evening use. Use applicator to dispense product onto fingers. Apply all over face for general application or use as a targeted treatment on affected areas. Apply CeraVe Blemish Control Gel in the evening and always follow with SPF protection in the day time. To prevent from over-drying the skin, start with one application every couple of days and then build up to daily usage or twice a day. If dryness or peeling occurs, reduce application to once a day or every other day. Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha-hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Glycerin, Sodium Hydroxide, Glycolic Acid, Lactic Acid, Salicylic Acid, Niacinamide, Ceramide Np, Ceramide Ap, Ceramide Eop, Carbomer, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Triethyl Citrate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Cholesterol, Chlorphenesin, Disodium Edta, Hydroxypropyl Guar, Caprylyl Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Phytosphingosine, Benzoic Acid (Code F.I.L. D271240/1).

name: CeraVe Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum 30ml
description: Designed to fit seamlessly into your skin care routine (we advise using it after your cleansing and treatment steps, before your moisturiser), the Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum is formulated to drench your skin with much-need moisture. With a lightweight gel-cream consistency, this hardworking serum can be used alone, layered under moisturiser or as a make up base to boost your radiance. The star of the show is, of course, hyaluronic acid. This hero ingredient absorbs and holds moisture in the skin, boosting your natural hydration levels for a plumped up, smoother finish. And of course, as with all CeraVe superheroes, at the core of this cleansing water is a cocktail of three essential ceramides (they're the lipids that essentially act as the 'glue' of your skin barrier ensuring it stays strong). Flooding your skin with these ceramides helps to keep that skin barrier in tip-top health, helping to maintain moisture levels even while cleansing your skin. CeraVe's unique 'MVE Technology' means you get even more from these ceramides; it ensures they're gradually released over time to ensure long-lasting nourishment and hydration. To help calm and balance skin further, you'll also find complexion-soothing vitamin B5.
how_to_use: Apply evenly to your face and neck daily. Can be used alone, layered under moisturiser, and even as a makeup base. If contact with your eyes occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.
ingredient: Aqua / Water, Glycerin, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Sodium Hyaluronate, Panthenol, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Ceramide Np, Ceramide Ap, Ceramide Eop, Carbomer, Cetearyl Glucoside, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Cholesterol, Phenoxyethanol, Isopropyl Myristate, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Xanthan Gum, Phytosphingosine, Ethylhexylglycerin.

name: Aesop Lucent Facial Concentrate 60ml
description: With a fresh, uplifting fragrance (there’s just the right amount of rose), Aesop’s Lucent Facial Concentrate is a light, aqueous serum that penetrates deeply to leave your skin ‘plumped’ with a demi-matte finish. A perfect priming base for make up, this soothing treatment is enriched with glycerin – to maintain moisture levels without contributing to congestion – and works to re-establish equilibrium while bolstering cells’ natural defences. Simply massage over clean skin every morning after cleansing before following with your favourite Aesop day cream (depending on your skin type).
how_to_use: Massage half a teaspoon from forehead to neck into cleansed and toned skin. For those with normal to dry skin – and for those dwelling in cold, dry climates – use year-round as a vitamins booster, and follow application with your preferred Aesop hydrator. For those with very oily skin – and for those in humid environments – use as a stand-alone lightweight hydrator.
ingredient: Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Niacinamide, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Bisabolol, Polysorbate 20, Boswellia Carterii Oil, Fusanus Spicatus Wood Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Sodium Carrageenan, Glyceryl Caprylate, Sodium Anisate, Sodium Levulinate, Sea Salt (Maris sal), d-Limonene, Citronellol, Farnesol, Geraniol.

name: The Outset Firming Vegan Collagen Prep Serum 30ml
description: Formulated with a potent mix of skin-loving ingredients, there isn't much this game-changing serum can't do. Think: plump, smooth, firm, protect and nourish. What makes it so powerful? First up, the brand's signature Hyaluroset™ Complex: a botanical alternative to hyaluronic acid, which imparts instant and lasting moisture to the skin. Boosted with vegan collagen, this particular formula has been sustainably created via fermentation so it improves firmness and elasticity while also being kind to the planet. Next, a supercharged line-up of superfood extracts, including brassica napus seedcake to diminish hyperpigmentation and age spots, soothing arnica flower from Mexico, and nourishing black quinoa, which is packed with essential amino acids, vitamins and minerals. In other words, this is the ultimate shot of goodness for your skin. Try alongside The Outset's Gentle Micellar Antioxidant Cleanser and Nourishing Squalane Daily Moisturiser for the full three-step routine.
how_to_use: After cleansing, apply a few pumps of serum and follow with moisturiser.
ingredient: Water (Aqua, Eau), Propanediol, Glycerin, Triheptanoin, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Sodium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Cassia Angustifolia Seed Polysaccharide, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Heterotheca Inuloides Flower Extract, Chenopodium Quinoa Seed Extract, Poncirus Trifoliata Fruit Extract, Hydrolyzed Brassica Napus Seedcake Extract, SR-Hydrozoan Polypeptide-1, Castor Oil/IPDI Copolymer, Diheptyl Succinate, Phenoxyethanol, Dilinoleic Acid/Butanediol Copolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Lysolecithin, Sclerotium Gum, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Pullulan, Xanthan Gum, Jojoba Esters, Silica, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Formate, Sodium Glycolate, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium PCA, Potassium Hydroxide, Potassium Sorbate.

name: Sunday Riley B3 Nice 10% Niacinamide Serum 30ml
description: Harnessing the benefits of skin care’s powerhouse ingredient, The Sunday Riley B3 Nice Serum packs a concentration of 10% niacinamide to target multiple skin concerns. The vitamin B3 derivative works to improve the look of post-acne dark spots and scars, minimise the appearance of enlarged pores, and brighten the skin tone – all while locking in moisture and enhancing radiance (what more could you ask for?). The resveratrol-boosted formula works for all skin types (dry, oily, combination and sensitive), helping to balance the look of excess shine and oil while nourishing the skin’s natural moisture barrier to alleviate visible redness. Rich in antioxidants, this multi-tasking serum promotes an overall balanced-looking complexion.
how_to_use: After cleansing and prepping the skin, apply as many drops as needed to the face, neck and décolleté.

name: Dermalogica Multivitamin Power Serum 22ml
description: Featuring an innovative microencapsulated vitamin complex, this velvety-smooth serum is a multitasking powerhouse with its ability to hydrate, even out skin texture and address the first signs of ageing. A, C and E are the star letters of the vitamin alphabet here as they give this serum the melting quality that sinks into skin, helping to plump up fine lines and reduce the appearance of hyperpigmentation. Reversing the hands of time, protein peptides get to work on minimising sun damage – we’ve all forgotten to top up our SPF at some point! – while improving our skin’s resilience for protection down the line. Lightweight and a dream to apply, expect this revitalising serum to brighten your complexion and become a staple in any youth-boosting routine.
how_to_use: Smooth over cleansed face and neck morning and night after cleansing and toning.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Cyclopentasiloxane, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glyceryl Dibehenate, Tricaprylin, Tribehenin, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Boron Nitride, Nylon-12, Silica, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Hydrogenated Phosphatidyl Choline, Palmitoyl Hexapeptide-14, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Hydrogenated Soybean Oil, Cera Alba, Tocopherol, Retinyl Palmitate, Linoleic Acid, Beta-Sitosterol, Hydroxypinacolone Retinoate, Stearoxymethicone/Dimethicone Copolymer, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Dimethicone, Polysilicone-11, Glyceryl Stearate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Lecithin, Butylene Glycol, Ethoxydiglycol, Limonene.

name: The Ordinary 100% Pycnogenol 5% 15ml
description: Perfect for those wanting to enhance skin hydration and elasticity, The Ordinary’s Pycnogenol 5% binds to collagen and elastin, protecting them from free radical damage and enzymatic degradation. While doing so, this magical antioxidant also scavenges the skin for free radicals before they cause oxidative stress and has the ability to recycle oxidised Vitamin C, restoring its activity.
how_to_use: Apply alone or after water-based serums, before oils or heavier creams. Alternatively, mix with other treatments to enhance their antioxidant capacity. The Ordinary Pycnogenol 5% is free of artificial colours. The formula’s deep red colour is due to the high procyanidin content in Pycnogenol. After application, please wash hands and avoid product contact with light coloured fabric as it may stain.
ingredient: Propanediol, Pinus Pinaster Bark Extract.

name: Medik8 Hydr8 B5 Serum 30ml
description: Harnessing the hero ingredients we all know and love (read: hyaluronic acid and panthenol), Medik8's Hydr8 B5 serum is designed to impart a wave of lasting hydration for a plumping and smoothing effect. Here's your ticket to soft, supple skin! This bestselling formula is crafted with multiple weights of hyaluronic acid - also known as the 'moisture molecule' with its ability to draw and bind moisture to your skin - to ensure the hydration penetrates deep within different layers of your dermis: larger molecules form a veil to continuously feed your upper layers with water and the smaller molecules reach deeper into the skin and draw hydration from the lower layers. What's more, the lightweight yet intensely moisturising serum is also infused with vitamin B5 (a.k.a panthenol) to improve the water retention of your skin, while supporting the natural regenerating process of your cells. As for its other credentials, it's cruelty-free, vegan and free from artificial fragrance and oil. We're obsessed!
how_to_use: After cleansing in the morning and evening, massage 6 drops of Hydr8 B5 across the face, neck and décolletage. Leave to absorb before applying moisturiser. Please note: the visual and product name listed may differ to the packaging received due to product updates across the range. Rest assured, the formula and great results will remain the same.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Calcium Pantothenate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid.

name: Dr. Jart+ Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment 50ml
description: Designed to even tone and perfect your complexion, Dr.Jart+’s Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment neutralises redness and blurs imperfections for a healthy-looking, dewy finish. Looking to try out the Cicapair Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment before you fully commit? The reformulated sized-to-try {15ml} edition is sure to earn your affection! Working to cover blemishes while acting as a physical barrier against damaging environmental aggressors, this formula promises more than just a pretty face. Changing from muted green to a subtle, beige tint, the cream cushions your complexion with an array of ultra-nourishing ingredients. Formulated with a centella asiatica (tiger grass) complex to protect, extracts of resurrection plants (houttuynia cordata and yarrow) to strengthen, and raspberry leaf extract to obscure inflammation, it’s also infused with sodium, potassium, calcium and magnesium to boost moisture and lessen the signs of fatigue, while a blend of minerals and panthenol soothes and hydrates. With a list like that, it's safe to say we're beyond obsessed.
how_to_use: After moisturising, dab a small amount evenly across face and blend. The cream will change from green to beige as you massage it onto skin, evening out skin tone.
ingredient: Aqua, Cyclopentasiloxane, CI 77891, Dimethicone, Caprylyl Methicone, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Glycerin, Lauryl PEG-8 Dimethicone, Octyldodecanol, Phenyl Trimethicone, Triethylhexanoin, Butylene Glycol, Centella Asiatica Extract, Niacinamide, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, 1,2-Hexanediol, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, CI 77491, Glyceryl Tribehenate/Isostearate/Eicosandioate, Magnesium Sulfate, CI 77492, Hydrogenated Coco Glycerides, Stearic Acid, Alumina, Panthenol, Ceresin, CI 77499, Ethylcellulose, Caprylyl Glycol, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, CI 77288, Polyvinyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Madecassoside, Adenosine, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Eryngium Maritimum Callus Culture Filtrate, Glycine Soja Peptide, Streptococcus Thermophilus Ferment, Aluminium Hydroxide, Asiaticoside, Houttuynia Cordata Extract, Ilex Aquifolium Leaf Extract, Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract, Achillea Millefolium Oil, Hedera Helix Extract, Tocopherol, Silica, Calcium Chloride, Asiatic Acid, Madecassic Acid. • Centella Cx: Includes Tiger Grass (Centella Asiatica Extract aka Cica) and its active components, plus four traditional herbs (Fishwort, Holly, Yarrow, and Sea Holly) • Cicabond: Moisture barrier-replenishing complex that includes Arabinogalactan, CaCl2 and MgSO4 and glycerin to care for skin’s moisture barrier • Jartbiome: Dr.Jart's original probiotic ferment ingredient (Streptococcus Thermophilus Ferment) derived from the skin's microbiome

name: Paula's Choice Clear Ultra-Light Daily Hydrating Fluid SPF30+
description: Formulated for oilier, blemish-prone skin types, this featherweight moisturiser keeps skin balanced, healthy and calm – not to mention protected from harmful and ageing UV rays with broad-spectrum SPF30. With a non-greasy fluid consistency, the clever formula mattifies excess shine and minimises the appearance of pores to lend a smooth canvas perfectly primed for make up application or for wearing in its bare, beautiful glory. A blend of vitamin-dense plant extracts – think: green tea, pomegranate and goji among others – add their antioxidant properties to the mix, soothing any upsets, fading red marks and defending against environmental stressors. Perfect for wearing the daytime, this multi-tasking hero comes in both full (60ml) and travel (15ml) sizes – perfect for on-the-go or trialling before investing in the full size.
how_to_use: Apply as the last step in your morning skincare routine. Allow a moment to dry before applying makeup. Allergic to aspirin (acetylsalicylate)? Do not use this product as it contains salicylate derivatives (incl. Homosalate).
ingredient: Aqua, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate (7,5%, Octinoxate, sunscreen), Glycerin (skin replenishing), Ethylhexyl Salicylate (5%, Octisalate, sunscreen), Silica (absorbent), Octocrylene (2%, sunscreen), Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane (2%, Avobenzone, sunscreen), Dimethicone (hydration), Tocopherol (vitamin E/antioxidant), Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract (skin-soothing/calms redness), Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract (antioxidant), Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract (antioxidant), Camellia Oleifera (Green Tea) Leaf Extract (antioxidant), Peucedanum Graveolens (Dill) Extract (antioxidant), Sambucus Nigra (Black Elderberry) Fruit Extract (antioxidant), Avena Sativa (Oat) Bran Extract (skin-soothing), Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Extract (antioxidant), Lycium Barbarum (Goij) Fruit Extract (antioxidant), Hydrogenated Lecithin (skin-restoring), Titanium Dioxide (texture-enhancing), Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer (hydration), Diethylhexyl Syringylidenemalonate (hydration), Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer (texture-enhancing), Xanthan Gum (texture-enhancing), Sodium Carbomer (texture-enhancing), Benzyl Alcohol (preservative), Sodium Benzoate (stabilizer), Potassium Sorbate (stabilizer), Phenoxyethanol (preservative).

name: La Roche-Posay Toleraine Dermo Cleanser 400ml
description: Irritated skin, it’s time to chill and start your routine out with the most comforting cleanse of your life. Taking stripping soaps out of the equation and infusing nourishing surfactants into this creamy cleanser, La Roche-Posay have tested and re-tested this cleansing staple for its efficacy on sensitive, compromised skin. Perfect for your daily cleansing regime, your skin will be left soft and nourished and most importantly, clean, with this glycerin-rich cleansing milk. Now available in this super-sized 400ml bottle so you’re fully stocked and safe to cleanse to your heart’s content.
how_to_use: Apply with fingertips or a cotton pad and massage in. Wipe off using a fresh cotton pad or water.
ingredient: Aqua, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Capryl Glycol.

name: Medik8 Crystal Retinal 1 Serum 30ml
description: With 0.01% Encapsulated Retinaldehyde, also referred to as retinal, the Crystal Retinal 1 is your new hard-working hero serum. Not only does it help to minimise the look of fine lines and wrinkles, it plumps, softens, resurfaces and firms, too. Add hyaluronic acid, vitamin E and glycerin into the prodigious blend, and you have a serum that hydrates skin at every level resulting in a supple complexion without aggravating the skin. A cream-like serum that effortlessly melts into skin, the Crystal Retinal 1 is your new nighttime treat. Providing the same results as retinol but up to 11 times faster, retinal works to boost the production of collagen and elastin for resurfaced and renewed skin. Retinal also triggers cell regeneration, ready for overnight rejuvenation that results in visibly improved skin texture. Encased in a crystal structure that can be broken down by the skins natural enzymes, retinal is easily absorbed, allowing the slow release of vitamin A for minimal irritation as you sleep. Combine this with the hydrating and soothing properties of cult ingredients hyaluronic acid and vitamin E, and youve got a serum that feels just as good as it makes you look. Dont forget the antibacterial properties of retinal too, that directly and powerfully attack acne-causing bacteria for a healthy, clear complexion. Mighty, yet mild, the Crystal Retinal 1 is suitable for sensitive skin or vitamin A newbies who want low strength with power.
how_to_use: After cleansing in the evening, massage a small amount of Crystal Retinal across the face, neck and daccolletage. Allow to absorb before applying your moisturiser. Crystal Retinal application should be phased in gradually, and only use in the evening. Use twice a week for the first 2 weeks, every other night for the next 2 weeks, then every night. Always wear sunscreen the following morning while using this product, and for 1 week after. Consult a doctor if breastfeeding or pregnant. Please note: the visual and product name listed may differ to the packaging received due to product updates across the range. Rest assured, the formula and great results will remain the same.

name: Mario Badescu Spritz. Mist. Glow.
description: Celebrating the fan-favourite formulas that dominate the Instagram feeds of skintellectuals, Mario Badescu's Spritz. Mist. Glow. unites three deluxe facial mists (3 x 118ml) that have intense hydration in common even though they are each crafted to alleviate different skin concerns. Like a welcome wake-up call for tired skin, the cooling Facial Spray with Aloe, Cucumber, and Green Tea is laced with nutrient-rich botanicals, including green tea (a powerful antioxidant!) to cool and quench your skin, leaving it looking refreshed and revitalised. A staple in the collection of MUAs and skin care obsessives alike, the Facial Spray with Aloe, Herbs, and Rosewater revives dehydrated skin, granting instant dewy radiance thanks to its impressive cocktail of herbal and botanical extracts (think: aloe vera, gardenia, rose, bladderwrack and thyme). A must-have for city dwellers, the Facial Spray with Aloe, Chamomile, and Lavender not only delivers a boost of moisture but also harnesses industry-adored antioxidant, vitamin C to combat the damaging effects of free radicals. Add in a helping of lavender oil and soothing botanicals and you have a recipe for calm, balanced and bright skin.
how_to_use: Mist onto face, neck, or hair as needed. Use it to infuse more hydration before or after applying moisturiser, as a pick-me-up on the go or post-makeup application to give skin a dewy finish. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water. Top tip: to give your makeup a dewy finish, spritz your favorite brush or sponge before blending in foundation or concealer. Once you're done, mist your face as a final step to add radiance. For an extra refreshing and cooling boost, store the bottle in your refrigerator.

name: Caudalie Soleil des Vignes Oil Elixir 50ml
description: Why stop at luminous skin, when you can treat your tresses too? Enter Caudalie’s lightweight elixir — designed to give you ultra-soft and smooth results wrapped in a dreamy summer-inspired fragrance. Enriched with a nourishing blend of silky oils (think: prickly pear, grape seed, argan, soft almond and sesame) — this non-greasy formula is your summer secret to glowing skin and hair. It’s infused with the brand’s iconic Soleil des Vignes scent, ready to transport you to sunkissed shores with notes of coconut, orange blossom and jasmine. Choose between the 100ml bottle or a travel-friendly 50ml size. Now to dream about your next holiday destination…
how_to_use: Apply onto dry skin and hair.

name: Medik8 Daily Radiance Vitamin C 50ml
description: Wake up feeling energised, without a cup of coffee: Daily Radiance Vitamin C invigorates skin with its light, silky texture and natural citrus scent to tickle your olfactory senses. Combining mighty antioxidants vitamins C and E with a non-greasy broad spectrum SPF 30, this is your morning must-have. Using tetrahexyldecyl ascorbate (a form of vitamin C that can penetrate deep past skins defensive lipid barrier), the Daily Radiance Vitamin C delivers powerful, age-defying antioxidant protection, shielding you from environmental damage. Perfect for all skin types, Daily Radiance Vitamin C helps to diminish and prevent fine lines and wrinkles with collagen-boosting technology thats complemented with intensely-hydrating hyaluronic acid. Drawing up to 1000 times its weight in water and locking it there, hyaluronic acid is your best bet when it comes to brighter and more even skin. With this in your skin care arsenal, your future self will be sure to thank you.
how_to_use: After cleansing in the morning and using any serums, apply an amount and blend evenly across face, neck and daccolletage. name: Paula's Choice Resist Anti-Ageing Skin Restoring Moisturizer SPF 50
description: A must-have for the summer months, the brand's Resist Skin Restoring Moisturiser SPF50 is a multi-tasking moisturiser that features SPF 50 to protect skin from premature signs of ageing and sun damage, while shea butter leaves skin feeling incredibly soft and hydrated. The youth-preserving yet good-to-skin formula also contains tone-improving ingredients like niacinamide and liquorice root extract for more even-toned and younger-looking skin. What's not to love?
how_to_use: Apply as the last step in your morning skincare routine. Allow a moment to dry before applying makeup. Allergic to aspirin (acetylsalicylate)? Do not use this product as it contains salicylate derivatives (incl. Homosalate).

name: LANEIGE Lip Sleeping Mask Chocolate 20g
description: If you struggle with dry, chapped lips but aren't a fan of lip balms, the Lip Sleeping Mask is here to help as you slumber. Working to gently slough away dead skin cells from the surface of your lips, this formula encourages a smooth, elastic and supple feeling working hard overnight to perfectly prep lips for make up application come morning. Available in six delicious scents: Original berry, Grapefruit, Lemon Sorbet, Sweet Candy Vanilla and Chocolate, each sweet treat of a treatment uses a proprietary Berry Mix Complex, which uses antioxidants like vitamin C to smooth rough lips and protect them from the elements. The brands patented Moisture Wrap technology creates a moisturising layer of beta glucan which is a moisture-slurping humectant that soothes redness as it works with hydro-ion mineral water, evening primrose root extract and Hunza apricot extract all working to deliver lasting hydration too.
how_to_use: Before going to bed at night, apply an adequate amount on the lips using the built-in spatula. The next morning, gently wipe the lips clean with tissue or cotton pad.

name: Charlotte Magic Night Cream 15ml
description: A hard-working night treatment should be an integral part of any skin care kit, and Charlotte's Magic Night Cream is chock-full of essential, skin-nourishing extracts to dispel dullness and recapture a beautiful, luminous glow. With daphne stem cell extract, which cleverly 'binds' cells together to achieve a more youthful complexion, alongside bionymph peptide and retinol to accelerate collagen synthesis and in turn, bolster skin's 'bounce' and resilience, Charlotte's Magic Night Cream also creates a barrier between complexion and the elements; sealing precious moisture into skin while deflecting environmental stresses as you slumber. It's an absolute godsend when flying long-haul. Psst, you can now even replenish the full-sized (50ml) formula with the sustainably minded Charlotte's Magic Night Cream Refill.
how_to_use: Apply to the face and neck in small circular motions working from the centre of the face outwards using your fingertips.

name: Medik8 Crystal Retinal 3 Serum 30ml
description: With four strengths to suit your skins needs (and its tolerance!), Medik8s Crystal Retinal will super-charge your ritual with stable retinaldehyde to stimulate your cells to manufacture precious collagen which bolsters skins resilience and density. Level 3 stars 0.03% encapsulated retinaldehyde and is great for beginners who're dipping their face in the retinol water Retinoic acid is the form of retinol your skin can utilise (currently only available via prescription because of its potency) however, cells convert retinol (vitamin A) into retinaldehyde then retinoic acid with remarkable results its just that they take a bit longer. Thus, by skipping a step in the conversion process and harnessing encapsulated retinaldehyde a revolutionary new form of vitamin A Medik8 speed up the line-smoothing, brightening, firming and dark spot-diminishing process with tangible changes in four weeks of use. With a unique crystal structure that is readily metabolised by enzymes when applied, Crystal Retinal ensures stability and maximum absorption while mitigating risk of irritation. With the radiance-boosting, clarifying and retexturising benefits of retinol (without the scaly side-effects), this fortifies skin overnight and delivers a visible difference 11 times faster than retinol. The addition of plumping and moisture-retaining hyaluronic acid and glycerin, alongside antioxidant vitamin E makes this perfect for those who are keen to embark on their retinol journey.
how_to_use: After cleansing in the evening, massage a small amount of Crystal Retinal across the face, neck and daccolletage. Allow to absorb before applying your moisturiser. Crystal Retinal application should be phased in gradually, and only in the evening. Use twice a week for the first two weeks, every other night for the next two weeks, then every night. Always wear sunscreen the following morning while using this product, and for one week after. Consult a doctor if breastfeeding or pregnant. Please note: the visual and product name listed may differ to the packaging received due to product updates across the range. Rest assured, the formula and great results will remain the same.

name: Medik8 Hydr8 B5 Intense 30ml
description: With everything we love about the original formula - it's silky texture, hydrating effect and supple finish - and an added dose of dewy hydration, the Medik8 Hydr8 B5 Intense effectively replenishes your skin's moisture reserves for immediate and long-lasting quenched skin. Designed to amplify, stimulate and protect the levels of hyaluronic acid within your skin, this serum is the key to sustained hydration. The infusion of Natural Moisturising Factors - sodium PCA, glycerin, urea, proteins, sugars, 15 different amino acids, lactic acid, creatin - is one of most-loved elements of the upgrade: these natural components help to bind water to your skin for ultimate hydration. It's also crafted with biosaccharide gum and multiple weights of hyaluronic acid to ensure that the moisture reaches deep within different layers of your dermis and is held there: soy extract then helps to promote the natural production of hyaluronic acid. Superfood saskatoon berry (the ingredient behind the purple hue) helps to counter the enzymes that break down hyaluronic acid within the skin, while vitamin B5 (a.k.a panthenol) helps to improve the water retention of your skin and support the natural regenerating process of your cells. As for its other credentials, it's cruelty-free, vegan and free from artificial fragrance and alcohol. *Adds to bag*
how_to_use: After cleansing in the morning and evening, massage Hydr8 B5 Intense„ across the face, neck and daccolletage. If using in the morning, leave to absorb before applying moisturiser and sunscreen. For overnight rejuvenation, after Hydr8 B5 Intense has absorbed into your skin, follow up with your vitamin A serum or moisturiser. name: Versed Press Restart Gentle Retinol Serum 30ml
description: The ultimate intro for those who’re beginning their ‘retinol journey’ (or those with an easily upset complexion), Versed’s Press Restart Gentle Retinol Serum is here to prolong your cells’ health. A time-defying active that rejuvenates your cells to keep them making all the ‘scaffolding’ (the elastin and collagen) that keeps skin smooth and ‘springy’, retinol defies the signs of time and helps to stall your creeping crow’s feet. Combining natural alternatives to retinol – arophira and bakuchiol – alongside encapsulated retinol itself, this works to stimulate your skin without the side-effects, so you can reap the benefits (smoother, refined, plumped and luminous skin) without the reactivity or redness. With the addition of anti-inflammatories and antioxidants to buffer your complexion from aggressors while diminishing the risk of skin rebelling, this ultra-light serum is quickly absorbed to protect and revitalise every complexion. And if that’s not incentive enough to embark on your retinol love affair, this silky treatment is vegan, cruelty-free and green (as in, actually green).
how_to_use: HOW: Smooth two pumps into clean, almost-dry skin. Let it sink in for one minute before your next skinc are move. WHERE: Face and neck. Bonus points for chest. Be careful when applying to the eye area to avoid getting product in your eyes. WHEN: Every evening after cleansing. Use alone or between lighter serums and moisturiser. GOOD TO KNOW: Retinol speeds up skin cell turnover. Protect those fresh, new skin cells by wearing sunscreen daily. Use within 12 months once opened, or keep it on your vanity unopened for up to two years.

name: Jordan Samuel Skin The Performance Eye Gel
description: Debuting a calming and correcting treatment for your eye contours, Jordan Samuel Skin’s The Performance Eye Gel is the perfect hydrating and illuminating pick-me-up. Like a stern yet loving maître de ballet, this nourishing formula coaches even the most hungover, shadowed eyes towards a radiant and plump finish. Suitable for all skin types, the transparent gel harnesses a medley of replenishing ingredients - from peptides to golden chamomile - to revive the look of dull, crepey under-eyes. Green tea extract helps to soothe your skin and improve the look of sun-damaged skin, while antioxidant-rich caffeine is employed to help boost the microcirculation under your eye (take that dark shadows) and glycerin’s humectant properties work to deliver a soft and supple finish. Now you're ready to take centre stage!
how_to_use: Apply a small amount around the eye area to help hydrate and add radiance. Circle all around the orbital bone to make sure all areas are hydrated. If the product enters the eye, wash out thoroughly with plenty of clean water.

name: Weleda Skin Food Lip Butter 8ml
description: Transforming dry, chapped lips with its deeply nourishing formula, Weleda's Skin Food Lip Balm forms a lightweight veil of moisture that relieves and protects your skin. Don't let dryness deter you from smiling; this intensely nourishing balm calls upon botanical extracts, natural oil and waxes to soothe and replenish your lips. The conditioning blend fuses sunflower seed oil with rosemary, calendula and chamomile extracts to deliver a plush, supple finish. Not only does it protect your lips from drying out, but it also creates a protective barrier against environmental factors - like harsh, cold weather or dry indoor air. Think: everyday beauty staple.
how_to_use: Squeeze a little onto your finger or directly onto lips and smooth in gently.

name: LANEIGE Water Bank Blue Hyaluronic Gel Moisturiser 50ml
description: Perfect for every day (and night!) use, this cream-gel moisturiser seals the deal on glowing skin with a jam-packed formula of hydrating heroes that will see you through the next 48 hours. Continuing to prove that hydration doesn’t need to come packaged as a rich cream, this lightweight moisturiser’s star ingredient is hyaluronic acid – but not as you know it! The ‘blue’ in the name refers to a form of hyaluronic acid that is fermented with deep sea algae, which has a low molecular weight. Translation? A swipe of this good stuff allows intense moisture to penetrate deep into the skin. Thanks to mint extract, you don’t have to worry about any residue or greasy feeling left on your skin, instead, the finish is fresh and as with any Laneige offering, glowing.
how_to_use: Apply evenly to face AM & PM after cleansing, toning, and serum.

name: Paula's Choice Resist Super-Light Daily Wrinkle Defense SPF30 (60ml)
description: A youth-boosting moisturiser suitable for oily, combination and blemish-prone skin, this lightweight formula is bound to become a firm favourite in your evening routine. Absorbing excess oil, it grants a soft matte finish with a sheer light tint – perfect for priming skin for make up. Also in the mix are a hardworking blend of antioxidants which combine to calm irritation, promote a more youthful complexion and protect against the harmful, ageing effects of free radicals. The formula also protects against the sun’s UVA and UVB rays, using mineral sunscreen zinc oxide – a gentle alternative to chemical sunscreens that’s suitable for easily upset, sensitive complexions. What’s not to love?
how_to_use: Apply as the last step in your morning skincare routine. Allow a moment to dry before applying makeup.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Charlotte's Magic Lip Oil Crystal Elixir
description: Meet the does-it-all treatment your lips have been looking for. Melding the results of a serum with the comfort of an oil, Charlotte’s Magic Lip Oil Crystal Elixir grants beautifully plush, soft lips. Overflowing with good-to-skin ingredients, this supercharged oil doubles as a glossy, smoothing conditioner by day and a deeply nourishing lip mask by night. Hyaluronic acid delivers optimum hydration for up to 24 hours while organic aloe vera (rich in vitamins A and C, antioxidants and enzymes!) helps to condition your kisses. A clever blend of plant extracts – from snow lotus and resurrection leaf to alpine rose and swertian leaf – helps to lock in moisture, smooth and diminish the look of fine lines. The magic doesn’t stop there: its five-oil blend replenishes dry and cracked lips for a silky soft and smooth finish.
how_to_use: Before your first use, gently squeeze the tube to let the oil flow into the crystal roller ball. Roll over the lips throughout the day or wear as an overnight conditioner.

name: Wishful Honey Whip Peptide Moisturizer
description: Introducing Wishful's Honey Whip Peptide Moisturizer, a extension of the Honey Moisturiser range, this boasts a blend of manuka honey, cica, peptides and collagen to help firm, lift, repair and plump the skin, as well as reduce redness and even out your complexion. Loaded with powerful natural extracts and potent actives, this rich yet ultra-lightweight whipped cream moisturiser is here to help to firm, lift, repair and plump the skin, as well as reduce redness and even out your complexion. Formulated with Manuka honey, a super moisturising ingredient packed with antioxidant properties, this luxe cream will help smooth, soften, soothe and calm the skin while cica soothes and reduces redness. Last but not least, the infusion of peptides and ceramides are key to youthful-looking, firm, and plump skin as they help to firm, lift and reduce fine lines, encouraging skin cell turnover and create fresh collagen.

name: Peace Out Retinol Eye Stick 4g
description: Looking for a hassle-free way to essentially press out fine lines and wrinkles around your eyes? Enter Peace Out’s slide-and-glide Retinol Stick — here to smooth out your complexion and restore long-lost hydration and elasticity. Like an eraser for signs of ageing, this easy-to-use stick treats and hydrates to reveal supple and plump skin around the eye area. Formulated with moisture-boosting squalane (the secret to bouncy, glowing skin) alongside a firming power peptide complex, this magic product also stars encapsulated retinol to gently blur and soften the appearance of wrinkles. And if all that wasn’t enough — the cute pink packaging is enough to make us obsessed.
how_to_use: After your nightly cleanse, glide Retinol Eye Stick around the entire eye area. Be sure not to tug on delicate skin. For an extra smooth application, warm it up to swipe like a pro! Start on the outer edge of the eye and apply in small, circular motions before full application. Sensitive skin? Use once a week to allow skin to adjust to the retinol.

name: Avène Cicalfate+ Restorative Protective Cream 100ml
description: Acting as a film-like layer over the skin, Avène’s Cicalfate+ Restorative Protective Cream nourishes and soothes easily irritated skin prone to dryness, helping to protect it from external aggressors. Combining Avène’s Thermal Spring Water – for a surge of soothing moisture – with [C-Restore]™ (a post-biotic biotechnological patented active ingredient derived from Aqua Dolomiae), the barrier-replenishing cream helps to minimise feelings of discomfort and dryness for up to 48 hours. Topped with clarifying copper sulphate and zinc sulphate, the fragrance-free formula is suitable for the whole family.
how_to_use: Apply cream to the irritated area, massaging gently.

name: Lanolips 101 Ointment Multi-Balm - Strawberry 10g
description: A delicious reinvention of {The Original 101 Ointment}, Lanolips 101 Ointment Fruities are available in four ‘flavours’, each boasting its own good-to-skin benefits. There’s ‘Green Apple’, a vitamin and antioxidant-rich formula that naturally deflects harmful environmental elements and pollutants, ‘Strawberry’, which helps to slough away dead skin cells and reveal healthy, new skin thanks to the key addition of alpha-hydroxy acids; ‘Peach’, which helps to revive skin with its combination of vitamins and polyunsaturated fatty acids, ‘Coconutter’, which is boosted with vitamin E and is rich in antioxidants to make it ultra-hydrating and, finally, 'Watermelon', which is boosted with vitamin E and watermelon fruit extract to intensely hydrate. Each one is formulated with Ultra Medical Grade lanolin, which resembles and mimics your own skin oils to restore moisture unlike anything else and holds 200% of its weight in moisture. Vegetarian, baby-friendly and free from any nasties, this is basically a no brainer!
how_to_use: Warm the ointment between fingers or apply directly onto the lips and skin. Use generously and keep below 25°c.

name: Paula's Choice Pro-Collagen Peptide Booster 20ml
description: Meet the Pro-Collage Multi-Peptide Booster - aka the new power player in your skincare routine. This targeted treatment is packed with 6 of the best peptides, which work at lightning speed to keep your skin looking plump, healthy and youthful. So what exactly are peptides? They're short chains of amino acids that act as building blocks of proteins including collagen, elastin and keratin. Collectively, they work fast to penetrate the upper layers of the skin, activating in areas that help to visibly boost tone, hydration and suppleness - and all with long-term results. This formula also contains hyaluronic acid to keep the complexion hydrated and supple, which works beautifully alongside amino acids to strengthen and maintain the skin's overall health. We also love that its lightweight and silky gel texture absorbs straight away - no sticky residue here.
how_to_use: Apply a pearl-sized amount once or twice daily to face, eye area and neck after cleansing, toning and exfoliating. For daytime, follow with SPF 30+.

name: Sunday Riley C.E.O. Glow Vitamin C + Turmeric Face Oil 35ml
description: Unlike most vitamin C products, which only treat the upper levels of skin, this beautifully glow-giving concoction stars oil-soluble vitamin C carried by superfood oils to reach the deepest levels of skin and impart the brightest, most hydrated glow possible. The formula stars THD Ascorbate, a gentle and powerful free radical-fighting lipid soluble form of vitamin C that stays stable in oxygen and water. THD Ascorbate at 3% is considered a quasi-drug in Japan for its brightening powers and skin-stimulating benefits. Alongside this, golden turmeric oil (extracted from the roots) is ideal for boosting skin’s radiance and making its tone more even. These potent stars are balanced by calming evening primrose, antioxidant-powered ginger root extract, age-defying bisabolol, vitamin A-rich red raspberry seed oil, neroli and vitamin-rich jojoba. Quickly-absorbing, Sunday Riley’s C.E.O. Glow Oil sinks in and delivers a healthy-looking lustre.
how_to_use: Massage 2-3 drops as needed into face, neck and décolletage. Can be blended or layered with any face product.

name: The INKEY List Collagen Peptide Serum 30ml
description: They say you only miss things once they’re gone and, sadly, our love for collagen (the natural skin protein that helps to support skin’s firmness, suppleness and elasticity) tends to appear only once we realise its production has begun to slow down – sob. A perfect antidote to this sorry state of affairs, THE INKEY LIST’s Collagen Serum stars clever peptides called Matrixyl 3000 and Syn Tacks, which mimic the effect of natural collagen, keeping your skin looking plumper and smoother for longer. The formula also helps to boost collagen production, so your skin will look increasingly firm and supple in the long run too. Minimising the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and targeting sagging, this skin-boosting potion is like an elixir of youth for your complexion.

name: La Roche-Posay Lipikar Balm Apbiome 400ml
description: Pioneers in microbiome science, La Roche-Posay is here to rescue compromised barriers from itching, dryness and eczema flare-ups with this triple-action balm. Rebalancing the microbiome is an exclusive AP+M technology (Aqua Posae + Microresyl) that reduces the frequency of uncomfortable dry skin flare-ups. Adding in anti-irritation ‘Thermal Spring Water’, barrier-boosting niacinamide, 8% hydrating glycerin and 20% nourishing shea butter, this is doing the most for dry and sore skin. We’re just about ready to bathe in this calming skin soother!

name: Drunk Elephant A-Shaba Complex Eye Serum 15ml

Enter: the A-Shaba Complex Eye Serum, an elasticity-boosting formula that minimises the look of fine lines whilst encouraging collagen production. Turn around brighter eyes... Powered by a gentle but hardworking dose of 0.1% pure vegan retinol, skin-plumping copper peptides, 3% caffeine and texture-smoothing niacinamide, this youth-preserving formula targets visible signs of ageing, puffiness and forms a protective shield against further environmental damage with just one pump!

name: Drunk Elephant Beste No. 9 Jelly Cleanser (Various Sizes)
description: Were so ready for this jelly (cleanser) Free from nasties and brimming with non-stripping goodness, the innovative Beste No. 9 Jelly Cleanser unites a blend of mild cleansers and make up-dissolving emollients to rinse away every impurity while leaving skin soft and smooth. Coconut-based surfactants (rich in fatty acids) work together to create a rich foam that effectively dissolves even stubborn make up, sunscreen and oils; virgin marula oil, high in critical antioxidants and omegas 6 and 9, boosts the cleansing power; glycerin helps to replenish hydration levels and, finally, antioxidant-rich cantaloupe fruit extract soothes and hydrates. Available in two different sizes and boasting a non-stripping pH level of 5.5, Drunk Elephant considers this ideal for all skin types (its also vegan!) so get ready for your skin to feel clean and supremely soft, whatever phase it's going through...
how_to_use: Squeeze into palm and gently massage over wet or dry skin. Add water to lather. Rinse well and pat dry. Use nightly or in alternation with the other Drunk Elephant cleansers.

name: Dr.Jart+ Ceramidin Cream 50ml
description: Giving a bounce boost to tight, dry skin, Dr.Jart+’s Ceramidin Cream delves deep into your dermal layer to deliver intense moisture, while strengthening and protecting your skin. The rich-textured cream is effortlessly absorbed by your skin for immediate hydration. At the heart of the formula is a clever five-ceramide complex that supplements and supports the ceramides that exist in your skin; empowering the protective layer of your skin, these ceramides improve moisture retention and accelerate ceramide production for longer lasting hydration. To soothe and restore the irritation and uncomfortable roughness that comes from a depleted skin barrier, this cream also calls upon bidifida ferment lysate, beetroot and hyaluronic acid to impart added intense moisture. The result? Comfortable and hydrated skin that looks and feels more flexible. Perfect for day and night, this wears seamlessly beneath make up and delivers dewy moisture come morning. Now available in the original (50ml) and a travel size (15ml), it's easier than ever to introduce this thirst-quenching formula into your routine.
how_to_use: Apply morning and night on clean, dry skin to deeply moisturise.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Charlotte's Magic Eye Rescue Refill
description: Running low on the eye-conic formula? Replenish your stores with Charlotte's Magic Eye Rescue Refill: a sustainably minded pod that cuts down on single-use plastic. Reparative and protective, this replenishing cream has an instant skin-smoothing and 'lifting' effect — ideal for disguising signs of a too-late night — while the inclusion of moisturising coconut oil and shea butter helps to lock in precious moisture to restore skin's 'bounce' and softness. Charlotte's Magic Eye Rescue dramatically enhances elasticity and firmness with a cocktail of cell-energising winter daphne stem cell extract, rice and soy peptides, saccharide isomerate and free radical-fighting vitamins A, C and E — all alongside a proprietary 'botanical eye contour complex' that works to increase 'stretch', resilience and density for younger-looking eyes.
how_to_use: Step 1: Apply the Charlotte's Magic Eye Rescue to your ring fingers and gently dot under the eyes on the top of the cheekbones. Step 2: Gently tap above the eyes across the brow bones. Repeat the tapping in a circular movement around the eyes to help reduce puffiness. Step 3: Continue to tap gently under the eyes and across the tops of the cheekbones for a few seconds to allow the cream to work its magic for a wide-eyed, youthful effect.

name: Medik8 Press and Glow Tonic Refill 200ml
description: A toner but with a twist, the Medik8 Press & Glow gently exfoliates, resurfaces, hydrates and smooths without irritating sensitive complexions, drying or leaving any sticky residue. Utilising intelligent poly hydroxy acids (PHAs from here on out), larger molecules penetrate the skin less deeply than with popular AHAs and BHAs – two acids that can often lead to sensitisation and premature ageing when overused. This is why the Press & Glow is a safe bet for even sensitive skin, as the PHAs simply exfoliate the skin’s surface while working as a mighty moisture magnet. Meanwhile, comforting aloe vera helps to reduce irritation while also protecting against free radicals and encouraging moisture retention. Prickly pear extract works as an enzyme activator – encouraging cell renewal and therefore helping to bestow you with the ultimate glow, all while diminishing the look of fine lines. A truly formidable cocktail, this toner packs a powerful punch… gently. With sustainable 200ml refills also available, this skin care hero is good for both your face and the planet.
how_to_use: Twist the top half of the pump anti-clockwise until it clicks to activate. After cleansing in the morning and evening, hold a reusable cotton pad firmly over Press & Glow and push down 3-4 times. Sweep the pad over the complexion, avoiding the delicate eye area. Twist the pump clockwise until it clicks to avoid leakage. Always do a patch test before first use. For Press & Glow Refill, transfer the pump saved from your previous Press & Glow bottle onto the Press & Glow Refill. Please note: the visual and product name listed may differ to the packaging received due to product updates across the range. Rest assured, the formula and great results will remain the same.

name: innisfree Intensive Hydrating Cream with Green Tea Seed 50ml
description: Lightweight and delectably-soft, the Intensive Hydrating Cream with Green Tea Seed is a day and night moisturiser that keeps your skin barrier in tip-top shape and floods skin with long-lasting hydration, quenching desert-like thirst. Hailing all the way from Korea’s Jeju Island, the green tea seed oil and extracts used in the ‘Fresh Green Tea Water 2.0’ technology is packed with 16 minerals and amino acids to nourish your skin barrier and add buckets of moisture for that enviable glowy-skin look. Enveloping dry skin in a veil of hydration, the ‘Dual-Moisture-Rising technology’ strengthens the lipid barrier and maintains hydration levels so your skin is protected way beyond application. Doubling as a make up base, this non-greasy moisturiser is just the kind of skin care staple you’ve been searching for.
how_to_use: Use as a day cream in the morning and as a night cream in the evening on clean and dry skin. Apply a coin-sized amount of cream over the face and neck (from the centre of the face), after using the Intensive Hydrating Green Tea Serum.

name: Dr.Jart+ Ceramidin Cream Mist
description: A supercharged pick-me-up for dry and flaky skin, Dr.Jart+’s Ceramidin Cream Mist bestows a wealth of lasting hydration from the very first spritz. Empowered by a complex of five(!) ceramides (nourishing components essential for your skin’s protective layer), this mist encourages healthy, comfortable hydration and the repair of damaged skin. This formula goes up against textured and sensitive complexions with a blend of xylitol and flower extracts enhancing moisture retention and strengthen the skin’s barrier by preventing water loss. Suitable for your face and body, this comforting complex grants the dewiest of glows. Simply spritz over freshly cleansed skin for a hydrating tone; to set and soften make up; as an after-bath body mist; and to moisturise on the move.
how_to_use: Close eyes and mist over entire face, as needed. May also be used as a toner after cleansing, over make up through the day and as a pick-me-up for thirsty skin.

description: Impressively hydrating — and with the skin-perfecting power of some exceptionally effective ingredients — Vitamin C+Lactic Oil-Free Radiant Moisturizer floods skin with moisture while revealing smoother, brighter and healthier skin. In this lightweight, oil-free formula you'll find two hero ingredients: vitamin C, which works to protect against the impact of free radical damage and reduce the appearance of fine lines, dullness and hyperpigmentation; and lactic acid, an AHA which helps to boost cellular renewal, unclog pores and increase your glow. Of course, there are also a couple of skin-strengthening ingredients thrown in for good measure too! Think: balancing niacinamide and moisture barrier-repairing squalane.

name: Dr.Jart+ Dermask Water Jet Vital Hydra Solution 27g
description: Would you describe your skin as constantly parched? Enter Dr.Jart+ and his must-have Dermask Water Jet Vital Hydra Solution. Saturated in niacinamide, gluthathione and a-bisabolol, this antioxidant-rich formula will impart radiance to lacklustre complexions in no time at all. Made from microfibre, this easy-to-apply mask enables the active ingredients to penetrate deeply and deliver noticeable results. Aquaxyl and xylitol enhance moisture retention and strengthen the skin's barrier by preventing water loss while oligo-hyaluronic acid and algae extract support long-lasting moisturisation and support natural collagen synthesis to keep skin looking and feeling hydrated and completely refreshed.

name: Smile Makers - Generous Gel 30ml
description: Did you know that over 80% of women experience pain during sex due to vaginal dryness? Enter Generous Gel Lubricant. A premium upgrade from the previous garish lubricants, for this can be used in any situation, from solo sessions with your favourite climax-inducing vibrator or for love moments with your partner. Housed in a sleek, fragrance-esque tube, you won't feel embarrassed if this slips out of your handbag or is displayed pride of place this alongside your favourite perfumes or skin care products. Like all Smile Makers, this Generous Gel Lubricant is water-based making it condom and sex toy compatible, easier to wash and is unanimously recommended by gynaecologists. But that's not it, this also used just seven pharma-grade ingredients that are skin-regenerating and anti-irritants as well as being fragrance and paraben-free - making it 100% safe to use in and around the vagina even if you have sensitive skin!

name: LANEIGE Radian-C Cream 30ml
description: So good that LANEIGE refers to it as the 'Vitamin Illuminator', the Radian-C Cream is powered by vitamins C and E to deliver extremely bright results. If your skin is regularly exposed to stress (read: you're often glued to a screen, working long hours or enjoying outdoor activities), then you might notice your complexion beginning to look dull and tired. That's where this vitamin smoothie comes in, with its antioxidants and patented Melasolv working to even patchy tone and reduce the look of blemishes. Deeply penetrative and providing extreme levels of moisture, this radiance-boosting elixir even calms skin – making it ideal for sensitive complexions. It balances moisture levels in irritated skin barriers, reduces the look of dullness by a whopping 30% in as little as two weeks, reduces redness, firms skin and protects you from environmental aggressors with a swathe of antioxidants.

name: Medik8 Advanced Day Ultimate Protect SPF50+ 50ml
description: A 360˚ cream to protect and replenish, Medik8’s Advanced Day Ultimate Protect SPF50+ deflects the harmful impact of the sun and daily stressors to delay the common signs of passing time. With broad spectrum SPF 50+ PA++++, alongside a pollution shield, anti-blue light and anti-A.G.E. technologies, this cream creates a barrier between skin and the perils of modern existence. A.G.E.’s – an acronym for advanced glycation end-products – are the product of sugar that binds with the proteins (elastin and collagen) that keep the skin supple, resulting in lines, sagging and lost elasticity. Carnosine helps to prevent the skin-ageing effects of these sugars, while blueberry seed oil protects against blue light and marrubium vulgare extract – a next-generation antioxidant – creates a ‘parasol’ that works to ward against the elemental onslaught. Great under make up, consider this your ultimate ‘skinsurance’ policy.
how_to_use: As the last step in your skincare routine, apply a liberal amount (¼ teaspoon) of Advanced Day Ultimate Protect to the face, adding more for the neck and décolletage, avoiding the eye area. Use light, upward strokes and allow to absorb. Reapply throughout the day as needed, and every 2 hours if in direct sunlight. Perfect for layering over your favourite Medik8 vitamin C serum.

name: SUMMER FRIDAYS Dream Oasis Deep Hydration Serum 30ml
description: Use this serum alone or before moisturising to amp up hydration for skin that is parched and ready for a new lease of life. This jelly-like serum boasts such an abundance of moisturising-attracting properties, where do we start?! Let's look at the stars first: squalane and hyaluronic acid. Known for their deeply hydrating properties, both produce that instant dewy effect we love to see whilst penetrating deep for long-lasting hydration. Add the humectant glycerin, which attracts water, to the mix and you're even protected against environmental aggressors. Speaking of the environment, when your skin is feeling roughed up and irritated, this superserum can help to calm with its blend of oatmeal, and aloe - we told you there was a lot to get through!

description: One of our favourite purse-friendly launches, this jar of DetoxifEYE Depuffing Eye Patches (each container holds 30 pairs) revives, refreshes and rehydrates the delicate eye area for visibly smoother, soothed and fortified skin. Simply use the enclosed spatula to lift and apply each hydrogel patch to the under-eye area and leave for 10 minutes while the potent concoction works its magic. Formulated with hyaluronic acid to give an instant surge of moisture that in turn plumps and smooths skin and fine lines, caffeine helps to depuff and diminish the appearance of dark circles while a host of hard-working plant extracts help to energise and refresh skin – perfect for your morning skin care routine. For extra soothing qualities, keep these in your fridge – you can thank us later!

Leave on for 10 min. and discard after use. Gently pat remaining serum into skin. Do not wash off. Use daily, or as often as needed. Use chilled for extra depuffing effect.

Infusing the brand's signature Thermal Spring Water blend with 5% panthenol, relieve tight, dry and cracked skin with this non-greasy and ultra-nourishing balm. Using the most minimal of ingredients, this multi-purpose balm uses glycerin to hydrate skin and cicaplast to replenish vitamins and amino acids, seeing your skin to a healthier place. Whether it's for repairing broken skin post-injury or for areas on your body that need a little more TLC, keep this skin staple close and you'll never look back...

name: CeraVe Foaming Cleanser with Niacinamide for Normal to Oily Skin 236ml
description: Perfect for sensitive, normal to oily, or blemish-prone skin, CeraVe’s gentle Foaming Cleanser washes away the day and deeply cleanses skin — without leaving it feeling dry or dehydrated. In fact, this hardworking cleanser will actually help to promote a healthier and more hydrated complexion by repairing and supporting your skin’s moisture barrier. This gel-like texture turns to a soft foam when powered up with water, leaving your skin feeling refreshed and purified. As with all CeraVe superheroes, at the core of this cleanser is a cocktail of three essential ceramides (lipids that are essentially the ‘glue’ of your skin barrier). Flooding your skin with these ceramides helps to keep that skin barrier in tip-top health, helping to maintain moisture levels even while cleansing your skin. CeraVe’s unique ‘MVE Technology’ means you get even more from these ceramides; it ensures they’re gradually released over time to ensure long-lasting nourishment and hydration. Worried about sensitivity? This does-it-all formula is fragrance-free and hypoallergenic too.
