name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios UVMune 400 Invisible Fluid SPF50+ Sun Cream 50ml
description: Stay safe in the sun without streaking thanks to this invisible finish SPF. Housed in a non-greasy and fragrance-free formula, this is the skin-friendly SPF we want on our complexion through every season. Give your skin the protection it deserves with the Anthelios UVMune 400 Invisible Fluid SPF 50+ Sun Cream. Sensitive skin can rest assured this has been endlessly tested for its mildness on the skin, and with UVA, UVB and Ultra Long UVA protection your skin has never felt more safe. We’ll take a lifetime supply!
how_to_use: For daily usage and sun exposition. Shake before use. Apply the sunscreen product just before exposure. Re-apply frequently and generously to maintain protection, especially after perspiring or towelling.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Alcohol Denat., Triethyl Citrate, Diisopropyl Sebacate, Silica, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Glycerin, Propanediol, C12-22 Alkyl Acrylate/Hydroxyethylacrylate Copolymer, Sodium Citrate, Methoxypropylamino Cyclohexenylidene Ethoxyethylcyanoacetate, Perlite, Tocopherol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Drometrizole Trisiloxane, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Terephthalylidene Dicamphor Sulfonic Acid, Triethanolamine, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate.

name: Kitsch Ice Facial Roller
description: We're all partial to the old cold teaspoon trick for puffy eyes, and trending tools like the gua sha for defining your contours, so it makes sense that Kitsch's Ice Roller is no exception! Your next at-home facial essential, this tool is made with high quality surgical stainless steel to rejuvenate overworked skin. Designed to be kept in the fridge, it provides a cooling treatment that's thought to help de-puff and brighten the under-eye area; calm inflammation and redness from breakouts, sunburns and shaving; aid in firming skin and revealing a more youthful complexion; promote healthy blood circulation and lymphatic drainage; plus, help to alleviate sore muscles, tension and headaches.
how_to_use: Recommended daily use for the best results. Store in the fridge. Roll over the face, neck and jawline, working to the outer edges.
ingredient: 75% ABS,15% 304 Stainless Ssteel,10% Watercraft Resin.

name: RANAVAT Radiant Rani Saffron Brightening Serum 30ml
description: Infused with a potent blend of vitamin-rich superfoods, including precious saffron threads, RANAVAT's Radiant Rani Saffron Brightening Serum works to illuminate, firm and improve your skin tone, revealing a youthful glow. Crowned as the 'Best Serum' in the Byrdie Eco Beauty Awards and named as one of the 'Best Serums of 2021' by Vogue, this award-winning formula is making waves across the industry for a reason. At the heart of the blend is saffron (considered a 'miracle elixir' within Ayurvedic practices) which possesses antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties that encourage cell renewal and brightens skin. Antioxidant-rich ashwagandha then works to fade the look of blemishes and hyperpigmentation as it counters free radicals, defying environmental aggressors. The final flourish is liquorice root extract, a powerful youth-prolonging herb that helps to promote a more even skin tone.
how_to_use: Gently massage a few drops of the Brightening Saffron Serum onto a damp skin, neck, and decollete morning and evening. You can also use the saffron-based serum as a primer or mix it with your foundation for a dewy finish. Use as your all-in-one serum both AM/PM. For best results apply on damp skin following the {Royal Tonique Hydrating Jasmine Mist}.
ingredient: Sesame (Sesamum Indicum) Seed Oil*, Rice Bran Oil (Oryza Sativa), Caprylic/Capric Triglycerides**, Manjishta (Rubia Cordifolia)*, Saffron ( Crocus Sativus), Lodh Tree Bark (Symplocos Racemosa)*, Nutgrass (Cyperus Rotundus)*, Vetiver (Vetiveria Zizanoides)*, Licorice Root (Glycyrrhiza Glabra)*, Bay Leaf (Cinnamomum Tamala)*, Himalayan Cherry (Prunus Cerasoides), Lotus Seed (Nelumbo Nucifera), Pushkarmool (Inula Racemosa), Turmeric (Curcuma Longa)*, Indian Barberry (Berberis Aristata)*, Cobra Saffron (Mesua Ferrea)*, Flame Of The Forest (Butea Menosperma)*, Priyangu (Callicarpa Macrophylla)*, Banyan (Ficus Bengalensis), Mustard (Brassica Campestris)*, Tocopherol+, Rose Essential Oil (Rosa Damascena). *Organic / **Vegetable derived / +Non-GMO soy

name: Tan-Luxe Super Glow Hyaluronic Self-Tan Serum 30ml
description: Similarly to the brand's The Face, this all-new Super Glow Hyaluronic Self-Tan Serum is powered by a potent hyaluronic acid complex which effortlessly delivers a streak-free, ultra-nourished glow. Youth-preserving while helping you to fake that faux glow, this lightweight yet potent serum is a 3-in-1 hard-working hero that tans, plumps and adds serious glow to skin for a flawless and natural, healthy tan which will have everyone asking where you went last weekend. Boasting an antioxidant-rich ingredients list to brighten skin and boost collagen production, this serum also gives a burst of hydration upon application, while cocoa seed extract acts as a shield to protect skin from daily environmental aggressors. The only question is, what can't this serum do for you?
how_to_use: Apply 2-12 drops to the face and décolleté daily, massaging into skin with circular motions, avoiding eyes. Follow with a moisturizer before makeup. Additional drops will increase depth in colour.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Dihydroxyacetone, Hydrolyzed Soybean Fiber, Hyaluronic Acid, Beta Vulgaris (Beet) Root Extract, Brassica Oleracea Acephala Leaf Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Salvia Hispanica Seed Oil, Vaccinium Myrtillus Fruit Extract, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Extract, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe) Leaf Juice, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E Acetate), Ascorbic Acid, Retinyl Acetate, Erythrulose, Cyclopentasiloxane, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Polyacrylamide, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dimethicone, PVM/MA, Copolymer, Laureth-7, Laureth-23, Laureth-4, Butylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Triethylene Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, CI 17200 (D&C Red No. 33)

name: LANEIGE Lip Treatment Balm 10g
description: ’I’ve got too many lip balms,’ said nobody ever. Ready to secure a spot in your handbag (and coat pocket and bedside table…), LANEIGE’s Lip Treatment Balm offers plenty of hydration and softness, along with a pearlescent finish for maximum impact. While flooding your lips with long-lasting moisture, this pretty, pearlised balm also offers a cooling sensation that not only feels refreshing, but actually helps your pout to look plumper too. Hydrating without being overly rich (and never sticky!), this formula is packed full of ingredients your lips will love. Coconut oil deeply moisturises and locks in softness to your lips, while peptides and adenosine work together to visibly smooth and firm your lips — which means a smoother lipstick application, or simply a fuller finish when worn alone.
how_to_use: Remove applicator from lid. Apply the product generously to the lips, as needed.
ingredient: Diisostearyl Malate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Phytosteryl/ Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Polybutene, Hydrogenated Poly (C6-14 Olefin), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Microcrystalline Wax / Cera Microcristallina / Cire Microcristalline, Synthetic Wax, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Sucrose Tetrastearate Triacetate, Mica, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax / Candelilla Cera Hydrocarbons / Cire De Candelilla, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Fragrance / Parfum, Candelilla Wax Esters, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, Tribehenin, Menthoxypropanediol, Glycerin, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Lecithin, Butylene/Ethylene/ Styrene Copolymer, Sorbitan Isostearate, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax / Copernicia Cerifera Cera / Cire De Carnauba, Dehydroacetic Acid, Adenosine, Tocopherol, Lactic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1.

name: Supergoop! Mineral Mattescreen 100% Mineral Sunscreen 45ml
description: Sitting weightlessly underneath your make up, the Matte Screen is an oil-controlling rendition from the SPF sovereigns that we all know and love. Like a primer-meets-sunscreen, this zinc-powered formula promotes smoother-looking skin and minimised pores with a blurring effect. Delivering broad spectrum protection up to factor 30, this slather-worthy cream provides a mattifying shield between your skin and harmful UV rays, whatever the weather. No need to worry about the impact of too much screen time on your complexion both thanks to its ability to filter out blue light. Fortunately for you, shine doesn't exist around here...
how_to_use: Apply generously and evenly as the last step in your skincare routine and before makeup.
ingredient: Active Ingredients: Titanium Dioxide 1.33% and Zinc Oxide 17.42%. Dimethicone, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Methyl Dihydroabietate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, C9-12 Alkane, Glycerin, Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Ethylhexylglycerin, Water (Aqua), Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Silica, Stearic Acid, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Hedychium Coronarium Root Extract, Lactobacillus/Arundinaria Gigantea Leaf Ferment Filtrate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).

name: Thank You Farmer Sun Project Silky Calming Sun Stick SPF50+ PA++++ 14g
description: Korean sunscreen saviour Thank You Farmer is back with a bang - introducing its twist-and-go Sun Project Silky Calming Sun Stick that boasts SPF50+ protection to shield skin from UV rays and blue light. Perfect for all skin types and tones, this transparent formula is powered by a whole host of skin-soothing ingredients. Enriched with calamine and soothing centella asiatica extracts, it's main aim is to not only protect from the sun's harmful rays but to help reduce skin irritation and mitigate any inflammation. Designed to outlast sweat and humidity, the balm is also water-resistant so will stay put during outdoor adventures.
how_to_use: Turn the dial at the bottom of the container to raise the content to a suitable amount. Apply the product evenly to areas that require sun protection (face or body).

name: CeraVe SA Smoothing Cream with Salicylic Acid for Dry, Rough & Bumpy Skin 340g
description: Feeling your textured skin plead for moisture? Enter: the Smoothing Cream. Loaded with unbeatable hydration at give-it-a-go prices, this skin-softening remedy for dry and parched skin delivers results you can see and feel. Uniting ceramides with hardworking salicylic and lactic acids, this creamy dream gently exfoliates dead skin cells without compromising your delicate moisture barrier. Restoring your once-supple skin with its intensely nourishing formula that seeps into every crease and crevice, this super affordable must-have moisturiser has add-to-bag written all over!
how_to_use: Apply as often as needed to face and body for all over moisture.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Urea, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate Se, Cetearyl Alcohol, Niacinamide, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter/Shea Butter, C12-13 Alkyl Lactate, Peg-100 Stearate, Glycerin, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Dimethicone, Triacetin, Ceramide Np, Ceramide Ap, Ceramide Eop, Carbomer, Sodium Lactate, Salicylic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cholesterol, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium Edta, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Hydroxyacetophenone, Citric Acid, Lactic Acid, Phytosphingosine, Xanthan Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin (Code F.I.L. D228090/1).

name: Paula's Choice Omega+ Complex Cleansing Balm (104ml)
description: We know we're preaching to the choir but there's nothing like a nourishing cleanse to set up your skin for the rest of your routine. Crafted with stressed skin in mind, the Omega+ Complex Cleansing Balm from PAULA'S CHOICE thoroughly cleanses without disrupting your skin's barrier. Instead, it comforts irritated, sensitised skin with a barrier-restoring complex of fatty acids! This triple-action cleansing balm is formulated with omegas 3, 6 and 9 to cleanse, soften and soothe your skin, all while rinsing completely clean (no greasy residue here!). Made without fragrance - your skin has enough to deal with - this comforting cleanser harnesses a concentrated blend of coconut-derived fatty acids plus omega-rich jojoba and meadowfoam seed oil to prevent moisture loss during cleansing and leave your skin feeling soft and hydrated. It boasts a lush, soothing texture that effortlessly melts away impurities, sunscreen and make up without unnecessary friction or tug. Amen to that!
how_to_use: Gently massage a small amount onto wet or dry skin. Rinse well with warm water. For a deeper clean, leave on for 60 seconds then remove with a soft washcloth.
ingredient: Ethylhexyl Palmitate (emollient solvent), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride (skin-replenishing), PEG-20 Glyceryl Triisostearate (emollient cleansing agent), Diisooctyl Succinate (emollient), Olive Oil PEG-7 Esters (emollient cleansing agent/emulsifier), Trihydroxystearin (texture enhancer), Glyceryl Stearate (emulsifier), Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil (non-fragrant antioxidant/skin-softening omega fatty acid), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil (non-fragrant antioxidant/skin-softening omega fatty acid), Hydrogenated Rapeseed Oil (non-fragrant antioxidant/skin-softening omega fatty acid), Tocopheryl Acetate (vitamin E/antioxidant).

name: FARMACY Cheer up Brightening Vitamin C Eye Cream 15ml
description: Bring some sunshine to your under-eyes with the Cheer Up Brightening Vitamin-C Eye Cream. Made to pep peepers right up, this chock-full-of-cherry formula works overtime to illuminate lustreless lids while flooding subdued skin with moisture. Breathing life back into sombre contours, vitamin C (derived from acerola cherries) works overtime to brighten and bring balance to shadowed areas, while natural peptides bolster skin’s defences by encouraging collagen and elastin renewal. No match for saggy skin or fine lines, this youth-boosting, radiance-inducing elixir even awakens eyes with a quick shot of caffeine and plumps via a healthy dose of hyaluronic acid – helping you to ‘fake awake’, regardless of your sleeping schedule (we know you were scrolling TikTok until late).
how_to_use: Tap and gently smooth brightening eye cream around the eye area. Apply to brow bone for additional radiance. Use Am and PM.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Diisostearyl Malate, Pentylene Glycol, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Glycerin, Orbignya Oleifera Seed Oil, Phytosterols, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, 3-Glyceryl Ascorbate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Malpighia Punicifolia (Acerola) Fruit Extract, Caffeine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hydrolyzed Plukenetia Volubilis Seed Extract, Linoleic Acid, Phospholipids, Bisabolol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Physalis Angulata Extract, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-1, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Tocopherol, Hexamidine Diisethionate, Sodium Phytate, Melia Azadirachta Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Potassium Hydroxide, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Butylene Glycol, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Xanthan Gum

name: Dr. Jart+ Cicapair Calming Serum Mask 25g
description: Wondering how the supermodels keep their skin looking and feeling fresh, radiant and supple after long shoot days and runways? Delivering an instant, skin-soothing surge of hydration, the Cicapair Calming Mask adheres to the contours of your face with a serum soaked sheet that relieves sensitivity and redness. Concentrated with tiger grass extract, madecassooside, niacinamide, centella asiatica extract and age-defying peptides, this advanced skin-fitting mask works to strengthen your delicate microbiome barrier while providing nourishing comfort to stressed out skin. Slotting into your beauty regime as the third step in your routine after cleansing and toning aaaand perfect for the days with long to-do lists, tick off healthy-looking dewiness…
how_to_use: Rub pouch to help activate ingredients. Open the mask and carefully apply it to clean, toned skin. Leave on for 10-20 minutes. Remove mask, gently pat excess serum into skin.

name: Patchology Flash Patch Restoring Night Eye Gels
description: With a background in medical patch technology, patchology's intelligent masks and hydrogels deliver potent ingredients straight to your cells without any going to waste so you can get maximum effects with minimal effort. A must-have in your evening skin care routine, these five minute hydrogel patches deliver essential ingredients to the delicate eye area in preparation for sleep and enhance skin repair while you sleep. In just five minutes these hydrogels restore a brighter, youthful appearance to overworked and under-rested eyes. Delivering retinol which helps speed up healthy cell turnover, Cedrus atlantica bark to brighten and reduce dark circles, a peptide complex reduces fine lines and wrinkles, arnica and cucumber extracts work together to reduce puffiness and inflammation while squalene naturally hydrates, softens and protects skin from free radicals. Use in combination with your morning FlashPatch Rejuvenating Eye Gels to enhance your eye area for incredible results you'll adore. Now available as a single pair, a set of five pairs and a set of thirty(!) pairs, you can invest in more of the eye-conic patches.
how_to_use: Step 1: Place 1 pair of gels onto clean, dry under-eye area for 5 minutes (or longer if desired). Step 2: Discard after use and massage remaining serum into skin.

name: Patchology FlashPatch Illuminating Eye Gels
description: Skin care made easy, Patchology is a blessing for on-the-go ‘skintellectuals’ wanting products that do more, work faster and deliver outstanding results. Ideal for dull and dark under-eyes, the FlashPatch Illuminating Eye Gels are designed to deeply soothe and revitalise delicate skin. Making dark circles a thing of the past, vitamin C works to even and brighten your contours while softening fine lines; green tea extract minimises the appearance of dark circles by improving circulation; antioxidant mulberry extract is a natural brightening agent; and pearlescent minerals give an instantly radiant glow.
how_to_use: Apply the pair of masks onto clean, dry under-eye for five minutes. Remove the gels and massage the excess serum into your skin.

name: La Roche-Posay Hyalu B5 Hyaluronic Serum 30ml
description: Minimalist in formulation but with far from minimal results, parched skin will breathe asighof relief once this hydrating serum gets to work. Transporting large and small hyaluronic acid molecules to the surface and deeper layers of your skin, this plumping formula improves the appearance of lacklustre skin in an instant. Delivering reparative results in the long-term and working in synergy with La Roche-Posay's calming 'Thermal Spring Water' are madeccassoside and vitamin B5 to encourage collagen production and aid in the skin's natural regeneration process. Hypoallergenic and dermatologically tested we simply can't say no to this tall drink of water, and neither can our complexion!
how_to_use: Use morning or night, post cleansing. Apply to face and neck area, avoiding eyes.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Glycerin, Alcohol Denat., Propylene Glycol, Panthenol, Pentylene Glycol, Dimethicone, Peg-6 Caprylic/Capric, Glycerides, Ppg-6-Decyltetradeceth-30, Glyceryl Isostearate, Madecassoside, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ammonium, Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Disodium Edta, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Xanthan Gum, Butylene Glycol, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum/Fragrance.

name: The INKEY List Super Solutions 1% Retinol Serum 30ml
description: Developed with dermatologists, THE INKEY LIST’s new line — SuperSolutions — has arrived on our virtual shelves to help you tackle everything from stubborn scars to persistent redness. Ready to up the ante on your retinol regime? THE INKEY LIST’s SuperSolutions 1% Retinol Serum should be next in line to your nightly rituals. Boasting their highest percentage of retinol yet, this supercharged, solution-oriented treatment is fast to absorb and with minimal irritation too. Protecting your delicate skin against essential moisture loss is 5% apricot kernel oil, while 2% squalane ensures your skin barrier is well cared for. Now it’s time for the star of the show… 1% retinol! This hard-working ingredients works tirelessly to resurface the skin and reduce everything from the appearance of post-breakout scarring, fine lines and wrinkles and uneven skin tone.
how_to_use: Apply a pea-sized amount to cleansed face and neck in the evening only. When using Retinol, we recommend using an SPF in the morning. Our dermatologists would always recommend to patch test before your use this product for the first time. It is important to build up your intolerance to retinol, therefore we recommend using this product every 5-7 days and gradually increasing to 2-3 days. If irritation occurs, reduce down your usage. We wouldn’t recommend using this product with other products containing: benzoyl peroxide, BHAs, AHAs.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Squalane, Retinol, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Benzyl Alcohol, Phospholipids, Tocopherol, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glycolipids, Dehydroacetic Acid, Polysorbate 60, Sorbitan Isostearate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Sterols, t-Butyl Alcohol.

name: Medik8 Lipid - Balance Cleansing Oil 140ml
description: Soft, smooth and irresistibly silky, the Lipid-Balance Cleansing Oil boasts a cruelty-free and vegan formula that transforms to a milk when mixed with water, melting away any stubborn impurities. With an optimised ratio of lipids that mimic and replenish the skins natural defence barrier, use this if youd like supple, refreshed, radiant and moisturised skin. Moringa seed extract works hard to draw out any build-up of daily pollutants, purifying your skin and allowing fatty acids like linoleic acid to trap water in, and lock irritants out. Although this is suitable for all skin types, the abundance of linoleic acid in the Lipid-Balance Cleansing Oil makes it perfect for dry or acne-prone skin, which are often linoleic acid-deficient. Combine this with hydrating vitamin E, which works to neutralise any damaging free radicals that you encounter throughout the day, and youve got a tasty recipe for protected, rebalanced skin.
how_to_use: Gently massage into dry skin. Add warm water to emulsify into a milk and continue to massage. Rinse thoroughly and pat face dry. Please note: the visual and product name listed may differ to the packaging received due to product updates across the range. Rest assured, the formula and great results will remain the same.
ingredient: Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Sorbeth-30 Tetraoleate, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Ethyl Linoleate, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Beta-Carotene, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol, Linalool, Citral.

name: SUMMER FRIDAYS Super Amino Gel Cleanser
description: A nourishing gel cleanser formulated with plant-based surfactants for an ultra-rich lather— while amino acids hydrate and nourish the skin. A brand new launch from SUMMER FRIDAYS, the brand's Super Amino Gel Cleanser is bursting with replenishing, strengthening and rejuvenating amino acids, moisturising and nourishing vitamin E, sodium PCA and sodium lactate to protect skin from free radicals as well as coconut and sunflower oils to help remove make up while infusing essential vitamins, nutrients and minerals to protect collagen while hydrating skin. Simply pump, lather and massage into skin to feel refreshed and free from impurities and make up.
how_to_use: Use AM and PM to wash away make up and impurities before following with the rest of your skin care routine.
ingredient: Water / Aqua / Eau, Coco-Glucoside, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Sodium Lauroamphoacetate, Glycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Fragrance / Parfum, Phenoxyethanol, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Pca, Sodium Lactate, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, Pca, Glycine, Alanine, Serine, Valine, Proline, Threonine, Isoleucine, Histidine, Phenylalanine, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Sea Salt / Maris Sal / Sel Marin, Limonene.

name: Versed Doctor's Visit Instant Resurfacing Mask
description: A must-have for those wanting to achieve a salon-grade facial from the comfort of your own home, this Doctor's Visit Instant Resurfacing Mask grants a pro-grade facial with visible results and without irritation. Pro-grade results you don’t need an appointment for - just two minutes. A literal pot of gold featuring a triple-threat of AHA, BHA, and enzyme exfoliation, it tackles hyperpigmentation and boosts cell turnover for brighter, smoother, rejuvenated skin. The lactic and glycolic acids dissolve dull, dead skin and help fade dark spots, while salicylic acid minimises the appearance of pores and redness. And that instant glow is all thanks to vitamin C-rich pineapple and papaya enzymes, which gently remove the outer layer of dead skin cells that trap bacteria and sebum, all the while moisturising and softening skin. No tingling, no burning, just a post-facial glow in a flash with results that build week after week.
how_to_use: Apply a thin, even layer to clean, dry skin and rinse with cool water after 2-3 minutes. Do not leave on for more than 3 minutes, and avoid using other acid-based products and retinoids for 24 hours before and after each use.Once a week, ideally at night. See full results in four uses, and continue using weekly to maintain them. Skin may appear slightly pink after usage. This is completely normal and should subside shortly. However, if your skin is on the sensitive side, this mask may not be right for you. Start with a patch test of 60-90 seconds to see if your skin tolerates the product. Or try The Shortcut Overnight Facial Peel, a gentler option, instead. Use within 6 months once opened, or keep it on your vanity unopened for up to two years. RECYCLE IT: Remove the cap, rinse out any residue, replace the cap, and toss in your recycling bin. Remove the inner liner and label found on the bottom of the jar and throw both away in the trash.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/EauGlycerinPolyacrylate Crosspolymer-6PropanediolLactic AcidGlycolic AcidLactobacillus/Papaya Fruit Ferment ExtractAnanas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit ExtractSalicylic AcidMelia Azadirachta Leaf ExtractEvodia Rutaecarpa Fruit ExtractMelia Azadirachta Flower ExtractCurcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root ExtractLactobacillus FermentLeuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment FiltrateOcimum Basilicum (Basil) Flower/Leaf ExtractOcimum Sanctum Leaf ExtractCorallina Officinalis ExtractPotassium Hydroxide1,2-HexanediolCaprylhydroxamic AcidT-Butyl Alcohol

name: Biossance Squalane + Omega Repair (Various Sizes)
description: Marrying an indulgent whipped texture with a cocktail of hydrating ingredients, Biossance’s Squalane and Omega Repair is a reparative moisturiser formulated to help plump the look of line lines and revive radiance. Bursting with essential biomimetic lipids that mirror skin's natural barrier functions, the face cream helps reduce excess water loss throughout the day. An emulsifying method coined Liquid Crystal System ensures thorough mixing of oils and water to ensure optimal delivery of actives and minimise disruption to skin. The formula blends moisture-retaining hyaluronic acid, sugarcane-derived squalane, ceramides and shea butter, providing vital hydration and nourishment to soften and replenish dull-looking complexions. Free from parabens, PEGs and fragrance. Suitable for vegans and cruelty-free.
how_to_use: Apply to clean face and neck following eye products, serums and treatments.
ingredient: Water, Squalane, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isoamyl Laurate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Sorbitan Olivate, Cetearyl Olivate, Ceramide NP, Jojoba Esters, Sodium Hyaluronate, Euterpe Oleracea Sterols, Linoleic Acid, Oleic Acid, Linolenic Acid, Ethyl Linoleate, Tocopherol, Isoamyl Cocoate, Cetyl Palmitate, Sorbitan Palmitate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Gluconate.

name: Glow Recipe Guava Vitamin C Bright-Eye Gel Cream 15ml
description: A lack of sleep can take its toll on tired eyes, leaving them puffy, shadowed and dehydrated. If you’re struggling with your ‘z’s’ and looking for something to give you a helping hand then look no further than Glow Recipe’s new targeted eye treatment. Adding to the line of fruity favourites is the Guava Vitamin C Bright-Eye Gel Cream — infused with hardworking actives that target the common concerns around the delicate eye area. Optimised with a 10% encapsulated vitamin C complex and 3% niacinamide blend to brighten dark circles and even tone, this is the quick way to elude to 8 hours sleep (even when you’ve had half that). For the puffy eyes amongst us, a duo of peptides and green caffeine help with drainage and firm thin skin for a visibly more awake appearance.
how_to_use: Using your ring finger, gently tap a pea-sized amount onto the entire eye area, including eyelids and between eyebrows. Use this morning & night, daily. To pair our makeup-friendly eye cream with concealer or eyeshadow, allow the eye cream to absorb, then apply your favorite makeup product for smooth application.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Niacinamide, *Behenyl Alcohol, Sorbitan Olivate, Cetearyl Olivate, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Butylene Glycol, Diisostearyl Malate, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Cetyl Palmitate, Psidium Guajava Fruit Extract, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Psidium Guajava Seed Oil, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Caffeine, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-5, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Sodium Hyaluronate, Polyglyceryl-10 Dioleate, Sorbitan Palmitate, *Batyl Alcohol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Caprylyl Glycol, Melia Azadirachta Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Citric Acid, Polyglyceryl-10 Dipalmitate, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Phytate, Tocopherol, Fraxinus Excelsior Bark Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Decyl Glucoside, Lauryl Glucoside, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Potassium Citrate, Silanetriol, Musa Sapientum (Banana) Fruit Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Extract, Pyrus Communis (Pear) Fruit Extract, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Fruit Extract. *Conditioning alcohols.

name: Byoma Brightening Serum Refill 30ml
description: This super-charged and multitasking BYOMA Brightening Serum helps to significantly improve your skin’s tone and texture for even, glowing results. Yes — we can confirm that brighter days are in fact on the horizon, especially now that you can stock up on refills of this shelfie-worthy stuff. Formulated to tackle stubborn scars of hyperpigmentation and smoothen unevenly textured skin, this ultra-lightweight serum is fast-acting and hard-working. What do they say about good things in small packages? A brightly packaged bottle with an endless supply of skin-loving goodies that’ll surely stand out in your bathroom cabinet. Infused with a unique blend of barrier boosting tri-ceramide complexes, hyaluronic acid and the all-loving niacinamide, this serum is sure to drench your skin with intense hydration and strengthen its barriers. You’d think all the goodies stop there, right? Wrong. Give your skin the right gear to brave any storm and defend itself against environmental aggressors that threaten to suck up all the moisture. Forecasting brighter days and skin!
how_to_use: Apply 4-6 drops to cleansed skin, gently pressing until fully absorbed. Follow with hydrating serum and moisturiser. Once you run out, replenish your stock with a refill pod.
ingredient: Aqua, Methylpropanediol, Niacinamide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ceramide NP, Cholesterol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Phytosphingosine, Sodium Phytate, Ascorbic Acid, Stearic Acid, Oleic Acid, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Xanthan Gum, Squalane, Tocopherol, Lactic Acid, Carbomer, Tromethamine, Caprylyl Glycol, Caprylhydroxamic Acid.

name: ZitSticka Goo Getter Spot Clarifying Dots
description: Bursting with zit-zapping ingredients, the GOO GETTER Surface Zit Hydrocolloid Patch works to swiftly flatten and shrink late-stage, surface spots while absorbing impurities and accelerating the healing process. Super discreet and perfectly contoured for optimum spot adhesion, these nifty little patches also prevent pesky fingers from picking blemishes and spreading bacteria. They work by drawing impurities and goo to the surface before absorbing and draining the fluid, all while treating the area to a medley of clarifying ingredients. Spot-savvy salicylic acid digs dirt out of pores; hydrocolloid creates a moist environment to encourage skin regeneration; niacinamide soothes redness and evens skin tone; tea tree unclogs pores; and vitamin C brightens while preventing lasting cell damage.
how_to_use: Apply a patch to cleansed, dry skin. Leave on for six or more hours (or overnight) and remove. Reapply a new patch if necessary (until skin is renewed).
ingredient: 36 x ingredient-filled hydrocolloid patches: Hydrocolloid Dressing, Niacinamide, Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid), Salicylic Acid, Tea Tree Oil

name: Kitsch Satin Pillowcase (Various Colours)
description: The ultimate multitasking hero, this Satin Pillowcase is far from your usual bedtime headrest. The satin material allows you to wake up with hair thats *almost* as sleek-looking as the pillowcase itself, plus, this magical maverick is both hydrating and anti-aging for your precious skin. So good it doesnt sound real: the Satin Pillowcase wont tug or damage your strands as you sleep, keeping your hair frizz-free and looking silky smooth with envious shine. But thats not all the material has also been designed to both hydrate and age-defy for a well-rested, youthful appearance. This night time necessity comes in neutral colours black, silver, blush and jazzier options like leopard print ivory, white terrazzo and champagne butterfly so you can match your pillowcase to your bed sheets every time.
how_to_use: Switch out your regular pillowcase with your chosen Kitsch pillowcase.
ingredient: Silver, Blush and Leopard Printed: 100% polyester. Ivory, Black, White Terrazzo, Champagne Butterfly: 100% polyester satin.

name: innisfree Intensive Hydrating Serum with Green Tea Seed 80ml
description: A fan-favourite for verygood reason, the Intensive Hydrating Serum with Green Tea Seed serum revives dry and dehydrated complexions, flooding your skin barrier (and beyond!) with instant and long-lasting hydration. Hailing all the way from Korea’s Jeju Island, the ‘Green Tea Tri-biotics’ in this must-have help keep your skin’s invisible ecosystem healthy, happy and hydrated, while the antioxidants in the green tea extract protect against environmental stress and is packed with amino acids for added moisture. Lightweight and gel-like in texture, this hero seamlessly sinks into skin to deliver not one, but five types of hyaluronic acid for even deeper hydration (lasting a whole 24 hours), revealing a lit-from-within glow irresistible to all skin types.
how_to_use: Use morning and evening on clean, dry skin. Apply to the entire face by patting gently, after the toner and before the day cream/night cream. Press with the palms of the hand on the face for better absorption.
ingredient: Water / Aqua / Eau, Propanediol, Glycerin, Alcohol Denat., 1,2-Hexanediol, Trehalose, Niacinamide, Betaine, Saccharide Isomerate, Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil, Cet-Earyl Olivate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Sorbitan Olivate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, Butylene Glycol, Squalane, Panthenol, Allantoin, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Tromethamine, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium Edta, Fragrance / Parfum, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hyaluronic Acid, Dextrin, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Sorbitan Isostearate, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Linalool, Limonene, Poloxamer 235, Sucrose, Lactic Acid, Epigallocatechin Gallate, Ethoxydiglycol, Tocophersolan, Poloxamer 338, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate.

name: Medik8 Super C Ferulic 30ml
description: Jam-packed with Medik8s Super C30 an extremely potent, yet stable, source of vitamin C in the form of 30% Ethylated L-Ascorbic Acid the Super C Ferulic provides impressive antioxidant protection from free radicals. Previously known as the Super C30 Intense, it also stimulates collagen production, allowing your skin to look plump, smooth and youthful. Marrying the power of vitamin C with vitamin E, the Super C Ferulic protects you from environmental and sun damage for age-defying effects. Packing a powerful punch, the added turmeric root extractleaves the complexion radiant and revitalised, while added botanical oils provide even more antioxidant protection. Lightweight and dry-touch, the Super C Ferulic wont leave you feeling sticky creating an ideal base for further skin care and make up application. Plus, this intelligently stable concoction wont lose its potency leaving you safe in the knowledge that it's working every single time.This high-performance hero is ideal for skin care maestros looking to parry pigmentation problems, prolong youth and up their vitamin C game with style.
how_to_use: After cleansing in the morning, massage 4 drops across the face, neck and daccolletage. Leave to absorb before applying moisturiser. The highly potent formula may tingle slightly for a few seconds after application. This in normal and indicates the product is working. Please note: the visual and product name listed may differ to the packaging received due to product updates across the range. Rest assured, the formula and great results will remain the same.
ingredient: Methoxymethylbutanol, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Propylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Ferulic Acid, Tetrahydrodiferuloylmethane, Aqua (Water), Tocopheryl Acetate.

name: The Outset Gentle Micellar Antioxidant Cleanser 150ml
description: The new star player in your cleansing routine, The Outset's antioxidant-rich cleanser works to reset and clarify the skin without stripping it. You're left with a plump, smooth and youthful-looking complexion – minus that squeaky-clean feeling. The crucial first step in the brand's triple-threat routine, this cleanser stars Hyaluroset™ Complex: a signature botanical alternative to hyaluronic acid, which instantly drenches the skin in hydration. This, alongside two powerful blends of aminos and antioxidant fruits, ensures that the skin is moisturised and strengthened, while visibly reducing signs of ageing. Cleansing micelles are also key to this groundbreaking formula, which work like tiny magnets to attract and trap dirt, delivering a deep yet gentle clean. Don't be surprised if it becomes your new, can't-live-without favourite (and if you want to try the full three-step routine, don't miss The Outset's Firming Vegan Collagen Prep Serum and Nourishing Squalane Daily Moisturiser).
how_to_use: Morning or night, wet skin with warm water, massage a dime-size amount of cleanser gently into skin, rinse thoroughly, and pat dry.
ingredient: Water (Aqua, Eau), Glycerin, Propanediol, Decyl Glucoside, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Xanthan Gum, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Cassia Angustifolia Seed Polysaccharide, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Water, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Water, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Serine, Alanine, Glycine, Lysine HCl, Threonine, Arginine, Proline, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate, Heptyl Glucoside, Phenoxyethanol, Coco-Glucoside, Glyceryl Oleate, Caprylyl Glycol, Glutamic Acid, PCA, Citric Acid, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Tocopherol, Betaine, Potassium Hydroxide, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Lactate, Sodium PCA.

name: Embryolisse Lait-Crème Concentré Multi-Purpose Moisturiser Sensitive 100ml
description: Informed by the ultra-hydrating qualities of the industry-acclaimed Lait-Crème Concentre, Embroylisse have crafted an equally nourishing equivalent that's suited to the needs of sensitive skin; meet the Lait-Creme Concentre Sensitive Skin... Now made sans fragrance, it's still overflowing with essential fatty acids and vitamins to restore harmony to stressed-out skin, smooth areas of dryness and protect your complexion from environmental aggressors. Doing the work of three formulas, this calming concoction can be used as a primer, moisturiser and make up remover, making it a versatile make up bag mainstay and a great travel companion (wishful thinking...). Light in texture and quickly absorbed, a helping of this salve will leave skin feeling plumped, soothed and hydrated while the velvety finish grips your foundation to help you stay flawless for longer.
how_to_use: Apply morning and/or evening to clean, dry skin. Massage in gently without applying pressure, and leave to penetrate. The Lait-Crème Concentré Sensitive Skin can also be used to cleanse the skin or remove make-up, as a repairing mask, an after-shave cream or as a baby-care product.
ingredient: Aqua (Water). Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride. Glycerin. Octyldodecanol. Cetearyl Alcohol. Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter. Cera Alba (Beeswax). Cetyl Phosphate. 1,2-Hexanediol. Caprylyl Glycol. Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer. Sodium Hydroxide. Propylene Glycol. Tocopherol. Tropolone. Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil. Hydrolyzed Soy Protein. Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract. 98 % D'ingrédients D'origine Naturelle / Ingredients From Natural Origin.

name: Dr.Jart+ Ceramidin Facial Barrier Mask 22ml
description: Skin feeling a little… meh recently? Bring spa-like treatments to you with the Ceramidin Facial Barrier Mask — a moisture-magnetic sheet that feels like a hug to compromised skin. A member of the iconic yellow-and-white packaged Ceramidin clan, this strengthening masks is drenched with nourishing panthenol and glycerin which work together to rebalance skin with long-lasting moisture and essential hydration. Seeping into fine and dry lines to plump them from the inside out, this ceramide-rich hero fortifies your skin’s barrier to prevent water loss — keeping the good ‘stuff’ in and the not-so-good ‘stuff’ out. An easy-to-use pick me up that’s perfect for jet-setters and pamper nights in, this masking miracle is guaranteed to smooth, restore and soften your skin.
how_to_use: Apply after cleansing and toning skin. Carefully apply mask to the face avoiding the eye area. Remove the mask after 15 to 20 minutes. Massage remaining formula into skin. Follow with a moisturizer for dry flaky skin. Use 2-3 times a week or as needed.

name: Peace Out Pores 4 Nose Strips and 4 Pore Strips
description: Here to tackle enlarged and clogged pores, Peace Out's easy-to-use strips work to minimise their appearance in no time thanks to a new, clean hydrocolloid polymer technology. (Yes, it sounds fancy and it does the job!) Peace Out's nose and pore strips are like a vacuum cleaner for your skin - lifting away dirt, excess sebum and dead skin cells. They're boosted with firming DMAE to visibly shrink enlarged pores, alongside an ester form of retinol, which is packed with vitamin A to help refine texture while reducing the chance of further clogging or breakouts. Bye bye blackheads, hello healthy-looking, clear skin!
how_to_use: Apply a nose strip or pore strip, tacky-side down, on clean, dry skin. After four to six hours, gently remove the strip - results may vary. Note: if you're experiencing any areas of excessive dryness, open skin or went a little heavy handed with peels, chemical exfoliation or actives - give your skin a little resting time before using these dots or patches.
ingredient: DMAE Bitartrate, Retinyl Acetate (Vitamin A). Patch: Hydrocolloid Polymer Technology

name: Augustinus Bader The Rich Cream 50ml
description: A revolutionary face cream inspired by 30 years of research and innovation, Professor Augustinus Bader has created an iconic product. With two iterations to choose from - a light, refreshing, yet deeply hydrating cream or the luxurious, intensely nourishing 'Rich' formula - these work to strengthen and restore your skin's resilience; dramatically transforming the complexion with skin rejuvenating TFC8 technology. Based on the knowledge that your body has an innate ‘code’ for tissue repair, The Cream contains the patented 'Trigger Factor Complex' (TFC8) which ‘unlocks’ this code. All sounding a bit scientific? The main thing you need to know is that by stimulating your skin’s natural renewal process, these potions help to visibly reduce the signs of ageing and environmental damage, leaving your skin looking and feeling restored, regenerated and renewed. An ideal addition to your day-time routine, ‘The Cream’ is a fast-absorbing, weightless formulation that’s ideal for normal-oily skin types - keeping skin plump with hydration and glowing with health thanks to strengthening soy bean, hydrolysed rice proteins, soothing aloe vera and brightening ascorbic acid. Reformulated to be vegan-friendly (it no longer contains anti-inflammatory beeswax) yet equally as luxurious, ‘The Rich Cream’ is a more intense concoction that’s best-suited to normal to dry skin types. Alongside the advanced TFC8, it also features richly moisturising argan, avocado and evening primrose oils, as well as omega 6-rich fatty acids and antioxidants to shield your skin against free radicals. Please note that this formula is a water in oil emulsion that can separate when not in use. Fear not! This has no effect on the efficacy of your new-found Holy Grail cream.
how_to_use: For optimum results, apply to dry, cleansed skin, morning and evening. To activate the patented TFC8®, Augustinus Bader recommends the following steps: 1. Massage the cream along your jawline 2. Sweep from your nose to your ears and across your forehead 3. Sweep excess over cheeks and neck
ingredient: The Cream: Aqua (Water), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Pentylene Glycol, Propylene Glycol, Hydrogenated Phosphatidylcholine, Glycerin, Sorbitol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Tocopheryl Acetate, Butylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Panthenol, Sodium Carbomer, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Retinyl Palmitate, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Squalane, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Lecithin, Alcohol, Carbomer, Ceramide NP, TFC-8, Sodium Benzoate, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Protein, Superoxide Dismutase, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Dextran, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-8, Ascorbic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Dextran Sulfate The Rich Cream: Aqua (Water), Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Squalane, Glycerin, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Ethyl Oleate, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Polyglyceryl-4 Oleate, Magnesium Sulfate, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Panthenol, Polyglyceryl-6 Oleate, Zinc Pca, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Butylene Glycol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Tocopherol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Maltodextrin, Citric Acid, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Xanthan Gum, Alanyl Glutamine, Arginine, Oligopeptide-177, Phenylalanine, Sisymbrium Irio Seed Oil, Sodium Chloride, Dextran, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-8.

name: The INKEY List PHA Toner 100ml
description: Designed to revitalise dull, dry and congested complexions, this formula calls upon poly-hydroxy acids to gently exfoliate the upper layer of your skin: clearing dead skin cells and blocked pores. The beauty of this toner lies in the natural humectant properties of PHAs, which improves your skin’s ability to retain moisture, promising an enriching and sensitive-friendly exfoliating moment. Combined with the incredibly nourishing and gentle aloe barbadensis leaf juice to prevent future dryness and a 3% niacinamide solution to help minimise pores, improve your texture and dump dullness, there’s nothing not to love about this toner.
how_to_use: Use in the AM or PM. Sweep over cleansed skin. Follow with preferred serums and moisturiser.
ingredient: Water (Aqua / Eau), Propanediol, Gluconolactone, Niacinamide, Pentylene Glycol, Glycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Ppg-26-Buteth-26, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide

name: good light Moon Glow Milky Toning Lotion
description: In a deliciously milky texture, the lightweight Moon Glow Milky Toning Lotion is a pH-balanced toner that’s vegan, cruelty-free and fragrance-free. Super hydrating, nourishing and soothing, it’s packed with ceramides to strengthen skin and improve barrier function by locking in moisture. Natural alpha hydroxy acids (also known as AHAs) slough away dulling cells, while meadowfoam seed oil soothes inflammation and encourages healing. Snow mushroom holds up to 1,000 times its weight in water, which — especially when paired with industry-adored humectant, hyaluronic acid — makes it an expert at pulling moisture into skin. Niacinamide (or vitamin B3) balances oils, minimises the look of pores and protects against sun damage too.
how_to_use: After cleansing, dispense lotion onto your hands or on a cotton round and massage into skin to balance the pH of your skin and to replenish moisture. Gentle for day and night use.

name: Dermalogica Daily Microfoliant (74g)
description: Go filter-free as you tackle oiliness, premature signs of ageing, uneven skin tones and dehydration face on with the Daily Microfoliant. Coveted and treasured as a skin care staple in bathroom cabinets everywhere, this skin-brightening powder activates with a few drops of water to gently exfoliate your skin to pore-fection. Blending papain, salicylic acid and rice enzymes with a fusion of phytic acid and calming allantoin, your skin is feeling smoother than ever. Gentle and incredibly hardworking, banish away the rough and tough textures of yesteryear to say hello to a polished complexion that’s as good as new!
how_to_use: Dispense about a half-teaspoon of Daily Microfoliant into very wet hands and create a creamy paste by rubbing hands together. Apply to face in circular motions, avoiding the eye area. Massage gently for one minute, then rinse thoroughly. Follow with Multi-Active Toner or UltraCalming Mist and prescribed Dermalogica Moisturiser.

name: La Roche-Posay Redermic [R] Retinol Eye Cream 15ml
description: Sculpting tired and ageing eyes to give you the spring back in your step, La Roche-Posay has infused pure retinol into this treatment specifically formulated for the sensitive eye area to keep fine lines and dark circles under control. The Redermic [R] Retinol Eye Cream combines the exclusive ‘Retinol Booster Complex’ with 0.2% of caffeine to visibly brighten tired eyes and smooth the appearance of lines and wrinkles. Developed to work in harmony with super-sensitive skin, this has been tolerance tested under ophthalmological control on contact-lens wearers too, so even easily-irritated eyes can sleep easy. This award-winning eye treatment is clinically proven to deliver on results to leave you bright-eyed and bushy tailed by the time you wake.
how_to_use: Apply in the evening from the inner corner of the eye outwards, alone or in combination with a suitable eye moisturising cream. Light, easy-to-apply texture. Do not expose skin to UV light. Apply a daily sunscreen with an SPF of at least 15. Tolerance tested under ophthalmological control on contact-lens wearers. If any discomfort occurs during initial use, space out applications so that skin can adjust. Do not use in conjunction with any other Retinoids.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Isocetyl Stearate, Glycerin, Octyldodecanol, Propylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Dimethicone, Acrylamide/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Copolymer, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Caffein, Isohexadecane, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hydroxide, Retinol, Retinyl Linoleate, Adenosine, Ammonium Polyacryldimethyltauramide / Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Polysilicone-8, Polysorbate 80, Phenoxyethanol.

name: La Roche-Posay Ultra Fine Scrub 50ml
description: A weekly treat for skin, this fine exfoliating scrub works into skin to reveal a softer, refined visage. Powered by the brand’s exclusive thermal spring water formula (which is rich in minerals), the Ultra Fine Scrub is primed to deliver instant, long-lasting hydration while the fine particles smooth rough skin and remove impurities. It’s also carefully formulated with selected agents for optimal tolerance to the gentle solution. In true La Roche-Posay fashion, this powerhouse has been formulated without parabens, preservatives, alcohol, fragrances and colourants — just the simple yet effective stuff. Take a ‘me’ moment to massage this scrub in, slough away dead skin and say hello to brighter, calmer skin.
how_to_use: Apply to a wet face using a gentle massaging motion, avoiding the eye area. Rinse thoroughly with water. External use only.
ingredient: Aqua / Water,Butylene Glycol,Glycerin,Hydroxyethylpiperazine Ethane Sulfonic Acid,Polyethylene,Ammonium Polyacryldimethyltauramide / Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate,Poloxamer 184,Triethanolamine,Tetrasodium Edta,Xanthan Gum,Solum Diatomeae / Diatomaceous Earth,Polyquaternium-47,Caprylyl Glycol,Myrtrimonium Bromide,Benzoic Acid,Parfum / Fragrance,Sodium Benzoate.

name: NUXE Huile Prodigieuse Multi-Purpose Dry Oil 50ml
description: A best-smelling must-have, Nuxe's Huile Prodigieuse Multi-Purpose Dry Oil for Face, Body and Hair is a buffet of goodness for compromised skin - cherishing dry, scaly patches (and strengthening over-styled lengths!) with a medley of plant-derived oils. Completely non-greasy and quickly absorbed, this leaves a light lustre and works to replenish and comfort the scaliest limbs... A holiday hero (slather this all over post-sun skin), the blend of camellia, hazelnut, sweet almond, St. John's wort, macadamia and borage has impressive healing properties - working to elasticise and fortify while boosting moisture levels to promote a healthy glow. Rake through the ends of your hair to create a chic 'piecey-ness', smooth over shoulders or streak down the length of your shins to bestow an au naturel highlight. A multi-tasking wonder, there's a reason no routine should be without it.
how_to_use: Spray some Huile Prodigieuse® in the palm of your hand and add a drop of your usual moisturiser. Mix and apply to your skin using smoothing movements. Your face will be perfectly moisturised, and your skin softer and more supple. Apply to your shoulders, neckline, hands, or other areas that need attention. There is nothing quite like the unique quality of Huile Prodigieuse® to enhance the skin's texture in a single step. · In the palm of your hand, mix a drop of Huile Prodigieuse® with your foundation before applying: it will glide smoothly over your skin. Spray some Huile Prodigieuse® on a natural bristle hairbrush for naturally controlled and radiantly shiny hair. Exposure to the sun leaves your skin feeling dehydrated and in need of special care and attention. There is nothing better than Huile Prodigieuse® to nourish and repair it. Ideal as a massage oil, Huile Prodigieuse® glides smoothly over your skin, infusing it with its divine fragrance. Spray some Huile Prodigieuse® directly on your hair (from a distance of around 20 cm) and massage into your hair and scalp. Then wrap your head in a warm towel and leave for 15 to 20 minutes to allow Huile Prodigieuse® to penetrate before shampooing. Add a few drops of Huile Prodigieuse® to your bath water and drift away on its joyful and fragrant waves. A daily massage with Huile Prodigieuse® is ideal for alleviating stretch marks.
ingredient: Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Dicaprylyl Ether, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Corylus Avellana (Hazelnut) Seed Oil, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Parfum/Fragrance, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Aqua/Water, Ascorbic Acid, Solanum Lycopersicum (Tomato) Fruit Extract, Linalool,Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol [N2212/C].

name: Thank You Farmer Sun Project Light Sun Essence SPF50
description: A featherweight daily defence, Thank You Farmer’s Sun Project Light Sun Essence SPF 50+ infuses skin with cooling aloe extract (to reduce redness and calm irritation), while sacha inchi oil and lotus flower water combine to soften visibility of lines and bolster skin’s resilience – improving suppleness and ‘stretch’ while deflecting the damaging effects of UV rays. Readily absorbed and completely non-greasy, this hydrates without smothering skin, controlling oil to maintain a smooth, semi-matte finish.
how_to_use: After basic skincare, take a proper amount of the product, then spread evenly on the area which will be exposed to the sun. Use before exposure to the sun. Apply again to maintain protection, especially after sweating, swimming or wiping with a towel. Warnings: Do not use on damaged or irritated skin, skin with wound, eczema and dermatitis. Do not use in case of allergy to any of the ingredients. For external use only. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or red spot, swelling, itching, stimulus have occurred and consult with dermatologist. Discontinue use if side effects as above have occurred on the area of application after exposure to direct sunlight. Avoid direct contact with eyes. Even when using sunscreen product, prolonged exposure to the sun is not recommended. Keep babies and children out of direct sunlight. Excessive exposure to the sun is a serious threat to health. Store in a cool and dry place, away from direct sunlight and heat, out of the reach of children.

name: Dr Dennis Gross Skincare Alpha Beta Universal Daily Peel (Pack of 30)
description: Dr Dennis Gross Skincare Alpha Beta® Peel Original Formula (30 packets) is perfect for achieving a professional quality treatment in the comfort of your own home. Combining 5 Alpha and Beta Hydroxy Acids plus Retinol, Ubiquinone, Resveratrol and a host of antioxidants, vitamins and soothing botanicals, it smoothes your skin through microexfoliation, helping to dramatically improve the appearance of blemishes, dark spots, enlarged pore, redness and signs of ageing. - L.M. Directions for use:
ingredient: Key Ingredients: Retinol smooths wrinkles and lines, while also increasing moisture and elasticity. Glycolic Acid improves skin texture. name: SUMMER FRIDAYS Overtime Mask
description: The beauty braniacs behind the instant sell-out {Jet Lag Mask} are back – and this time they’re here to do wonders for ‘the biggest overachievers in the game’… your skin cells. According to SUMMER FRIDAYS, your cells work overtime and sometimes, like your desktop, your complexion can get a little cluttered – a.k.a. dull and congested. The ultimate foil for moments when you’re skin needs a refresh, Overtime Mask is a clarifying concoction of cruelty-free, vegan skin saviours. Packed with restorative minerals, plus vitamins A, K and C, pumpkin exfoliates and hydrates for a brighter, more balanced complexion; natural and gentle apricot seed powder (unlike harsh synthetic abrasives or ‘scrubs’) sweeps away dead skin cells for seriously smooth results; oat kernel protein, a moisturising, anti-inflammatory ingredient, leaves everything velvety soft and soothed; finally, antioxidant vitamin E acts as your skin’s bodyguard, fending off collagen-damaging free radicals for a youthful boost. As high-performing as it is irresistible chic, this burnt orange-hued mask is exactly what we’re after to embrace autumn (and beyond) promising to grant the most luminous glow you’ve experienced in a long time.
how_to_use: On cleansed, dry skin apply a thick layer using fingertips. Massage in circular motions for 60 seconds (avoid eye area). Leave on for 10 minutes. Wash off with warm water and pat dry. Use twice a week or whenever skin feels dull. SUMMER FRIDAYS founders Marianna and Lauren say: “We like to follow up this exfoliating mask with our uber-hydrating Jet Lag Mask—polish, plump and glow.” Dreamy!

name: The INKEY List Vitamin C Serum 30ml
description: A powerful antioxidant with a host of benefits, vitamin C is a skin care celebrity for a reason. Able to both prevent and correct signs of damage, Vitamin C Serum can help to reduce the impact of daily skin stressors, including pollution and sun exposure, which can lead to pigmentation, accelerated signs of ageing and dullness (no thanks!) As well as this, vitamin C works to actively brighten and even out skin tone, while also boosting collagen production to enhance skin’s plumpness and elasticity. Offering all of these benefits (without eye-watering cost or alienating jargon) THE INKEY LIST’s Vitamin C Serum stars 30% pure, L-Ascorbic Acid in a stable, waterless formulation for optimum results and low irritation. Add this into your regime and you can expect bright, even, protected, youthful-looking skin
how_to_use: Can be used in the AM and PM. Use in the AM for best results Apply a pea-sized amount to cleansed face and neck and follow with moisturisers Warnings Avoid the eye area. A slight tingling sensation can be expected, particularly if you are new to the product. Product may cause irritation, if irritation persists discontinue use. Ensure product is kept out of sunlight in a cool dry environment. Always ensure lid is sealed. External use only.
ingredient: Dimethicone, Ascorbic Acid, Polysilicone-11, Peg-10 Dimethicone

name: Dr.Jart+ Ceramidin Cream Mist 50ml
description: A supercharged pick-me-up for dry and flaky skin, Dr.Jart+’s Ceramidin Cream Mist bestows a wealth of lasting hydration from the very first spritz. Empowered by a complex of five(!) ceramides (nourishing components essential for your skin’s protective layer), this mist encourages healthy, comfortable hydration and the repair of damaged skin. This formula goes up against textured and sensitive complexions with a blend of xylitol and flower extracts enhancing moisture retention and strengthen the skin’s barrier by preventing water loss. Suitable for your face and body, this comforting complex grants the dewiest of glows. Simply spritz over freshly cleansed skin for a hydrating tone; to set and soften make up; as an after-bath body mist; and to moisturise on the move.
how_to_use: Close eyes and mist over entire face, as needed. May also be used as a toner after cleansing, over make up through the day and as a pick-me-up for thirsty skin.

name: Mario Badescu Witch Hazel & Rosewater Toner
description: Suitable for all skin types, Mario Badescu's Witch Hazel & Rosewater Toner is the perfect way to lift lingering impurities post-cleanse and instil a fresh-faced glow without stripping your skin. Suitable for vegans and made without alcohol, this mild toner harnesses clarifying witch hazel (a natural astringent) to help to reduce the visibility of pores and balance sebum levels, ultimately promoting a clearer-looking complexion. What's more, it's infused with the brand's signature blend of black rose, rosewater and rose oil to provide a hefty brightening boost of antioxidants, while aloe vera replenishes hydration levels. In short, expect deeply refreshed, quenched and luminous skin!
how_to_use: Twice daily after cleansing, apply to skin with a cotton ball or pad. Wipe in sweeping, outward motions until the cotton comes up clean. Avoid eye area. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.

name: ELEMIS Pro-Collagen Summer Bloom Cleansing Balm 100g
description: A 3-in-1 cleansing balm that cleans, nourishes and hydrates, Elemis' Pro-Collagen Summer Bloom Cleansing Balm easily dissolves make up and daily grime for petal-soft skin. This soothing balm melts into a rich cleansing oil to dissolve make up and impurities on the skin. Upon contact with water, it emulsifies to a hydrating milk that easily rinses off, creating an exceptiona and sensoriall cleansing experience. The soothing formula also infuses rose and mimosa waxes with elderberry, starflower and camelina oils to strengthen skin barrier function, improve elasticity and inject a dose of long-lasting moisture. More than just a cleanser, take your time with this luxurious balm and let its aromatic scent bring your day to a close in a moment of zen.
how_to_use: Use daily as a cleanser or weekly as a nourishing facial mask. Warm a pea-sized amount between palms and then massage over face, neck and décolleté with light circular massage movements. Moisten fingertips and continue to massage. Remove with a warm, damp cleansing cloth.

name: Biossance Squalane and Lactic Acid Resurfacing Serum 30ml
description: Dreaming of smoother, more luminous skin? Apply this phenomenal serum before you drift off and you’ll wake to discover your dreams weren’t confined to your sleep… With its AHA content to gently refine and skin-nourishing squalane to heal and replenish, this dual-action treatment is gentle (but face-changing). Starring 10% vegan lactic acid to accelerate cell turnover and supplement your cells’ overnight regenerative processes, this blend boasts additional clover and thirst-quenching squalene to soothe irritation and help to rebalance when things seem a bit out of sync. Sufficiently gentle for use every evening, this dials up the brightness from first application – dispelling the dullness and boosting skin’s ‘bounce’ so you wake looking beautifully fresh and well-rested.
how_to_use: Massage 2-3 pumps into skin at night, after applying your eye treatment. Follow with your favourite moisturiser for extra hydration (don’t forget your neck and décolleté). Gentle enough to use nightly.

name: Sunday Riley A+ High-Dose Retinoid Serum 50ml
description: One of the most bio-available non-prescription forms of vitamin A products on the market, A+ High-Dose Retinoid Serum is a pro-strength formula for those who want serious results without the unwanted side effects of traditional retinol formulations (reduced appearance of side effects like flaking, redness, and irritation compared to high-strength retinol and retinoid products is visible after one use). Combining a 5% retinoid ester blend, a 1% liposomal-encapsulated retinol blend and a 0.5% blue-green algae blend with natural, retinoid-alternative activity, this serum powerfully youth-boosts and improves the look of congested and UV damaged skin. Still on the fence? In addition to reducing the look of fine lines, A+ features encapsulated CoQ10 to help improve the appearance of weathered and damaged skin, while Hawaiian white honey, bisabolol, cactus extract and ginger balance and soothe for a calmer, more even-toned complexion. Available in mini and mightier editions (30ml and 50ml respectively), there's a size for everyone's bathroom cabinet – whether you're already a loyal Sunday Riley devotee or yet to dip your toes into their skin-enhancing waters...
how_to_use: Apply 1-2 pumps to clean, dry skin as a night-time pro-treatment.

name: Odacité Crystal Contour Gua Sha - Rose Quartz
description: An ancient skin care secret that was favoured by Chinese, Greek and Egyptian civilisations thousands of years ago, Odacité’s Crystal Contour Gua Sha Beauty Tool is crafted from 100% high-grade natural stone to help breathe new life into skin. Traditionally used to reduce signs of ageing, the gentle stroking action of this trusted tool increases blood circulation to refine, tone and smooth skin. Maintaining a cool temperature, it refreshes skin and helps to close pores for a more even appearance. As well as this, it can reduce sagging, blotches and bags and lines around the eyes, quickly revitalising skin. From Rose Quartz to Blue Sodalite and Green Aventurine, each one of Odacité’s Crystal Contour Gua Sha Beauty Tools helps to realign and energise the body and skin in a multitude of ways - depending on the stone. Known as a feel-good stone that opens and realigns the heart chakra, rose quartz encourages compassion, tenderness, forgiveness and self-love.
how_to_use: Cleanse the skin thoroughly and follow with a treatment mist. Dispense 5-10 drops of your favourite Odacité Serum Concentrate into the palm of your hand. Rub hands together to warm the serum and press to apply it all over your face and neck. Follow the Gua Sha facial guide below repeating each stroke 5-10 times. After each use, wash stone with a bit of mild, natural soap and warm water. Dry completely. Set out in moonlight to recharge and re-energise the crystal occasionally.
ingredient: Natural Rose Quartz crystal

name: Caudalie Vinoclean Instant Foaming Cleanser Duo (Worth £30.00)
description: Caudalie's HG cleanser has a new look - and now you can double up on the vegan and eco-friendly cleanser (the new bottles are 100% recycled and recyclable!). Worth £30, this Vinoclean Instant Foaming Cleanser Duo unites two full size editions of the sensitive-friendly formula. Lifting residual make up and dirt from your complexion, this ultra-gentle cleanser leaves skin squeakily clean and peachy-soft. The grape extract restores a youthful glow, while the mild astringency of sage helps combat oiliness and ward off free-radical attack and chamomile extract soothes irritation and calms skin that's susceptible to inflammation or the occasional blemish. Perfect for ridding even the most sensitive skin of every last trace of grime, this delicate yet effective foaming face wash expands in the air to deep clean pores and leave skin refreshed – with no risk of dryness or discomfort.
how_to_use: Morning and evening, apply to wet skin. Rinse with water. Do not shake before using.

name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Duo+ SPF30 with Niacinamide 40ml
description: The Effaclar Duo+ SPF 30 takes the stress out of environmental exposure so it’s time to make this daily gel moisturiser your year-round hydrator, protector and anti-blemish treatment. Advanced protection is yours thanks to ‘Active Shield XL Protect’ guarding your skin against harmful UVA and UVB rays, Infrared light protection and a strong defence from the effects of pollution thanks to antioxidant carnosine. Not forgetting about those stubborn breakouts, clearer skin is on the horizon in as little as just four weeks thanks to a complex of LHA and our favourite skin-gredient niacinamide. These powerhouse actives work to gently exfoliate and unclog pores, reducing scarring left behind by blemishes and taking down inflammation to alleviate discomfort in sensitive, oily and problematic skin. It’s time to sit back, relax and let La Roche-Posay look after your complexion with this dual-action SPF treatment moisturiser.
how_to_use: Apply to the whole face and neck in circular motions. Avoid eye contour.

name: Versed Silk Slip Conditioning Tinted Lip Oil 9ml - Various Shades
description: A tinted take on their bestselling lip treatment, Versed's Silk Slip Conditioning Tinted Lip Oil comes in three ultra-flattering shades to cloak your kisses with a lightweight (yet long-lasting!) veil of moisture. This nourishing balm imparts a beautiful wash of sheer colour to your lips while keeping them soft and hydrated throughout the day. Smoothing over supremely chapped lips, this formula is enriched with vitamin E (a stellar source of antioxidants), as well as a hydrating cocktail of jojoba, camellia and sesameoils.Though the oil is easily absorbed and non-sticky - perfect for on-the-go application - the subtle tint and moisture will be sure to hang around. Available in three stunning hues, the only hard part is choosing which one you want: sheer blue-red 'Ruby', mauve-berry 'Fig' or medium pink 'Blossom'.
how_to_use: Squeeze and swipe on to lips as often as you please. GOOD TO KNOW:Use as a dewy blush by dabbing a pea-sized amount onto cheeks.

name: Pai Skincare The Impossible Glow Bronzing Drops 10ml
description: Great for all skin types and tones, Pai Skincare's The Impossible Glow, Hyaluronic Acid & Sea Kelp Bronzing Drops are perfect for granting a beautifully luminous look (sans the sun damage). Brimming with dew-boosting hyaluronic acid - a natural moisture magnet that acts like you're 'fluffing the stuffing' (if skin cells were cushions) - these drops can be mixed into serum or cream for a gradual glow, or used straight from the bottle to instantly grant an ethereal gleam. Laced with light-scattering pigments to help you look lit-from-within, lemon-derived vitamin C works to brighten while scavenging damaging radicals, while sea kelp delivers long-lasting hydration for skin that looks visibly smooth, firm and radiant.
how_to_use: Mix a few drops into topical serum or cream to enhance its glow-boosting effects, or use 'neat' to instantly grant a warm, holiday glow to your cheeks, forehead, bridge of your nose and your chin for a natural, sunkissed aesthetic.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Citrus Limon Fruit Water* (Lemon Fruit Water), Mica, Glycerin**, Ascophyllum Nodosum Extract (Algae Extract), Sclerotium Gum, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Sodium Levulinate, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Anisate, Lactic Acid, Sodium Phytate, Maltodextrin, CI 77019 (Iron Oxides), CI 77491 (Iron Oxides), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide) *Organic / Biologique Of Total: 87% (minus water & minerals) / 23.46% ORGANIC, 93% NATURAL **Mixed organic and non-organic ingredients.

name: Dermalogica Precleanse (150ml)
description: Put down the cotton pads and dare we say it… make up wipes — stat! Instead, reach for this h’oily grail amongst skin therapists, influencers and enthusiasts to completely elevate your routine. Dermalogica’s PreCleanse puts in double the work with half the effort and creates zero waste. If you’re not double cleansing, then what exactly are you doing…? Cut your make up removal time in half with this conditioning deep-cleansing oil that melts away even the stubbornest of formulas. Gently breaking down layers of foundation, sunscreen, residual products and environmental pollutants that typically build up throughout the day, this oily texture forms a milky emulsion as you take the day off your skin. Uniting a host of sweet-smelling and oh-so-nourishing, essential oils from apricot, orange, lavender and sunflower, you can achieve ultra clean and healthy-looking skin in no time at all!
how_to_use: Dispense into dry hands. Massage over dry face and eyes to dissolve surface oil and dirt. Concentrate on areas of congestion or stubborn debris. Wet hands and continue massaging to create a light, milky emulsion. Rinse with lukewarm water. Follow with prescribed Dermalogica Cleanser for professional cleansing results.
ingredient: Caprylic/Capric Triglycerides, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, PEG-40 Sorbitan Peroleate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Oil, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Cymbopogon Schoenanthus Oil, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Solanum Lycopersicum (Tomato) Extract, Lavandula Hybrida Oil, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Aleurites Moluccana Seed Oil, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Citral, Limonene, Linalool. However, because ingredients are subject to change, we cannot guarantee that these lists are complete, up-to-date and/or error-free. For an accurate listing of ingredients in each product, please refer to your product packaging.

name: Dr Dennis Gross Alpha Beta Pore Perfecting Cleansing Gel
description: A seriously clever cleanser, Dr. Dennis Gross’ Alpha Beta Pore Perfecting Cleansing Gel gently removes excess oil, make up and surface impurities while also exfoliating away dulling, uneven cells to diminish dryness and smooth out the appearance of pores and fine lines. How does it reap such miraculous results, you might well ask? It’s all down to gently exfoliating ingredients and moisture-retaining additions. Dr. Dennis Gross’ signature Alpha Beta alpha hydroxy acids (including glycolic, mandelic and azelaic acids) gently slough away dead, dulling cells on the skin’s surface, uncovering fresh radiance while also minimising the appearance of pores. Soap and sulphate free, the vegan formula also features snow ear mushrooms, a (slightly oddly named) natural super hydrator. Willow bark, smoothing farnesol and barosma betullina (a flowering plant native to South Africa) work together to remove impurities, eliminate bacteria and decongest pores to further minimise their appearance.
how_to_use: For optimal results, use AM and PM. With wet hands, massage into wet face. Rinse thoroughly. This product is vegan
