name: Youth To The People Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Mask
description: Best paired with a good page-turner (or a stint on TikTok, depending on your persuasion), this Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Mask earned a spot in our evening rituals thanks to its impressive dew-delivering qualities. Get ready to glow... With a bright and fruity scent like an olfactory lullaby, this rich and creamy overnight mask deeply hydrates, plumps and illuminates your skin to promote a more even, youthful complexion come morning. It's powered by a quartet of hydrating heroes - from squalane and hyaluronic acid to glycerin and betaine - to flood dehydrated skin with plumping moisture; add a shot of antioxidant-rich superberries and THD ascorbate (an ultra-stable form of vitamin C that the skintellectuals swear by) and it's a recipe for visibly radiant skin. Sweet dreams!
how_to_use: At night, apply an even layer to freshly cleansed skin before heading to bed. Follow your regular cleansing routine in the morning. Use nightly for best results.

name: Caudalie Vinopure Blemish Control Salicylic Serum 30ml
description: Concentrated and potent yet gentle, the 97% natural Vinopure Blemish Control Salicylic Serum battles blemishes by gently exfoliating and unclogging pores. Formulated with the highest concentration of natural salicylic acid, grape seed polyphenols and organic essential oils, this lightweight yet potent gel serum melts into skin to help reduce blemishes, blackheads and excess oil, tightening pores and smoothing skin's texture. While the salicylic acid works hard to flush out excess oil and clarify clogged pores, rosewater works to enhance your glow and hydrate skin, preventing the formula from drying out your complexion. The formula is further enriched with antioxidant grape seed polyphenols to protect the skin and prevent the oil inside your pores from oxidising. The essential oils – including peppermint and rosemary – provide antiseptic benefits to calm skin and keep it clear, leaving it soft and smooth. As soothing as it is potent, this serum is safe for sensitive complexions and recommended for combination-oily skin, as well as those battling hormonal breakouts.
how_to_use: Apply morning and evening to face. Allow it to penetrate for a minute before applying your cream. If skin is too dry after application, limit use to once a day. Avoid eye contour. Tip: Can also be applied directly to individual imperfections.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Alcohol, Niacinamide, Butylene Glycol, Palmitoyl Grape Seed Extract, Xanthan Gum, Salicylic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Citral, Cymbopogon Citratus Leaf Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Citronellol, Geraniol, Sodium Phytate, Linalool, Lavandula Hybrida Oil, Melissa Officinalis Leaf Oil, Limonene (184/144).

name: Dr.Jart+ Vital Hydra Solution Biome Water Cream 50ml
description: The latest line in their skin-soothing collection, Dr.Jart+’s Vital Hydra Biome Water Cream ends any dew-drought with its instantly cooling and hydrating formula. It has an ultra-lightweight, fluid texture that thirsty cells gulp down, granting an incredible 30 hours of continued hydration. Helping the good bacteria essential for your skin’s health to thrive, patented Jartbiome technology is brimming fermented prebiotics (beneficial microbes) to support the skin’s moisture barrier. With not one but three types of hyaluronic acid, this intensely hydrating formula draws in and clings to moisture. Last but not least, the Hydra-Nutrition 2X booster propels your skin’s moisture levels to dewy heights. Available in a 15ml and 50ml tub, your skin never needs to be apart from this moisture miracle.
how_to_use: Apply over dry, freshly cleansed skin for a boost of moisture.

name: La Roche-Posay Cicaplast Balm B5 Multi-Purpose Repairing Balm 100ml
description: A versatile skin saviour, the Cicaplast Baume B5 Multi-Purpose Repairing Balm soothes and hydrates skin, and works wonderfully for sensitive skin types. Infusing the brand's signature Thermal Spring Water blend with 5% panthenol, relieve tight, dry and cracked skin with this non-greasy and ultra-nourishing balm. Using the most minimal of ingredients, this multi-purpose balm uses glycerin to hydrate skin and cicaplast to replenish vitamins and amino acids, seeing your skin to a healthier place. Whether it's for repairing broken skin post-injury or for areas on your body that need a little more TLC, keep this skin staple close and you'll never look back...
how_to_use: Apply daily to clean dry skin in a generous layer. Can be used on the face and body, avoiding lips and the eye contour.

name: CeraVe Foaming Cleanser with Niacinamide for Normal to Oily Skin 236ml
description: Perfect for sensitive, normal to oily, or blemish-prone skin, CeraVe’s gentle Foaming Cleanser washes away the day and deeply cleanses skin — without leaving it feeling dry or dehydrated. In fact, this hardworking cleanser will actually help to promote a healthier and more hydrated complexion by repairing and supporting your skin’s moisture barrier. This gel-like texture turns to a soft foam when powered up with water, leaving your skin feeling refreshed and purified. As with all CeraVe superheroes, at the core of this cleanser is a cocktail of three essential ceramides (lipids that are essentially the ‘glue’ of your skin barrier). Flooding your skin with these ceramides helps to keep that skin barrier in tip-top health, helping to maintain moisture levels even while cleansing your skin. CeraVe’s unique ‘MVE Technology’ means you get even more from these ceramides; it ensures they’re gradually released over time to ensure long-lasting nourishment and hydration. Worried about sensitivity? This does-it-all formula is fragrance-free and hypoallergenic too.
how_to_use: Use morning and evening. Apply to wet hands and massage into the skin, then rinse thoroughly.

D250307/1).

name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios UVMune 400 Invisible Fluid SPF50+ Sun Cream 50ml
description: Stay safe in the sun without streaking thanks to this invisible finish SPF. Housed in a non-greasy and fragrance-free formula, this is the skin-friendly SPF we want on our complexion through every season. Give your skin the protection it deserves with the Anthelios UVMune 400 Invisible Fluid SPF 50+ Sun Cream. Sensitive skin can rest assured this has been endlessly tested for its mildness on the skin, and with UVA, UVB and Ultra Long UVA protection your skin has never felt more safe. We’ll take a lifetime supply!
how_to_use: For daily usage and sun exposition. Shake before use. Apply the sunscreen product just before exposure. Re-apply frequently and generously to maintain protection, especially after perspiring or towelling.

name: RANAVAT Imperial Glow Facial Polish
description: A balm-to-milk creamy facial polish laced with adaptogenic herbs, RANAVAT's ultra-indulgent Imperial Glow Facial Polish will leave your skin soft and enviably glowy. Designed to shift the dulling dead skin cells that congest your complexion, this creamy polish is powered by an abundance of nourishing natural extracts that not only refine your skin texture but combat environmental stressors and brighten your skin. Finely milled rice powder gently extracts dead skin cells and impurities while antioxidant-rich ashwagandha helps to counter the effects of free radicals and fade the look of blemishes and hyperpigmentation. Lotus flower extract then lends the blend helpings of fatty acids and protein to balance your skin, regulating sebum production to prevent clogged pores and blemishes. Finally, a cocktail of sesame seed extract and almond oil floods your skin with soothing moisture, so it feels smooth but not stripped!
how_to_use: Apply a generous layer onto dry skin and massage onto face and neck in circular motions with a light hand avoiding eyes. Activate with warm water and rinse clean. Suggested use between one-two times a week.

name: Caudalie Vinosource-Hydra SOS Thirst-Quenching Serum 30ml
description: A swift solution to quench dehydrated complexions, the Vinosource SOS Thirst-Quenching Serum uses hyaluronic acid to moisturise and plump alongside antioxidant-rich organic grape water to soothe and improve skin barrier function. Suitable for all skin types come day or night, the 97% natural formula captures water and continuously diffuses it throughout the skin, restoring your moisture balance to keep skin feeling refreshed and supple. It stimulates your internal hydration mechanisms to encourage optimum hydration levels and soften scaly skin. For immediate and cumulative benefit, the concentrated formula provides long-lasting and soothing relief from dryness, and is infused with citrusy notes of mandarin blossom, lemon tree leaves, cucumber water and fresh mint. An update on the old formula, this fast-absorbing and vegan edition will increase your hydration levels by 44% in just one day.
how_to_use: Apply both morning and evening to cleansed skin (a little goes a long way). Leave it to sink in for a few moments before applying your cream. Use it daily underneath your cream all year round to prevent dehydrated skin from returning.

name: Biossance Overachievers Set (Worth £89.00)
description: A do-it-all kit that'll bring your skin back from the brink, the Your Clean Routine - Overachievers Kit is a Holy Grail selection of five mini BIOSSANCE bestsellers, designed to optimise your regime for visible results. The Squalane + Lactic Acid Resurfacing Night Serum swiftly exfoliates with a gentle but powerful punch of 10% vegan lactic acid, kicking skin cells into action for fast turnover and a brighter, smoother complexion come morning. The moisturising Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Oil uses a stable form of vitamin C to brighten and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, while the Squalane + Omega Repair Cream mimics skin's natural moisture barrier with lipids, squalane, omega fatty acids, ceramides and plant sterols to nourish, plump and balance skin moisture - no greasy residue in sight. Boasting a weightless (but intensely hydrating!) formula, the squalane and probiotic-infused Squalane + Probiotic Gel Moisturizer calms, moisturises, combats redness and reduces the appearance of pores. Squalane + Marine Algae Eye Cream age-defies and revitalises, with marine algae and paracress extract lifting the look of your eye contour.
how_to_use: Squalane + Marine Algae Eye Cream (3ml) Gently apply to entire eye area using ring finger. Massage around the eye, out to temple and underneath the brow bone (can be used on eyelids). Use twice a day, morning and night. For best results, use after cleansing and before serums and moisturizers. Use on top of our Squalane + Peptide Eye Gel for maximum benefits. Squalane + Lactic Acid Resurfacing Night Serum (15ml) Massage 2-3 pumps into skin at night, after applying your eye treatment. Follow with your favorite moisturizer for extra hydration. (Don't forget your neck and décolleté.) Gentle enough to use nightly. Squalane + Probiotic Gel Moisturizer (15ml) Apply to cleansed face morning and night. May be used alone or under Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Oil if more moisture is needed. Squalane + Omega Repair Cream (15ml) Apply to clean face and neck following eye products, serums and treatments. Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Oil (12ml) Gently press a few drops onto clean skin morning and night. Use the Vitamin C oil after your serum and moisturizer to lock in long-lasting hydration. You can also add a drop or two to your foundation for extra dewy coverage.

name: Peter Thomas Roth Instant FirmX Eye
description: We almost didn’t believe our eyes when we say the ‘Before’ and ‘After’ shots for Peter Thomas Roth’s Instant FIRMx® Eye treatment. The fast-acting formula provides near-instant temporary results with long-term benefits. Designed to help temporarily tighten, firm and smooth the skin of your delicate eye area, this unique formula calls on a trio of breakthrough complexes: ‘Firm-A-Tite' features three skin-tightening silicates and seaweed extract to provide the temporary firming effect; ‘Eyeliss’ is a powerful peptide complex that helps to visibly reduce the look of under-eye bags, puffiness and wrinkles over time; finally, ‘Eye Regener’ calls on alfalfa extract and hydrolyzed lupine protein to target under-eye bags over time. Simply follow the instructions to a tee to see the best results.
how_to_use: Start by cleansing with an oil-free cleanser. Make sure skin is completely dry. Do not use cream around the eye area. Shake the tube. Apply a pea-sized amount to the top of the hand. Using a makeup brush, pick up a tiny amount of the product. Using upward strokes, spread a thin layer of the gel underneath the eyes for puffiness, over the crow's feet area, over the "11" lines between the brows, and beneath and above the brow bone (but not on the moveable eyelid). Let the product dry for approximately five minutes while remaining completely expressionless. Do not squint or smile. When product is completely dry, feel free to apply powder or gently pat on foundation.

However, Q10 levels diminish over time; happily, The Inky List’s sublimely simple Q10 Serum supplements this loss. Q10 promises to protect your skin from damage caused by environmental stressors such as pollution, helping to prevent and repair damage and minimise the signs of ageing that can appear if environmental aggressors have their wicked way with your skin. Thanks to a dual peptide called Syn Tacks, which provides collagen-boosting benefits, squalane and hyaluronic acid, the formula also helps to hydrate your complexion and keep it looking vibrant and youthful.

Suitable for all skin types but especially beneficial for sensitive skin, it's powered by the brand's proprietary Green Repair Solution that melds tiger grass (otherwise known as centella asiatica or cica) with skin-strengthening herbs, minerals and probiotic ferment to flood your skin with soothing moisture. As for the ingredients that aren't included, you won't find any silicones, parabens, phthalates, mineral oil or sulphates in this dermatologist-tested formula...

name: FaceGym Multi-Sculpt High Performance Contouring Tool
description: Congested skin? All-day puffiness? Cue: the one and only Multi-Sculpt Tool that's designed to be a relaxing day at the spa and an intense gym workout all in one restoring your once-youthful complexion rid of fine lines and tension. What makes this award-winning tool so great? It's totally handmade with medical grade stainless steel that can be placed in the fridge for a maximised cooling sensation that leaves your skin feeling aaah-mazing. Created with six unique edges, this skin-perfecting slate works to release blockages, aid lymphatic drainage, depuff, define, improve circulation and most importantly sculpt your face instantly. Stretching out your muscles with a light pressure, this high-performing beauty must-have hugs the contours of your face delivering firmer, youth-boosted skin. Who needs a yoga mat when you have this tucked away in your bathroom cabinet?
how_to_use: Multi-Sculpt works with all FaceGym skin care though the brand recommends using it with Face Coach (sold separately). Start with a clean face and apply three to five drops of Face Coach Face Oil (sold separately) for a smooth glide. Each unique side has been designed to specifically target different areas of the face. LONG EDGE: De-puffs, contours, aids lymphatic drainage. GRIP: Sculpts, releases tension. MEDIUM EDGE: Contours and defines cheekbones. TEETH: Increases circulation, plumps out fine lines. SHORT EDGE: Lifts, de-puffs the eye area, reduces eyebrow tension. TIP: Reduces overall facial tension. Unlock FaceGym's exclusive Multi-Sculpt 10 Moves Face Sculpting Method by scanning the QR code on the pouch. Incorporate all 10 moves or one to two of your favorites into your everyday skincare routine for visibly transformative results. Clean with warm, soapy water after each use. FaceGym tip - keep your Multi-Sculpt in the fridge for extra-soothing and cooling benefits. The sides of your neck should be avoided during pregnancy, but other areas of the face can be worked on safely with light pressure. Avoid working directly on open lesions or rashes, including eczema and psoriasis. Do not use on broken skin, broken veins, moles, cuts, bruises, or rosacea. Do not use over stage-four acne or anything cystic, open, excreting pus, inflamed, or tender to the touch.
ingredient: Medical Grade Stainless Steel

name: Dr.Jart+ Ceramidin Ectoin-Infused Cream 50ml
description: Like a skin-loving oasis in the driest desert, the Ceramidin Ectoin-Infused Cream delivers optimal moisture as it fortifies your skin’s delicate moisture barrier layer by layer. We promise this isn’t a mirage… Powered by five moisture-locking ceramides and protective ectoin extract that’s only ever found in the harshest climates on Earth, this velvety cream forms a weightless and invisible shield over your skin. Come rain or shine, snow or haze, this weather-resistant formula instantly revives smooth, baby-soft texture. Paired with a handy, reusable applicator that makes your life that much easier, we’re forecasting irresistibly soft skin.

name: Caudalie Resvératrol Instant Firming Serum 30ml
description: A tour de force in the realm of age-defying skin care, Caudalie's Resveratrol Lift Instant Firming Serum is carefully crafted to encourage a visibly youthful visage: from smoothing facial contours to firming your skin and diminishing the look of wrinkles. The result of a partnership between Caudalie and the ultra-prestigious Harvard Medical School, this potent serum harnesses a patented blend of their cult-classic Resveratrol complex, alongside a vegan collagen booster and natural hyaluronic acid. Composed of 97% natural origin ingredients, this silky, oil-free formula melts into your skin for a non-greasy, supple effect. Don't believe us? The clinical trials and studies speak for themselves... In a genetic test in vitro, the concentration of the patent found in the serum was seen to be two times more effective than retinol on natural collagen production; while in a clinical study of 43 women over 56 days, it boasted a 84%(!) satisfaction rate surrounding its firming abilities. What's more, the product boxes for the whole Resveratrol Lift collection use lighter FSC paper, allowing their carbon footprint to be reduced by 40%, while the product vessels are fully recyclable (compared to 40% recyclable in 2019); apart from any pump or cap, which can be recuperated by Terracycle in their boutiques.

It’s time to enhance your routine with the Goddess Cleansing Ritual, a two-step miracle that will not only remove all traces of make up and impurities, but will also leave your complexion brighter, balanced and nourished. A make up-melting gel to balm, ‘Ritual 1’ is enriched with soothing inca inchi oil, hydrating Amazonian bacuri butter and antioxidant-rich, brightening vitamin C, which brightens and boosts collagen production to leave your skin vibrant and firm. Expect 24-hour hydration and endless compliments about how luminous and youthful your complexion looks.

name: By Terry Cellularose CC Serum 30ml (Various Shades)
description: Targeted towards all those concerned with dulled, dehydrated complexions in need of a radiance boost, By Terrys Cellularose Brightening CC Serum creates a subtle veil of light-reflective pearl pigments, to blur the visibility of imperfections and create a more even-toned, radiant canvas. With colour control technology, this innovative silky serum corrects uneven tone neutralising redness and disguising dark spots to restore uniformity while white rose native cells, coupled with a micro-exfoliating agent combine to gradually lighten pigmentation patches and help prevent development of new dark spots or freckles. Beautiful worn alone on good skin days, this can also be mixed with foundation to create a flawless, lit-from-within finish. Choose from four shades, or combine a couple to create a bespoke colour; Immaculate Light (lifts porcelain complexions by controlling blotchiness and enhancing radiance), Rose Elixir (neutralises washed-out, ashy tones with brightening, pink-toned particles), Apricot Glow (a flattering shade that suits fair to warm, medium skin tones) and Sunny Flash (a beautiful, bronze-toned colour to unify darker skin tones or grant paler complexions a sunkissed glow).

(T0416c1)

name: Malin + Goetz Lip Moisturiser 8.5g
description: Restoring moisture to thirsty lips, MALIN + GOETZ’s Lip Moisturiser is the hardworking antidote to cracking, chapping and dryness you’ve been looking for. The gel formula is enriched with fatty acids and plant protein-based nutrients to intensely nourish while providing lasting hydrating protection – think: soft, smooth and kiss-ready lips in a tube. Fragrance, flavour and colour-free, it’s an all-round pleaser, no matter what your skin type.
how_to_use: Apply to lips as needed.
ingredient: Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Tricaprylin, Phenoxyethanol, Bisabolol.

name: The Ordinary Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate Solution 20% in Vitamin F 30ml
description: Supercharged with an oil-soluble derivative of vitamin C (the Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate that gives this treatment its title) The Ordinary’s Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate Solution 20% in Vitamin F offers unbelievable brightening benefits. The high potency (yet gentle) solution works to block pigment production and increase cell turnover and, as well as oil-format vitamin C, the formula is enhanced with vitamin F, known to provide the skin with essential fatty acids. A few drops of this light oil-textured treatment are enough – simply apply to the entire face morning and night.
how_to_use: Apply a few drops to the entire face in the morning and/or evening.
ingredient: Coconut Alkanes, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Ethyl Linoleate, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Solanum Lycopersicum (Tomato) Fruit Extract, Squalane.

name: The Ordinary Salicylic Acid 2% Masque 100ml
description: A double portion of the original - a dream come true for long-time fans - The Ordinary's Supersize Salicylic Acid 2% Masque has been expertly formulated to work wonders for congested, oily and lacklustre skin. With more of the precious formula to work with, you can keep blemishes at bay for longer... Its namesake, salicylic acid, is the star of the show - a hardworking BHA (beta hydroxy acid) that exfoliates away dead cells both on the skin's surface and within the pore, revealing brighter and clearer skin beneath. This multi-talented ingredient also helps to soothe inflammation, reducing current blemishes as it helps to prevent future ones. Given away by the mask's jet-black hue, the formula also contains charcoal which works alongside Amazonian clays to deeply cleanse pores of impurities and grime. Clearer, smoother, more radiant skin, here we come...
how_to_use: Use once or twice a week after cleansing on dry skin. Apply evenly on your face, then leave for 10 minutes before rinsing thoroughly with lukewarm water. Do not use on sensitive, peeling or compromised skin. Avoid the eye contour and contact with eyes both during application and rinse off. Patch testing prior to use is advised: Apply the product as directed to a small area once a day for three days to test if you are sensitive to this product. If you develop severe irritation, hives, swelling of eyes and mouth, blistering, or difficulty breathing, rinse off, cease use and consult a physician right away. Keep out of reach of children. Sunburn Alert: This product contains a beta hydroxy acid (BHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Kaolin, Squalane, Glycerin, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Silica Cetyl Silylate, Salicylic Acid, Sodium Polyacrylate, Pentylene Glycol, Charcoal Powder, 4-t-Butylcyclohexanol, Sclerotium Gum, Acacia Senegal Gum, Xanthan Gum, Phytic Acid, Polysorbate 20, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol.

name: NuFACE Hydrating Aqua Gel 296ml
description: Clinically shown to deliver instant and long-lasting hydration for up to 24 hours, NuFACE's Hydrating Aqua Gel can be used with your microcurrent device of choice (simply smooth a mask-like layer over your skin) or on its own to visibly smooth and plump your skin. Drenching dry skin with a veil of hydration, this gel ensures optimal microcurrent conductivity and treatment results. Created with the powerful combination of hyaluronic acid and glacial water, this hydrating gel is uniquely designed with NuFACE IonPlex™, so the youth-prolonging microcurrents are effectively delivered to the skin’s surface and down to the muscle. There’s no need to remove this hydrating gel – simple massage it in after your treatment, or any time your skin needs a moisture boost.
how_to_use: 1. Make sure skin is clean and dry. 2. Smooth a thin mask-like layer of Aqua Gel onto your neck and face working in sections. 3. Use your favourite NuFACE microcurrent device for skin tightening, firming, and contouring. Follow with your favourite serums, moisturizer, and SPF. Where To Use: Face & Neck
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Propanediol, Sea Silt Extract, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Adenosine, Olivine Extract, Tremella Fuciformis Sporocarp Extract, Betaine, Glycerin, Carbomer, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Citrate, Tocopherol, Benzyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Potassium Sorbate, Disodium Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate, Sodium Metabisulfite, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Nitrate.

name: The Ordinary Multi-Peptide + HA Serum 60ml
description: We’d like to introduce your skin care regime to the new peptide-infused creation from The Ordinary, harnessing the power of four well-researched peptide technologies this supercharged serum works to visibly improve fine lines and boost elasticity. If you’re obsessed with the plumping prowess of your favourite hyaluronic acid serum, or are already au fait with the power of peptides against signs of ageing, then you’re going to fall head over heels for the Multi Peptide + HA Serum. From the loss of elasticity and firmness to the growing presence of crows feet and fine lines, this serum is here to lend a helping hand if you’re keen to tackle these head on. Targeting multiple signs of ageing, dehydration and overall skin appearance, a combination of peptide technologies, multiple hyaluronic acid complexion and skin-friendly amino acids all unite in this new formulation to give your skin the boost it’s been looking for.
how_to_use: Apply to the entire face in the AM and PM after cleansing. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Lactococcus Ferment Lysate, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Pentapeptide-18, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-38, Dipeptide Diaminobutyroyl Benzylamide Diacetate, Acetylarginyltryptophyl Diphenylglycine, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Sodium Hyaluronate, Allantoin, Glycine, Alanine, Serine, Valine, Isoleucine, Proline, Threonine, Histidine, Phenylalanine, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, Trehalose, Fructose, Glucose, Maltose, Urea, Sodium PCA, PCA, Sodium Lactate, Citric Acid, Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hydroxide, Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Acacia Senegal Gum, Xanthan Gum, Carbomer, Polysorbate 20, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Ethoxydiglycol, Sodium Benzoate, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin.

name: Medik8 Press and Glow Tonic 200ml
description: A toner but with a twist, the Medik8 Press & Glow gently exfoliates, resurfaces, hydrates and smooths without irritating sensitive complexions, drying or leaving any sticky residue. Utilising intelligent poly hydroxy acids (PHAs from here on out), larger molecules penetrate the skin less deeply than with popular AHAs and BHAs – two acids that can often lead to sensitisation and premature ageing when overused. This is why the Press & Glow is a safe bet for even sensitive skin, as the PHAs simply exfoliate the skin’s surface while working as a mighty moisture magnet. Meanwhile, comforting aloe vera helps to reduce irritation while also protecting against free radicals and encouraging moisture retention. Prickly pear extract works as an enzyme activator – encouraging cell renewal and therefore helping to bestow you with the ultimate glow, all while diminishing the look of fine lines. A truly formidable cocktail, this toner packs a powerful punch… gently. With sustainable 200ml refills also available, this skin care hero is good for both your face and the planet.
how_to_use: Twist the top half of the pump anti-clockwise until it clicks to activate. After cleansing in the morning and evening, hold a reusable cotton pad firmly over Press & Glow and push down 3-4 times. Sweep the pad over the complexion, avoiding the delicate eye area. Twist the pump clockwise until it clicks to avoid leakage. Always do a patch test before first use. For Press & Glow Refill, transfer the pump saved from your previous Press & Glow bottle onto the Press & Glow Refill. Please note: the visual and product name listed may differ to the packaging received due to product updates across the range. Rest assured, the formula and great results will remain the same.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Gluconolactone, Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Opuntia Ficus-Indica Flower Extract, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Citrate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate.

name: Dr.Jart+ Vital Hydra Solution Essence 50ml
description: The latest line in the skin-soothing collection, Dr.Jart+’s Vital Hydra Solution Biome Essence is designed to restore balance to your skin’s microbiome and recover sensitive skin in distress. Powered by patented probiotic-supporting (skin-friendly live bacteria and yeasts that help to balance our microbiome) Jartbiome technology, this formula features beneficial microbes to bolster your skin’s moisture barrier: dissuading moisture loss and signs of dehydration. A lesson in lasting hydration, the brand’s Triple Hyaluronic Acid complex draws in moisture and encourages retention for a plump and supple skin finish. Last but not least, their Hydra-Nutrition 2X booster propels your skin’s moisture levels to dewy heights. Available in a 50ml and a 150ml bottle, your skin never needs to be apart from this moisture miracle.
how_to_use: After using a toner, apply over the face and gently press into the skin with your hands until absorbed.
ingredient: Biome Essence: Aqua, Glycerin, Streptococcus Thermophilus Ferment, Glycereth-26, Propanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Dipropylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Butylene Glycol, Betaine, DNA, Xanthan Gum, Panthenol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Adenosine, Sodium Citrate, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Glycine, Proline, Glyceryl Glucoside, Sodium Hyaluronate, Leucine, Saccharide Isomerate, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Xylitylglucoside, Anhydroxylitol, Xylitol, Glucose. Intensive Blue Shot: Aqua, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Niacinamide, Malachite Extract, Xanthan Gum, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Adenosine, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid.

name: Aesop Protective Lip Balm SPF30 5.5g
description: Creating a featherweight shield between delicate skin and the elements, Aesop’s Protective Lip Balm SPF30 deflects UV rays while conditioning lips with a cocktail of deeply replenishing extracts. Smooth and buttery, this silky balm glides over skin to deliver a buffet of soothing, hydrating ingredients – including vitamin E and castor seed oil to delay the skin-damaging impact of daily aggressors – while broad spectrum mineral SPF 30 ensures that your lips are consistently safe from the sun. With a demi-matte finish and non-sticky feel – as well as no silicone, paraffin, beeswax (or other animal-derived ingredients) – this convenient stick is an everyday sidekick – you can even swipe it down your nose to stop things getting ‘burny’.
how_to_use: Apply generously and reapply throughout the day to maintain protection.
ingredient: Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Jojoba Esters, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Zinc Oxide (Nano), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Glyceryl Behenate, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Bis-ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Citrus Tangerina (Tangerine) Peel Oil, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Glyceryl Isostearate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Cananga Odorata Flower Oil, d-Limonene, Linalool, Benzyl Benzoate, Geraniol, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Citronellol.

name: Wander Beauty Baggage Claim Eye Masks (Pack of 6) - Gold
description: Multi-award-winning and industry-approved, Wander Beauty's individually wrapped Baggage Claim Gold Eye Masks visibly brighten, hydrate and reduce the appearance of dark circles for a youthful look. These 6-in-1 multi-tasking eye masks have caused a stir in the industry for their brightening, hydrating and de-puffing results. Infused with hyaluronic acid, calendula and camu camu extract, these also plump, treat fine lines and texture as well as prepping skin for make up application. Finally, Wander Beauty is vegan, cruelty and gluten-free as well as being free from mineral oil, parabens, phthalates and synthetic fragrances.
how_to_use: Apply onto clean, dry under-eyes. Leave on for 10-15 minutes and discard after use. Gently pat remaining serum into skin. For sensitive skin, Wander Beauty recommends a patch test on the inner arm or neck prior to use. If skin turns red, do not continue.
ingredient: Water/Eau/Aqua, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Alanine, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, Beta-Glucan, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Copper Tripeptide-1, Cysteine, Disodium Edta, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glutamic Acid, Glyceryl Caprylate, Glycine, Histidine, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Isoleucine, Lavandula Angustifolia Oil, Leucine, Lysine, Methionine, Myrciaria Dubia Fruit Extract, Natto Gum, Panthenol, Phenylalanine, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Proline, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Serine, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Threonine, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tyrosine, Valine, Xanthan Gum, Linalool

name: Kate Somerville Goat Milk Moisturising Cleanser Jumbo 240ml
description: In a generous 240ml bottle - because this is one cleanser you won't want to be without - Kate Somerville Goat Milk Cleanser Jumbo is the ultimate treat for sensitive skin. A luxurious addition to your everyday skin care routine, it nourishes as it cleanses for radiant, redness-free results. Gentle enough for twice-daily use, this softly, softly cream formula soothes delicate skin with a calming cocktail of goat milk,manuka honey and aloe. Melting away makeup, oil and impurities, it protects the skin's natural barrier with replenishing jojoba and avocado oils to leave the complexion spotlessly clean, calm and comforted.
how_to_use: AM and PM. Use twice a day. Apply a small amount to damp face and neck and massage gently for 30 seconds. Rinse and gently pat dry.

name: Wishful Chin Lift Mask 11.5g
description: Working to tighten and define for a jawline that looks like it was carved by a master sculptor, the Chin Lift Sculpting Sheet Mask clings to your chin to deliver a blend of skin-plumping ingredients. Helping to define your profile in just 20 minutes, this mask is made of a unique lifting tape: a woven cotton material that mimics the elasticity of your skin for a hold that’s taut yet comfortable. The serum-soaked mask is infused with the peptide acetyl hexapeptide-8 to attract hydration and encourage a lifted look; niacinamide to visibly tighten and reduce the look of fine lines; adenosine to deeply moisture and peppermint to cool your skin as it calms redness. This is a firm favourite, for sure…
how_to_use: Starting with a clean and dry face, peel the protective film from the mask. Tug on each end to pre-stretch the mask to avoid any discomfort during use. Starting at the chin and pulling upwards, secure the mask around the ears. Leave for 20-30 minutes (or longer for even more lift and enhancement of the jawline).
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, Agar, Sodium Polyacrylate, Niacinamide, Polyacrylic Acid, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Calanthe Discolor Extract, Adenosine, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Tartaric Acid, Anemarrhena Asphodeloides Root Extract, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Tocopherol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Menthyl Lactate, Gluconolactone, Sodium Benzoate, Cellulose Gum, Aluminum Glycinate, Hydrolyzed Corn Protein, Butylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum, 1,2-hexanediol, Calcium Gluconate, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Disodium Edta, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance/Parfum.

name: Caudalie Vinoperfect Concentrated Brightening Glycolic Essence 150ml
description: Suitable for all skin types come day or night, the Vinoperfect Concentrated Brightening Glycolic Essence kickstarts your routine with its brightening and tone-evening prowess. Boasting a delicious serum-lotion texture that effortlessly absorbs into skin, use this to lessen and prevent the look of dark spots - whether they're caused by pregnancy, the sun, blemishes or age. Effective but gentle, the formula works by doing away with dull dead cells to reveal brighter skin underneath - illuminating, evening, refining and hydrating skin in the process. Also prepping the skin for later serums and moisturisers, this essence doubles the efficacy of Caudalie's Vinoperfect Serum, and boasts a 98% natural formula with 100% recyclable packaging. Organic grape water moisturises, soothes and balances with prebiotics while white peony illuminates and evens, and glycolic acid does the heavy lifting by actually removing the dead cells. Complete with a delicate orange blossom fragrance (natural, of course!) this essence delivers an instant sensation of freshness and uplifts the senses too.
how_to_use: After cleansing and toning, apply a few drops of the essence onto your fingertips (or a cotton pad), and tap gently into the face and neck. Apply to face and neck. Avoid the eye contour area.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Water, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Water, Glycerin, Methylpropanediol, Glycolic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Hydroxide, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Juice, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Arginine, Paeonia Lactiflora Root Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Phytate, Phenylpropanol, Linalool, Limonene.(190/064)

name: LANEIGE Water Bank Blue Hyaluronic Exfoliating Toner 160ml
description: The first step to refined and brightened skin starts with this exfoliating toner that smoothes skin but doesn't skimp on hydration. Featuring the hero ingredient hyaluronic acid but not as you know it! The 'blue' in the name refers to a form of hyaluronic acid that is fermented with deep sea algae, which has a low molecular weight - meaning intense and long-lasting hydration can penetrate deeper into the skin. The PHA Soy-Yeast Complex (made up of gluconolactone (PHA), lactobacillus/soybean ferment extract and yeast ferment extract) with polyhydroxy acid is a powerful blend of exfoliating ingredients that gently smoothes and refines skin but also restores balance, which is good news for those who love a good hot water rinse! A few swipes of this toner and consider your skin locked and loaded for the rest of your skin-loving routine.
how_to_use: Using a cotton pad, sweep gently over face morning and evening after cleansing.
ingredient: Water / Aqua / Eau, Butylene Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, 1,2-hexanediol, Betaine, Trehalose, Diethoxyethyl Succinate, Ppg-13-decyltetradeceth-24, Xanthan Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Fragrance / Parfum, Mentha Arvensis Leaf Extract, Disodium Edta, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Propanediol, Gluconolactone, Aureobasidium, Pullulans Ferment, Lactobacillus/Soybean Ferment Extract, Yeast Ferment Extract, Tocopherol, Undaria Pinnatifida Extract.

name: COSRX BHA Blackhead Power Liquid 100ml
description: A pioneering essence from the heart of skin care innovation, CosRx’s BHA Blackhead Power Liquid works to keep breakouts at bay – preventing pores from harbouring spot-causing dirt and oils, so your complexion looks completely poreless. Apply directly to affected areas – most commonly nose, cheeks and chin – and massage in to maximise absorption. This see-through elixir may look innocent, but is guilty of serious skin-clearing efficacy – purifying pores and brightening dark spots with cell-energising niacinamide.
how_to_use: This blackhead-blasting power liquid can be applied as toner or after toner. Its texture is light and slippery, so it should be used in the initial steps of your skin care routine after cleansing. Dispense 1 to 2 pumps onto back of hand and use your fingers to apply to face. Gently massage the blackhead-prone zone. You can also apply onto a cotton pad.
ingredient: Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Water, Butylene Glycol, Betaine Salicylate, Niacinamide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Arginine, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Xanthan Gum, Ethyl Hexanediol

name: REN Clean Skincare Radiance Brightening Dark Circle Eye Cream 5ml
description: Starring 95% nature-derived ingredients to brighten dark circles in only a week, REN Clean Skincare’s Radiance Brightening Dark Circle Eye Cream is great for those bothered by under-eye shadows. Now in a smaller size, you can see what the fuss is about before committing to the full-sized formula or stock up on a travel-friendly edition of your favourite formula! Completely non-irritating which makes it ideal for the sensitive-skinned (or the watery-eyed), this formula harnesses elderberry flower extract (a zero-waste by-product of the French perfume industry), alongside sustainably sourced glycogen (from non-GMO corn) to smooth, tone and brighten the entire eye area – including the eyelid. With no added fragrance, the luxurious, water-in-oil formula is lightweight and swiftly absorbed – simply tap in a circle around each eye, from just above the cheekbone round, and up along the brow bone – to help you look enviably rested.
how_to_use: After cleansing and applying moisturiser, split a rice-grain-sized amount between two fingers and gently massage over the under-eye, eyelid and brow bone area till absorbed. To use as a hydrating mask, apply a slightly thicker layer on the under-eye area at night.

name: Shani Darden Skin Care Hydration Peptide Cream 75ml
description: After all, what would your skin be without a barrier-boosting best friend? Lean on the Hydration Peptide Cream for moisture-drenching support, whatever the weather! Incredibly rich but non-greasy, this oil-free moisturiser is blended with nourishing shea butter, squalane and glycerin which work together to send waves of hydration to parched pores that need it most — without clogging up your pores! Lasting for up to 72 hours, this reparative cream seeps into even the driest crevices of your face and plumps them up from within to unveil supremely supple skin.
how_to_use: Apply daily to clean, dry skin morning and night. Massage onto face, neck, and decolletage. Appropriate for use with retinol, AHA/BHAs, vitamin C and most actives.

name: La Roche-Posay Retinol B3 Anti-Ageing Serum 30ml
description: Count on this serum to deliver a healthy glow with its 0.3% infusion of retinol that helps to refine your complexion towards an even and radiant visage. This pure and slow-releasing dose of retinol ensures that you can enjoy all the perks of the much-loved vitamin in a gentle way that won't irritate sensitive skin (or any other skin types!). Key to an age-defying skin care routine, this lightweight serum reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, improves uneven texture, and firms up skin to its former bouncy self. Plus, the addition of glycerin and vitamin B3 bolsters retinol's effects, whilst delivering a hit of heavy hydration, leaving your skin looking positively glowing and brighter than ever.
how_to_use: 1. Fill dropper with serum and apply in the evening on face and neck. 2. Apply after cleansing. Always use in conjunction with a moisturiser. 3. Always wear in conjunction with sunscreen when going out during the day. 4. Pure retinol can react on contact with the air, turning yellow. This does not impair its tolerance or efficacy.

name: Kinship Brightwave Vitamin C Energizing and Brightening Eye Cream 15ml
description: Pep up tired, puffy eyes with Kinship Brighwave Vitamin C Energizing + Brightening Eye Cream. Clinically proven to brighten dark circles, this supercharged cream leaves under eyes looking well rested and primed for concealer (not that you'll feel like you need it!). An energising blend of vitamin C, red algae and chaga mushroom, this brightening eye cream works to rapidly depuff, hydrate, and smooth away fine lines. With a rich, cooling texture (that's intentionally fragrance free to avoid irritating delicate skin) it leaves the under eye area looking refreshed and wide awake - even when you're feeling less than perky.
how_to_use: Use your ring finger to gently tap around the eye area, morning and evening. A pea-sized amount is enough for both eyes. Use as an primer before concealer for smoother application or tap over concealer to refresh the look of eyes and add a touch of brightness.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil*, Astrocaryum Tucuma Seed Butter, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Diheptyl Succinate, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Jania Rubens Extract, Inonotus Obliquus (Mushroom) Extract, Benzyl Alcohol, Bentonite, Hippophae Rhamnoides Oil*, Arachidyl Alcohol, Jojoba Oil/Macadamia Seed Oil Esters, Lactobacillus Ferment, Behenyl Alcohol, Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Arachidyl Glucoside, Citric Acid, Olive Oil Decyl Esters, Sodium Phytate, Squalene, Dehydroacetic Acid, Hydrated Silica, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Lactic Acid, Phytosteryl Macadamiate, Sodium Carrageenan, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Glucose, Phytosterols, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sea Salt, Tocopherol. *Certified Organic

name: MALIN + GOETZ Best Sellers Travel Kit
description: This convenient kit contains minis of six of MALIN + GOETZ’s most loved hair, body and face products, each enclosed within the brand’s signature chic, sustainable packaging. At 30ml each, these travel-friendly tubes can be thrown into your hand luggage for on-the-go top ups of your skincare favourites. To soothe stressed post-flight skin, the kit includes the gentle amino acid-infused Grapefruit Cleanser and the calming Vitamin E Face Moisturizer. For hair, look to the energising Peppermint Shampoo (great for when the jet lag kicks in) and smoothing Cilantro Hair Conditioner loaded with hydrating shea butter. Finally, for body you can’t go wrong with the kit’s cleansing-not-stripping Bergamot Hand + Body Wash followed by the Vitamin B5 Body Moisturiser, which deeply nourishes thanks to provitamin b5 and skin-essential fatty acids.
how_to_use: Face: Lather a small amount of cleanser in hands and gently massage onto wet skin. Rinse clean with water. Apply a small amount of moisturizer to cleansed, dry skin. Body: Apply body wash to wet skin, gently work into a lather and rinse clean. Apply moisturiser to cleansed, dry skin. Hair: Massage a small amount of shampoo onto wet hair and scalp to create a gentle lather. Rinse clean. Apply a small amount of conditioner to clean, wet hair, especially the ends. Leave on for three minutes, then rinse clean.

name: Caudalie SOS Intense Moisturizing Cream 50ml
description: If you suffer with seriously red and tired skin, allow the Vinosource SOS Intense Moisturizing Cream to work its soothing, comforting magic. Ideal for normal, dry and sensitive skin types, this rich and gentle medley of 95% natural ingredients will nourish, repair and replenish lost moisture. Delivering an intense shot of plumping moisture, use this as an emergency treatment for damaged, irritated skin at the hands of external stresses. A subtle plant-based fragrance of bergamot, mandarin, lemon tree leaves, cucumber and fresh mint will uplift and refresh while borage oil encourages suppleness and elasticity, vinolevure deeply moisturises and antioxidant polyphenols promote a youthful complexion. Olive squalane hydrates without feeling oily, and organic grape water soothes while promoting healthy barrier function.
how_to_use: Apply morning and evening to the face and neck, after your serum.

name: Le Labo Lip Balm
description: A non-sticky, non-glossy balm made with plant-derived oils and nut butters to cherish your kiss and protect from the drying effects of this elements, this gorgeous formula’s free from all colours, artificial colours, fragrance, parabens and phthalates. Housed in an über chic tube, keep Le Labo’s Lip Balm in your pocket to soften, replenish and ward against chapped, scaly skin. Made for your lips but equally perfect for comforting sensitive patches, protecting a scald or preventing cracked cuticles – simply massage wherever your skin needs intense TLC.
how_to_use: Apply to lips, cuticles or any skin needing repair and protection.
ingredient: Polyisobutene, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric/Myristic/Stearic Triglyceride, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Jojoba Esters, Sorbitan Olivate, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Dipentaerythrityl Hexacaprylate/Hexacaprate, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Hydrogenated Olive Oil, Tridecyl Stearate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil Unsaponifiables, Caprylyl Glycol, Neopentyl Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Citric Acid, Tocopherol

name: Medik8 Micellar Mousse 150ml
description: Your go-to make up-melting formula, but not as you know it... Medik8's innovative Micellar Mousse is an ultra-gentle, hydrating cleanser that lifts away impurities to reveal refreshed, comforted skin. Its saturated with olive oil-infused micelles tiny molecules that grab dirt, oils, pollution and make up - to purify and replenish your skin, leaving it soft, supple and moisturised. Effortless to use and beautifully gentle against even the most delicate skin, this pH-balanced, sulphate-free formula delivers the ultimate fuss-free cleanse. Whats more, its also formulated with moringa extract clarify your skin and glycerin to gently hydrate. Psst, did we say that its vegan-friendly, cruelty-free and made without alcohol and artificial fragrance? Were obsessed!
how_to_use: Every morning and evening, pump a small amount of Micellar Mousse into the palm of the hand and massage into moistened face and neck. Gently remove by splashing with water and pat face dry. Best to use after removing stubborn waterproof eye make-up. Please note: the visual and product name listed may differ to the packaging received due to product updates across the range. Rest assured, the formula and great results will remain the same.

name: Augustinus Bader The Eye Patches Single Sachet
description: Here’s a product worth batting your lashes over. Powered by Augustinus Badiner’s legendary TFC8® complex, these revitalising hydrogel eye patches are a tour de force when it comes to looking after your peepers. They’re formulated with a potent mix of ultra-smart ingredients that boast game-changing benefits, including acetylated hyaluronic acid, which delivers superior moisture retention to conventional hyaluronic. Niacinamide helps to calm redness and diminish fine lines and wrinkles, while fermented polysaccharide strengthens and plumps the skin and brighten dark circles (what late night?). Leave them on for 20 minutes and use the time to focus on your self-care routine, be that relaxing in the bath or turning the pages of your latest must-read. The results? A calmer state of mind and luminous, youthful-looking peepers.
how_to_use: Apply on clean, dry skin 2-3 times per week, or as desired. Apply the patches under the eyes and leave on for 20 minutes. Follow with your Augustinus Bader skincare routine.

name: St. Tropez Tan Remover Mitt
description: This specially designed mitt effectively removes tan build up and buffs away dry skin, leaving it ready to reapply a perfect sun-kissed tan base. An SOS treatment for even fully developed tans, this intelligent mitt helps to correct tanning mistakes as well as helping to ensure skin in super soft, silky and perfect for a flawless tan application. Simply wet skin and gently buff in circular motions on the targeted area to help erase mistakes and soften skin in rough areas.
how_to_use: Use on wet skin in gentle circular motions with your regular bath or shower products. Apply extra pressure to elbows, knees, ankles, feet and hands or where tan build up is obvious. To correct tanning mistakes, dampen skin then use your index finger inside the mitt and apply to the affected area.

name: La Roche-Posay Effaclar MAT 40ml
description: This hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic formula harnesses ‘Sebulyse’ to reduce and control excess sebum production, giving back oil-prone skin types control over their skin. Oil-free hydration has never felt so good thanks to La Roche-Posay and their tried and tested Effaclar range. Gone are the days of blotting papers and hourly touch-ups, this even doubles up as the perfect primer under make up! Add in skin-conditioning active zinc PCA to fend off ageing aggressors and our old-faithful salicylic acid to keep pores visibly reduced and clear this is climbing the charts of our Holy Grail mattifying moisturisers.
how_to_use: Apply to face and neck morning and/or evening after cleansing.

name: Paula's Choice Defense Hydrating Gel-To-Cream Cleanser
description: Start your skin care routine with this refreshing and silky smooth Defense Hydrating Gel-to-Cream Cleanser that not only makes light work of melting make up, but it also lifts away dirt, excess oil and skin-dulling pollutants for a beautiful finish you'll adore. This gel-to-cream formula is infused with a triple superfood complex of green tea, liquorice and soy to neutralise surface pollutants while restoring the skin's natural moisture barrier too. Beginning as a silky soft and refreshing gel, this luxe cleanser transforms into a luscious cream that never strips or dries just leaves skin feeling thoroughly cleansed, balanced and ready for the next step of your routine.
how_to_use: Use morning and evening. Splash the face and eyes generously with water. Apply a small amount of cleanser to your face using vigorous yet gentle circular motions. Rinse well. Repeat or use with a clean washcloth to remove heavy make up.

name: Peace Out Peace Out Puffy Eyes
description: Starring six pairs of under-eye patches, the Peace Out Puffy Eyes set is a clever investment for anyone whose sleeping schedule is erratic, to say the least. At this point, eight hours of uninterrupted sleep feels like a myth so these are going straight into our bags... Crafted from biocellulose, these soothing under-eye patches help to awaken sleepy-looking eyes by diminishing the look of puffiness and dark circles in just 15 minutes. Rather than just hydrating the surface of your skin with hyaluronic acid - no shade here, it does work wonders with dehydration lines - they're also soaked with caffeine to help relieve the water retention that makes your contours appear puffy, as well as niacinamide to promote a brighter, well-rested look. We'll take the lot!
how_to_use: Remove patch from pouch and remove the top and bottom clear protective liners. After cleansing, place the patches onto the skin and adjust them to fit comfortably under the eyes. Remove the patches after 15 minutes. Do not rinse. Pat excess serum into the skin.

name: Caudalie Resvératrol [lift] Firming Cashmere Cream 50ml
description: Designed for mature skin with dwindling levels of collagen and hyaluronic acid, this Resveratrol Lift Firming Cashmere Cream is composed of potent ingredients of 97% natural origin to encourage more defined contours and boost elasticity for a youthful effect. The result of a partnership between Caudalie and the ultra-prestigious Harvard Medical School, this age-defying concoction harnesses a patented blend of their cult-classic Resveratrol complex, alongside a vegan collagen booster and natural hyaluronic acid. This supercharged, vegan cream feels as soft as its namesake on your skin and helps to diminish the look of fine lines and wrinkles as it plumps your skin. Plus, the clinical trials and studies speak for themselves... In a genetic test in vitro, the formula was seen to increase the natural production of hyaluronic acid twofold and collagen fivefold(!), while in a clinical study of 42 women over 52 days, it boasted a 95%(!) satisfaction rate surrounding its firming abilities. Plus, the product boxes for the whole Resveratrol Lift collection use lighter FSC paper, allowing their carbon footprint to be reduced by 40%, while the product vessels are fully recyclable (compared to 40% recyclable in 2019); apart from any pump or cap, which can be recuperated by Terracycle in their boutiques.
how_to_use: Apply in the morning to face and neck, either by itself or after your serum.

name: Jordan Samuel Skin Moisture Recovery Cream 50ml
description: For skin that can’t get enough moisture, look to this deeply moisturising cream to deliver and lock in maximum hydration, whether your skin errs on the dry, combination or sensitive side. Brimming with all the skin saviours you know and love: olive-derived squalane contains fatty acids and moisturises the skin while adding antioxidants; glycerin is a humectant that is highly hydrating for the skin and responsible for that baby-soft, supple touch; last but not least, the naturally-occurring ceramide NG helps to reduce transepidermal water loss while maintaining a strong barrier. If that doesn’t sound like it’ll quench thirsty skin, we don’t what will. Made to inspire your playful side, mix and match this moisturiser with your favourite hydrating oil, layer it lightly with another hydrator or go it alone with this good stuff.
how_to_use: Use alone as a rich moisturiser or mix, match, layer and be creative! Simply layer after a hydrator and before an oil, or mix with a serum and/or oil to curate your bespoke skincare performance.

Powered by niacinamide, bakuchiol and skin-brightening vitamin C, this water-based serum-like balm smooths away even the finest of lines with an effortless glide. name: Dr Dennis Gross Skincare Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel (Pack of 5)
description: A quick and convenient way to rejuvenate your complexion, Dr. Grosss Extra Strength formula is the only peel on the market to combine five alpha- and beta-hydroxy acids with potent, wrinkle-wrestling antioxidants (including retinol (vitamin A), ubiquinone and resveratrol), to simultaneously smooth, refine and protect your skin in a jiffy. The patented two-step pads instantly enhance skins luminosity, while with regular use, youll quickly see a difference in the visibility of pores, redness and uneven skin tone (the formulas phenomenally brightening). name: Biossance Squalane and Antioxidant Cleansing Oil 200ml
description: Ultra-lightweight and deeply purifying, the Squalane + Antioxidant Cleansing Oil draws make up and impurities from your skin to reveal a fresh-faced, healthy radiance. Make way for your new first cleanse essential. Brimming with antioxidants and the deeply hydrating, sugarcane-derived squalane oil, this cleansing oil dissolves the day (read: make up, oil and impurities) from your face. The best part? The extra-gentle formula doesn’t strip essential moisture from your skin or leave behind a filmy, greasy residue. Instead, the antioxidant blend helps to strengthen and restore your skin, while squalane grants weightless (and lasting!) moisture. Pillowy, post-cleanse skin, here we come…

A cleansing milk-slash-oil hybrid, this gentle, mildly acidic formula gently melts away make up and daily dirt to leave your skin clean and ready for the rest of your regime. Powered by sources of antioxidants and amino acids, this good-to-skin blend will take effect long after you rinse it away. One such ingredient is amino acid-rich white tea leaves - grown in the shade of tea fields of South Korea's Jeju Island and harvested once a year - that effectively strengthen, moisturise, and soothe your skin, leaving it soft and refreshed!

name: Youth To The People Retinal and Niacinamide Youth Serum 30ml
description: Looking to upgrade your skin care routine with retinol but don't know where to start? Cue: Youth to the People's Retinal + Niacinamide Youth Serum. Like a gentler version of the highest dose of retinol, this retinal serum works just as hard to brighten and refine skin - all without the purging horror stories. The hero ingredient, retinal, uses the power of retinaldehyde (the most potent non-prescription retinoid) to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles as well as improve blemished and textured skin with its smoothing powers. Not only that, the formula infuses 5% niacinamide to soothe skin with hydration while ceramides, ashwagandha (a powerful antioxidant) and cloudberry seed (rich in antioxidant vitamin E) support your skin barrier and bolster the effect of retinal. Where traditional retinoid serums are known to cause irritation and take a long time for skin to acclimate, this gentle serum skips over that step and sets you on a fast-track to visibly brighter, radiant skin in no time.
how_to_use: At night, apply a pea-sized amount to clean, dry skin. Use 1-2x/week to start, then every other night, as tolerated. Follow with moisturiser. Alternatively: At night, apply a pea-sized amount to clean, dry skin. To start, use 1-2x/week. Then, gradually work up to nightly usage as tolerated. Follow with moisturiser. Use a broad-spectrum SPF. Warning: Avoid eyes and broken skin. In case of contact with eyes, rinse thoroughly. If irritation occurs, discontinue and consult a specialist. For external use only.

name: Biossance Squalane and BHA Pore Minimising Toner 120ml
description: Clearer and smaller-looking pores can be yours-without ever risking tightness or dryness thanks to Biossance's Squalane + BHA Pore Refining Toner which uses hydrating squalane and BHA-rich willow bark to gently decongest and balance oil levels, revealing smooth, refined skin. The secret to this formula is raw white willowbark, a powerful source of natural BHAs with multiple benefits: inflammation-calming, dead skin-dissolving, and texture-smoothing. Blended with hydrating squalane, it's a first-of-its-kind fusion that dislodges and exfoliates away excess oil, dirt, and debris while also quenching skin. This blend of ancient wisdom and modern technology is made to balance the oiliest skin types without dehydrating the driest, and leaves skin refreshed and ready for the rest of your skin care regimen.

name: innisfree Intensive Hydrating Toner with Green Tea Seed 200ml
description: Lightweight and loaded with hydration, the Intensive Hydrating Toner with Green Tea Seed moisturises and bolsters skin ahead of subsequent steps, making it an unmissable part of every skin care-obsessive’s routine. Hailing all the way from Korea’s Jeju Island, Innisfree’s ‘Fresh Green Tea Water 2.0’ technology infuses green tea seed oil and green tea water extracts that are packed with 16 minerals and amino acids to nourish your skin barrier. Not to mention this hero ingredient add buckets of moisture, helping to achieve glass-like, glowy skin. Enveloping skin a in a veil of hydration, the ‘Dual-Moisture-Rising’ technology also strengthens the lipid barrier, so your skin is protected way beyond application. Undoing any H20 that may have been lost during a single or double cleanse, this moisturising toner drenches skin and brings balance back to your skin.

name: Paula's Choice Clear Ultra-Light Daily Mattifying Fluid SPF 30+ (60ml)
description: Formulated for oilier, blemish-prone skin types, this featherweight moisturiser keeps skin balanced, healthy and calm – not to mention protected from harmful and ageing UV rays with broad-spectrum SPF30. With a non-greasy fluid consistency, the clever formula mattifies excess shine and minimises the appearance of pores to lend a smooth canvas perfectly primed for make up application or for wearing in its bare, beautiful glory. A blend of vitamin-dense plant extracts – think: green tea, pomegranate and goji among others – add their antioxidant properties to the mix, soothing any upsets, fading red marks and defending against environmental stressors. Perfect for wearing the daytime, this multi-tasking hero comes in both full (60ml) and travel (15ml) sizes – perfect for on-the-go or trialling before investing in the full size.

name: CeraVe Foaming Cleanser with Niacinamide for Normal to Oily Skin 236ml
description: Perfect for sensitive, normal to oily, or blemish-prone skin, CeraVe’s gentle Foaming Cleanser washes away the day and deeply cleanses skin — without leaving it feeling dry or dehydrated. In fact, this hardworking cleanser will actually help to promote a healthier and more hydrated complexion by repairing and supporting your skin’s moisture barrier. This gel-like texture turns to a soft foam when powered up with water, leaving your skin feeling refreshed and purified. As with all CeraVe superheroes, at the core of this cleanser is a cocktail of three essential ceramides (lipids that are essentially the ‘glue’ of your skin barrier). Flooding your skin with these ceramides helps to keep that skin barrier in tip-top health, helping to maintain moisture levels even while cleansing your skin. CeraVe’s unique ‘MVE Technology’ means you get even more from these ceramides; it ensures they’re gradually released over time to ensure long-lasting nourishment and hydration. Worried about sensitivity? This does-it-all formula is fragrance-free and hypoallergenic too.

name: Kora Organics Turmeric Brightening and Exfoliating Mask 30ml
description: A true does-it-all complexion rescue treatment, KORA Organics Turmeric Brightening & Exfoliating Mask addresses congested pores, uneven skin texture, dullness, sun damage, hyperpigmentation, linesandscarring. Phewph! A gentle alternative to glycols or AHAs, the Turmeric Brightening & Exfoliating Mask utilises aspen bark and peppermint for their anti-bacterial properties that prevent blemish-causing bacteria, while peppermint also cools for an invigorating and refreshing experience. Meanwhile, papaya enzymes continue to clear pores, stimulating renewal and dissolving dead skin cells too. But dont forget turmeric(!), this powerhouse ingredient diminishes the appearance of pigmentation while brightening, all while relieving redness and calming sensitive skin due to its anti-inflammatory properties. The ancient and much-loved spice also protects against environmental stressors and helps to delay the signs of ageing. Infused with finely crushed amethyst to create a soft, luminous glow while passing on vibrations of positivity, motivation and balance to have a calming effect on your emotions, this mask is the ultimate spa-at-home hero.

No need to worry, redness should subside after 15-20 minutes.Note: The colour of this product may change over time due to the organic nature of the active ingredientsyou will still receive all of the same powerful benefits.

name: Kate Somerville ExfoliKate Intensive Exfoliating Treatment 15ml
description: Known as ‘The Hollywood 2-minute facial’, ExfoliKate is Kate Somerville’s bestselling, dual-action exfoliator, which delivers incredible results in as little as one use. The secret to a glowing, ‘fresh from the skin clinic’ complexion lies in the advanced ingredients used in this formula. Papaya, pineapple and pumpkin enzymes (Kate’s ‘three Ps for perfect skin’) as well as natural alpha hydroxy acid, lactic acid, work to counteract dullness, dryness and uneven skin tone and texture by loosening and sloughing away dead, dulling cells to reveal the beautifully balanced, even radiance beneath – without drying. Alongside this enzymatic exfoliation, gently scrubbing silica provides physical exfoliation, while soothing aloe vera, antibacterial honey and antioxidant vitamin E soften skin and calm any potential irritation. Finally, rosewood and cinnamon extracts combine to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Massaged in for 30 seconds and left on for up to two minutes, you’ll get gorgeously glowing in no time.
how_to_use: Use once or twice a week, AM or PM. Apply a thin, even layer to a clean, wet face, massaging in a circular motion for 30 seconds. Leave on for up to two minutes. Rinse and gently pat dry. Precautions: This product may cause the skin to tingle and flush slightly for a short time. For sensitive skin, leave on for less than one minute or mix it into your favourite cleanser for a gentler exfoliation. Please be mindful that Kate Somerville is a clinical brand who pride themselves on real results. While they infuse active ingredients with vitamins and botanicals for minimal downtime, if you haven’t used a particular ingredient at a clinically proven level before, we recommend you always patch test first. (Apply to a small area of the skin).

name: Sunday Riley Pink Drink Firming Resurfacing Essence 50ml
description: Like a shot of firming and replenishing moisture to your skin, this Pink Drink Essence from Sunday Riley comes to the rescue of compromised complexions by protecting your natural microbiome. A peptide duo of Acetyl Tetrapeptide-9 and Acetyl Tetrapeptide-11 works in synergy to promote firmer skin thats a vision of youth, while a concoction of chlorella, kelp, pink yeast filtrate and fermented honey lend the formula a prebiotic effect: to nurture the aforementioned microbiome. A green tea-derived antioxidant, ceramides and vitamin-rich apricot and cucumber extracts are the finishing touches, that reveal a soft, fresh-faced finish. In essence (bad-dum-tss), this nourishing cocktail is here to quench and calm your skin, so it appears renewed and beautifully soft.

name: Fresh Rose Instant Hydration Mist 100ml
description: Enjoy a luxurious pick-me-up throughout the day with this lightly-scented facial mist that keeps your hydration levels topped up and skin feeling perky For a look that is radiant, dewy and highly hydrated, indulge in one, two, or even three spritzes of this replenishing mist. It's perfect for priming your skin ahead of your regular regime and lending an inner-glow look to your finished make up routine. Whether you're at home, at the office, on a plane or just feeling extra, take this travel-friendly beauty everywhere to refresh your face and neck. Thanks to the infusion of damask rose extract and rosewater, it even promises to reduce the look of pores - and in one study, 89% of people agreed! For irritated skin types, the rosewater can also help to soothe stressed-out skin. Consider this mist a moment of self-care as the notes of rose lend a soothing scent that calms the senses while instantly replenishing skin.
how_to_use: Gently spritz onto the face and neck. Can be used to set makeup or to prime and refresh the skin throughout the day.

name: Byoma Moisturising Rich Cream Refill 50ml
description: Rich in skin-loving moisture magnets that melt into fine lines and creases to intensely hydrate and improve your skin’s texture for plump, supple results. Heart eyes. Already well-versed in this skin saviour but in need of a top up? Simply keep your colourful container and stock up on a handy refill. In true BYOMA fashion, this Moisturising Rich Cream is of course infused with a unique blend of barrier boosting tri-ceramide complexes and hero ingredients with restorative properties like bakuchiol and shea extract. These superstar actives are purposefully chosen to help reinforce your skin moisture barrier for up to 24hrs, leaving your face feeling soft-to-touch even in the bitterly cold winter months. A quick, rich fix for thirsty skin that’s instantly nourishing and deeply hydrating placed into a brightly packaged bottle with an endless supply of skin-loving goodies that’ll surely stand out in your bathroom cabinet. Dermatologist tested and approved, oil-free, non-comedogenic, alcohol and fragrance-free, vegan and cruelty free. Universally effective for all skin types.
how_to_use: Apply 1-2 pumps on cleansed skin following serum application AM + PM. Smooth onto skin until fully absorbed. Once you run out, replenish your stock with a refill pod.

name: Elemis Dynamic Resurfacing Pads (60 Pads)
description: Easy-to-use pads that smooth, resurface and exfoliate in a single swipe, the Dynamic Resurfacing Pads are a dream to use on dull, tired skin for an instant pick me up. Charged with Elemis’ patented Tri-Enzyme Technology that breaks up the layer of dead cells atop your skin’s surface without aggravating your delicate skin barrier, the potent (but gentle!) formula also uses a probiotic ferment complex to support the renewal process by encouraging skin to shed its dead weight, while AHA lactic acid gently exfoliates to improve overall texture and tone. Gentle enough to be used twice daily, these pads reduce the look of hyperpigmentation, pores and unevenness, all while leaving skin feeling bright and baby-soft.
how_to_use: Use every morning and evening after cleansing. Smooth pad, texture side down, over the face in a circular motion.

As if decanted from the Fountain of Youth itself, this velvet-textured cream is imbued with a unique cocktail of retinol (at a low-strength, yet effective 0.2% concentration), peptides and antioxidants in order to visibly soften the look of wrinkles and fine lines, while encouraging a more supple finish. The youth-preserving yet good-to-skin formula also harnesses proven emollients to fortify your skin's moisture barrier - the uppermost layer of skin (formed of cells and lipids) that protects against environmental aggressors and prevents essential moisture from escaping. The results? A healthy-looking, age-defying glow.
how_to_use: Ideal for softening and smoothing the face, neck and eye area. At night, use this as the last step in your skin care routine. For daytime, follow with a broad-spectrum sunscreen rated SPF 30 or greater.

Crafted to promote a visibly lifted look, this youth-prolonging cocktail fuses retinol with bakuchiol and ferulic acid; as a collagen-stimulator, retinol plumps skin, fine lines and texture while bakuchiol does much of the same as well as reinforcing your skin’s moisture barrier. Meanwhile, ferulic acid fights UV-damage and counteracts any retinol-related irritation. A medley of arnica and centella asiatica (both impressive antioxidants!) then helps to replenish your skin to reveal a soft, hydrated complexion.

name: Selfless by Hyram Mandelic Acid and Rice Bran Gentle Exfoliating Serum 30ml
description: Does your skin feel overly congested and kind of…full? Take a load off with this combination of mandelic acid, salicylic acid and PHA that work together to gently exfoliate, prevent clogged pores and reveal a smoother surface. More than just a healthy food option that’s great for our bodies, this rice bran has been sustainably sourced for this groundbreaking serum. Its natural phytic acid is extracted and repurposed as an effective chemical exfoliator and once blended with texture-targeting mandelic acid, your skin is sure to feel softer than ever! You’ll feel your skin slowly start to exhale sighs of relief as the unwanted dirt and debris that was camping on your skin finds the nearest exit. Incoming: glowing skin in 3, 2, 1…

The lightweight serum sinks into the skin with a green-to-beige formula for a skin-balancing effect. Suitable for even the most sensitive of skin types, the drops are formed with a proprietary complex of cica and herbs to promote the look of a unified skin tone. The lightweight serum is topped off with naturally-derived zinc oxide and titanium dioxide to defend the skin from UVA and UVB rays. Lending a soothing effect to the skin, the hydrating formula creates the illusion of a glowing, dewy visage, and can be used under makeup as an illuminating primer.

The benefits don't stop there; the formula utilises the soothing properties of ectoin to help nourish the moisture barrier and soften the skin, supported by a MicroCelle Delivery System to enhance the efficacy of the ingredients. name: ZitSticka MEGASHADE Breakout-proof SPF Serum
description: Combining the broad-spectrum UVA and UVB protection of an SPF with the skin-nourishing benefits of a serum, the MEGASHADE Breakout-proof SPF 50 Sunscreen Serum is the new staple of your morning skincare routine. An effective two-in-one formula that leaves a luminous glow and zero white cast, let's just say this formula is something of an overachiever. For ultimate protection, the sunscreen-serum uses a mineral-chemical filter hybrid. Non-irritating zinc oxide (3%) creates a physical barrier between UV rays and your skin, while chemical filters absorb UV rays and turn them into heat, neutralising free radicals long before they can do harm to your skin. To beat blemishes, this non-comedogenic formula is packed with niacinamide to sooth breakouts and tea tree to boot spot-causing bacteria from your face. Rounding out the mega formula are a host of reliable hydrators to nourish and plump skin; think colloidal oatmeal, ceramides and hyaluronic acid. Yep, this dew-giving serum is guaranteed to make the rest of your shelfie look oh-so-lazy.
how_to_use: Apply one full dropper to skin as your last skincare step, or prior to applying makeup. Reapply every two hours. Use daily, irrespective of weather.
