name: Paula's Choice Clinical 0.3% Retinol and 2% Bakuchiol Treatment 30ml
description: Specially developed to reduce the visibility of fine lines, restore lost elasticity and even your tone, PAULA’S CHOICE’s CLINICAL 0.3% Retinol + 2% Bakuchiol Treatment is a skin-plumping powerhouse. A triple-action age-defying complex of retinol, bakuchiol and peptides helps to prompt cellular turnover and stimulate collagen production. Read: a recipe for glowing, supple skin. The lightweight lotion is suitable for all skin types — and especially beneficial for mature, sun damaged skin. Why? 2% bakuchiol helps to stimulate collagen formation, improve skin's elasticity and diminish fine lines and wrinkles; the ultimate youth-prolonging ingredient, retinol works to smooth the look of wrinkles and diminish the signs of sun damage; finally, peptides help to restore firmness and soften the look of expression lines.
how_to_use: Apply a small amount in the evening over the face and neck to cleansed skin. Avoid the delicate skin around the eyes. Limit initial use to three evenings per week, then gradually increase frequency to every other evening and finally every evening as tolerated by your skin. When first using this product, the brand suggests that you do not use it at the same time as your AHA or BHA exfoliant. If you would like to use both, apply one in the morning and the other in the evening. Monitor your skin’s response and if no sensitivity occurs this product can be applied at the same time as your exfoliant.

name: Paula's Choice Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Gel Exfoliant (100ml)
description: When the breakout hits, this Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Gel Exfoliant from PAULA’S CHOICE is an essential in your skin care armoury. Ideal for blemish-prone, oily or combination types, this non-abrasive formula is laced with BHA salicylic acid to remove dead skin cells both on the skin’s surface and within the pore. In tandem with its anti-inflammatory properties, this helps to reduce blemishes and blackheads for a more clarified complexion (hurrah!). Aiding salicylic acid in its blemish-clearing mission, methylpropanediol enhances absorption so you can get the most out of each and every ingredient, while simultaneously boosting hydration levels, and green tea extract delivers a hefty dose of antioxidants to soothe and protect. With a light and non-sticky gel consistency, the formula sinks easily into skin and can be quickly followed by your favourite moisturiser.
how_to_use: Apply once or twice daily after cleansing and toning. Apply a coin-sized amount over the entire face, including the eyes (avoid the lower lash line and eyelids). Do not rinse. For daytime, always use a moisturiser containing a broad-spectrum sunscreen rated SPF 30 or greater. Allergic to aspirin (acetylsalicylate)? Do not use this product as it contains salicylic acid (BHA).

name: Wishful Get Clean Gentle Foaming Cleanser 150ml
description: Your wish for ultra clean and radiant skin is granted with Wishful’s new gel-to-foam cleanser. From melting away make up to unclogging pores and smoothing the skin’s texture, there’s not much this powerful product doesn’t do.
how_to_use: Dispense small amount into wet palms and rub together to create a foamy lather.   Gently massage into wet face and neck, rinse thoroughly.   Gently pat skin dry. Use twice daily in the morning and evening.  Pro tip: Use Get Clean in the shower for a super deep cleanse, and exfoliate after cleansing 2-3 times a week with Wishful’s Yo Glow on dry skin.

name: Paula's Choice Calm Ultra-Gentle Cushion Cleanser 198ml
description: Lather and rinse away redness with this cushiony-soft cleanser made with sensitive skin types in mind. Soothing and hydrating, the CALM Ultra-Gentle Cleanser caresses your complexion with skin-loving ingredients. Working to remove impurities and make up with ease, the CALM Ultra-Gentle Cleanser keeps your skin barrier in check through skin-replenishing glycerin — also, a defender against dryness — and prebiotic sugars that repair and rebuild your skin’s microbiome. Complete with caprylic/capric triglyceride to keep moisture levels high, this skin-soothing cleanser leaves skin feeling silky-smooth and as calm as a cucumber.
how_to_use: Wet face and apply a small amount of cleanser with gentle, circular motions. Rinse well. To remove heavy makeup, repeat or use with a clean, wet washcloth.
ingredient: Aqua (Solvent), Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate (Cleansing Agent), Glycerin (Skin conditioning agent), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride (Skin conditioning agent), Cocamidopropyl Betaine (Skin conditioning agent), Sodium Laurylglucosides Hydroxypropulsulfonate (Surfactant), Cellulose Gum (Viscosity increasing agent), Coco-Caprylate/Caprate (Emolient), Hydroxyacetophenone (Antioxidant), Inulin (Viscosity increasing agent), Xanthan Gum (Viscosity increasing agent), Ethylhexylglycerin (Skin conditioning agent), Sodium Phytate (Chelating agent), Cellulose (Viscosity increasing agent), Fructose (Humectant), Glucose (Humectant), Phenoxyethanol (Preservative).

name: The INKEY List Blemish Clearing Moisturizer 2% NovoRetin 50ml
description: Ready to banish blemishes once and for all? This new overnight treatment-come-moisturiser is here to give breakouts the boot, all while giving your skin some much needed TLC. It’s powered by 2% NovoRetin™, a plant-based alternative to traditional retinols that helps to combat breakouts, this powerhouse ingredient is originally derived from mastic — an aromatic resin that comes from a tree exclusively grown on the Greek island of Chios. This unique formula is ideal for anyone who wants to include retinol in their routine, without the risk of irritation, and infuse their complexion with soothing and deeply hydrating emollients and vitamins, including squalane and panthenol. Apply it before bed and you’ll soon realise the meaning of getting your beauty sleep by waking up to radiant, clear skin.
how_to_use: Patch test first. Use PM only. On cleansed skin apply a pea-sized amount to face and neck. Start using this product twice a week and increase to every night once your skin is used to it. Do not use any other retinol-based products in the same routine.
ingredient: Water (Aqua, Eau), Glycerin, Octyldodecanol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Sulfur, Arachidyl Alcohol, Pentaerythrityl Distearate, Squalane, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Citronellyl Methylcrotonate, Behenyl Alcohol, Acacia Senegal Gum, Arachidyl Glucoside, Phenoxyethanol, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Panthenol, Xanthan Gum, Benzyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Retinol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Metabisulfite, Pistacia Lentiscus (Mastic) Gum, Dehydroacetic Acid, Lecithin, Glucose, Tocopherol, Glyceryl Caprylate.

name: Pai Skincare Middlemist Seven Camellia and Rose Gentle Cream Cleanser 150ml
description: The ideal way to cleanse dry, delicate and sensitive skin very gently, Pai Skincare’s Middlemist Seven removes make up and impurities while simultaneously boosting skin with soothing hydration. Suitable for sensitive and reactive skin (though just as good for dry, mature and combination skin types) the alcohol-free formula helps to maintain your complexion’s delicate oil and pH balance. Castor and sweet almond oils help to break down make up (including waterproof mascara) making this the ‘eye-deal’ alternative to harsh make up removers that can leave the delicate skin around the eyes dry and irritated. Alongside these, camellia oil – a naturally ‘dry’ oil that’s brimming with conditioning omega 9 and protective vitamin E – gives the cleanser a rich, luxurious texture, without heaviness, while damask rose otto oil helps skin to retain moisture, renowned for its rejuvenating, restorative properties. Alcohol and detergent-free, this luscious formula comes with a convenient dual-sided cleansing cloth, with a textured muslin side for thorough cleansing and a soft terry side for sensitive areas.
how_to_use: Dampen the Dual-Effect Sensitive Skin Cloth with warm water and squeeze out excess. EYES Apply a small amount of Cleanser to dry, closed eye, massaging gently. Using soft-terry-side of cloth, sweep over eye to clean and lift away all traces of make-up and Cleanser. FACE Gently massage Cleanser onto dry skin. Remove using muslin-side of cloth*, with gentle circular movements. Follow with final sweep over face with soft terry-side. * For hypersensitive skin, use only soft terry-side of cloth.
ingredient: Aqua - Purified Water Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil* - Camellia Oil Ricinus Communis Seed Oil* - Castor Oil Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil* - Sweet Almond Oil Lactobacillus Ferment - Naturally Derived Preservative Cetearyl Alcohol - Naturally Derived Emulsifier Glycerin - Organic Derived Vegetable Glycerine Butyrospermum Parkii Butter* - Shea Butter Cetearyl Glucoside - Naturally Derived Emulsifier Tocopherol - Natural Vitamin E Rosa Damascena Oil* - Rose Oil Pelargonium Graveolens Oil* - Rose Geranium Oil Sodium Levulinate - Naturally Derived Preservative Lavandula Augustifolia Oil* - Lavender Oil Lactic Acid - pH Regulator Litsea Cubeba Oil* - May Chang Oil Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate - Naturally Derived Emulsifier Sodium Anisate - Naturally Derived Preservative Naturally Occurring in Essential Oils: Citral*, Citronellol*, d-Limonene*, Geraniol*, Linalool*. Contains Nut Oil. Certified Organic by the Soil Association (*Organically produced 71% of product). Suitable for Vegans. Not tested on animals. Contains nut oil. Pai Skicare’s commitment to product purity means they never use artificial fragrances, alcohol (denat.), parabens (including japanese honeysuckle), phenoxyethanol, propylene glycol, formaldehyde (including sodium hydroxymethylglycinate), sodium lauryl sulfate or other skin irritants.

name: Biossance Squalane + Elderberry Jelly Cleanser 150ml
description: Infused with antioxidants, prebiotics and moisture-boosting squalane, Biossance's Squalane + Elderberry Jelly Cleanser simultaneously refreshes your skin as it fortifies and protects your microbiome - promoting a healthier-looking complexion. Transforming from a jelly to a silky oil and finally a soft cleansing milk, this gentle yet powerful all-in-one jelly cleanser effortlessly shifts make up, daily pollutants and impurities. It's enriched with elderberry extract (a potent antioxidant) and a nourishing prebiotic complex to help strengthen and protect your skin. Sugarcane-derived squalane provides long-lasting, weightless moisture so that your skin feels clean and soft but never stripped.
how_to_use: Apply a small amount to dry skin with dry hands and massage to break down make up and impurities. Add warm water to emulsify and easily remove sunscreen, dirt and pollution. Rinse well.
ingredient: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Water/Aqua/Eau, Squalane, Hydrogenated Farnesene, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Sucrose Laurate, Sucrose Stearate, Polymnia Sonchifolia Root Juice, Alpha-Glucan Oligosaccharide, Sambucus Nigra Fruit Extract, Lactobacillus, Ipomoea Batatas Root Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Acacia Senegal Gum, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Sucrose Palmitate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Phenethyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Maltodextrin, Tocopherol, Citric Acid.

name: The INKEY List Mandelic Acid Treatment 15ml
description: Dealing with textured skin and stubborn hyperpigmentation? Opt for this super gentle and ultra-lightweight 10% Mandelic Acid Treatment that'll do abracadabra to said concerns. Whisk the dark marks away with a couple droplets and watch the magic happen! Derived from bitter almonds, this AHA chemically exfoliates your skin to remove dead cells and reveal a smoother, firmer and brighter complexion. Uniquely blended with retinol, this treatment works to also regulate oily skin and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Loaded with incredible skin-loving ingredients that work harmoniously together to promote glass-like skin, there's no doubt that this treatment is sure to become a permanent fixture in your regimen...
how_to_use: Shake well before use and use in PM only. Apply a thin layer onto cleansed skin. Leave to absorb before following with moisturiser. Be sure to use SPF in the AM as this product can increase sun sensitivity.

name: Sarah Chapman Skinesis Overnight Facial (15ml)
description: Awaken your skin's plump, smooth, youthful and rejuvenated glow overnight with Sarah Chapman's Overnight Facial, a serum-oil elixir that's been (rightfully) lauded with beauty awards for its transformative benefits, now available in a sized-to-try edition. The irresistible, silky cashmere textured formula replicates the benefits of one of Sarah Chapman's Skinesis facials overnight. A sophisticated power potion, Overnight Facial utilises cosmeceutical performance actives along with soothing, heavenly scented botanicals and omegas. Familiar ingredients such as vitamins C and A brighten skin tone and defy signs of ageing, alongside more advanced technologies, including 'Renovage' (which helps to increase the life span of cells) and 'Dermaxyl' (which boosts collagen via advanced peptide technology). Antioxidant vitamins, coenzyme Q10 and an omega-rich oil delivery system comfort and protect your complexion, complemented perfectly by a soothing pure essential oil blend of jasmine, frangipani, rose and tuberose, which imparts sublime scent and makes this overnight wonder a real pleasure to use.
how_to_use: Massage 1-2 pumps of Overnight Facial onto skin every night. For best results, use with Sarah Chapman's {The Facialift} tool. Avoid contact with eyes. If discomfort occurs, rinse with warm water. For external use only. Keep out of the reach of children.
ingredient: Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cyclohexasiloxane, Di-PPG-2 Myreth-10 Adipate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, PEG-4, Phenyl Trimethicone, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Crambe Abyssinica Seed Oil, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Cannabis Sativa Seed Oil, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Tocopheryl Linoleate/Oleate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Hydroxycinnamic Acid, Ubiquinone, Tribehenin, Teprenone, Retinyl Palmitate, Ceramide 2, PEG-10 Phytosterol, Thioctic Acid, Palmitoyl Hexapeptide-12, Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil, Cedrus Atlantica Bark Oil, Parfum, Jasminum Officinale Flower Extract, Santalum Spicata Wood Oil, Citrus Paradisi Peel Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Cananga Odorata Flower Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Dalbergia Sissoo Wood Oil, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia Fruit Oil, Linalool, Limonene, Benzyl Benzoate, Citronellol, Geraniol, Farnesol, Benzyl Cinnamate, Benzyl Salicylate, Eugenol, Benzyl Alcohol, Citral, Hydroxycitronella

name: REN Clean Skincare - Evercalm Overnight Recovery Balm 30ml
description: The perfect way to comfort and protect sensitive, dry and easily offended complexions overnight, REN’s Evercalm Overnight Recovery Balm targets sensitivity, dryness and inflammation, while boosting and safeguarding your skin’s natural regeneration. Its luscious balm-to-oil texture replenishes your skin’s moisture barrier while deeply hydrating – think of it as an overnight cocoon for your complexion. Skin-loving olive, almond, borage and linseed oils unite to grant long-lasting moisture, while anti-inflammatory beta-glucans ease irritation and calm skin and REN’s nourishing jojoba complex provides an ultra-light film on your skin’s surface that auto-adapts to your surrounding environment – so no heavy or greasy feeling, even in hot weather. Fast-absorbing and pillow-friendly, this is the perfect bedfellow for complexions in crisis.
how_to_use: Apply a hazelnut-sized amount to freshly cleansed skin in the evening after you have applied your serum. How to add to your routine; After cleansing with Evercalm Gentle Cleansing Milk, spread a hazelnut-sized amount of Redness Relief Serum between hands and press over clean skin until absorbed, starting with areas of high sensitivity working outwards. Finally, massage Global Protection Day Cream onto face and neck until absorbed as part of your morning routine, or Overnight Recovery Balm as part of your evening routine. Recycling; Evercalm™ Overnight Recovery Balm glass jar and cap are designed for recycling.* *Recycling is subject to local policies and facilities.
ingredient: Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Glycerin, Aqua (Water), Almond/Borage/Linseed/Olive Acids/Glycerides, Polyglyceryl-6 Distearate, Jojoba Esters, Oryza Sativa Starch, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil Unsaponifiables, Glyceryl Caprylate, Polyglyceryl-3 Beeswax, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Benzyl Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Hippophae Rhamnoides Oil, Tocopherol, Magnesium Carboxymethyl Beta-Glucan, Dehydroacetic Acid, Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Eclipta Prostrata Leaf Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract, Citronellol, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool * 100% Natural Fragrance

name: REN Clean Skincare Evercalm Gentle Cleansing Milk 50ml
description: The perfect way to awaken your skin or to take the day off before bed, this sensitive skin-friendly cleanser will help keep your delicate skin feeling clean, clear and contented. Developed for those whose skin suffers from redness, blotchiness, extreme dryness and irritation, REN Clean Skincare’s Evercalm range is completely free from known allergens and potentially detrimental ingredients. This ultra-mild milk is laced with peroxidase enzymes to protect distressed skin; omegas 3 and 7 (Essential Fatty Acids) to help minimise inflammation and flavenoids from Calendula to soothe and heal.
how_to_use: Gently rub between hands. Massage onto face. Rinse off with warm water or just wipe off with cotton pads or muslin cloth.
ingredient: Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile) Flower Extract, Cetearyl Ethyhexanoate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Glucoside, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Myristyl Myristate, Glycerin, Ribes Nigrum (Black Currant) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Foeniculum Vulgare (Fennel) Fruit Extract, Oryzanol, Bisabolol, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Extract, Sodium Hydroxymethylglycinate, Citric Acid, Xanthan Gum, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Cinnamomum Linalloliferum (Ho Wood) Leaf Oil, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile) Flower Oil, Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol, Linalool, Tocopherol.

name: Jouer Cosmetics Essential Hydrating Lip Oil 0.16 fl. oz. - Naturel Shine
description: Made with 99% plant-derived ingredients, the Essential Hydrating Lip Oil nourishes and adds healthy shine for a natural-looking, juicy and healthy pout. Cruelty-free and vegan friendly, this kind formula is enriched with apricot oil (which is full of vitamins, antioxidants and fatty acids to replenish dry lips), jojoba seed oil (to create a protective barrier that looks in moisture and keeps lips soft and supple), and vitamin E (a natural conditioner with antioxidant benefits). Sheer, non-sticky and fragrance-free, this oil formula gives lips a glass-like sheen in just one glow-bestowing swipe of the applicator wand.
how_to_use: With the plush doe foot wand, glide the high shine oil over lips. Reapply as desired.
ingredient: Polyglyceryl-2 Isostearate/Dimer Dilinoleate Copolymer, Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, C15-19 Alkane, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tocopheryl Acetate, Morus Nigra Fruit Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Diisostearyl Malate, Bixa Orellana Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, CI 15850 (Red 6).

name: supergoop! Mineral Sheerscreen SPF30 45ml
description: Meet the mineral sunscreen that's changing the name of the SPF game. The Mineral Sheerscreen SPF 30 glides onto your complexion effortlessly, leaving an unrivalled natural and barely-there finish. The best SPF is the one you want to wear, so be it mineral or chemical Supergoop! has every desire accounted for. If mineral screens are your go-to, but you struggle with the often heavy and thick texture then it's time to introduce your complexion to this featherlight broad spectrum SPF. While 'sheer doesn't mean completely 'clear', this is innovatively formulated with a web-like structure that suspends non-nano zinc oxide into a matrix, meaning it can stretch and adapt leaving it ultra-lightweight in finish and feel. Protecting your skin from blue-light induced damage is blush clover extract, harvested in South Korea and revered for its medicinal properties this keeps skin safe from oxidative stress. Never one to forgo the importance of hydration, the Mineral Sheerscreen leaves skin smooth and soft thanks to hydrating squalane, sodium hyaluronate and aloe leaf juice. We don't know about you but this is ticking all our boxes.
how_to_use: Apply generously and evenly as the last step in your skincare routine, before makeup and 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply frequently to maintain protection, especially after perspiring, swimming, or towelling.
ingredient: Active ingredients: Zinc Oxide 17.5%. Inactive ingredients: Water, Isododecane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Propanediol, Glycerin, Squalane, Trioctyldodecyl Citrate, Polyglycerin-3, Polyglyceryl-3 Lactate/Laurate, Polysilicone-11, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Butylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Isostearic Acid, Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Citric Acid, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Lespedeza Capitata Leaf/Stem Extract, Maltodextrin, Sodium Hyaluronate.

name: Yu Ling Rollers Jade Facial Roller (Medium)
description: Made from reconstituted jade, this gorgeous roller works to stimulate lymph drainage while massaging skin and underlying muscles. A perfect way to supplement your daily skin care ritual, not only does the texture of the stone feel infinitely soothing (ideal at the end of a loooong day), but the rolling motion boosts elimination of accumulated toxins, ‘lifts’ your face and neck and helps to bring relief from stubborn tension headaches. Use from forehead to décolleté and you’ll soon see a difference in the texture, tone and clarity of your complexion. With regular use, your fine lines appear lessened, dark circles diminishes, and you’ll notice a reduction in persistent wrinkles (it’s great for combatting ‘elevens’). Store in the fridge to enhance the relaxing and tightening benefits.
how_to_use: Using broad sweeps always working away from the nose area, roll across the forehead, cheeks, throat and décolleté area (see face illustration above). Place vertically on your sinus area and rock gently and then roll away from the nose to clear blocked sinuses. Finally, pay special attention to the jawline where congestion is prone to build up, rocking the Yu Ling Roller vertically in the crevice where your neck meets your ear and then rolling it down towards your collar bone.
ingredient: Reconstituted jade

name: Biossance Squalane and Rose Vegan Lip Balm 15g
description: Biossance's Squalane + Rose Vegan Lip Balm just got an upgrade – the newly reformulated, fragrance-free lip balm is now housed in a hygienic tube with packaging made from 100% renewable sugarcane. The vegan, petroleum-free formula now also delivers even more long-lasting replenishment. An ultra-hydrating trio of clinically proven moisturisers plus luxurious rose wax and plumping wakame algae deeply nourishes for healthy, soft lips. Locking in moisture to keep your kiss comfortably cushioned for hours on end, this decadent treatment has instant and gradual ‘augmenting’ benefits – helping your lips to achieve their full, pouty potential.
how_to_use: Apply with finger and swipe across lips. Can also be used on cheekbones, eyebrows and mixed with SPF for protected lip balm.
ingredient: Diisostearyl Malate, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Glycerin, Hydroxystearic/Linoleic/Oleic Polyglycerides, Myristic/Palmitic/Stearic/Ricinoleic/Eicosanedioic Glycerides, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Squalane, Glyceryl Caprylate, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Hyaluronate, Jojoba Esters, Ceramide NP, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Rosa Damascena Flower Wax, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Tocopherol, Water/Aqua/Eau, Dextrin Palmitate.

name: good light Cosmic Dew Water Cleanser
description: In a delightful gel-to-foam formula, the hard-working Cosmic Dew Water Cleanser is cruelty-free, fragrance-free, pH balanced and vegan, and will swiftly remove impurities while soothing skin — even if it’s sensitive. Ideal for melting the day’s make up and dirt, it hydrates, relieves inflammation and strengthens sensitive skin while improving skin barrier function. It calls on a blend of glycerin (to hydrate, heal and protect skin against irritants), with laminaria japonica (a hydrating seaweed that destroys toxins and plumps), fructooligosaccharides (a prebiotic that supports your microbiome and reduces skin sensitivity) and hyaluronic acid (a humectant that pulls moisture into skin). As each ingredient works in total harmony for optimal skin function, this do-it-all cleanser even detoxifies and balances your complexion.
how_to_use: As a daily cleansing ritual, gently massage into skin with water and wash away impurities in a circular motion. For a skin-soothing reset, apply to dry skin as a moisture mask for 2-3 minutes and rinse thoroughly. Gentle for day and night use.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Glycerin, Acrylates Copolymer, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Sodium Chloride, 1,2-Hexanediol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Decylene Glycol, Tromethamine, Sodium Benzoate, Hexylene Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, Eclipta Prostrata Leaf Extract, Laminaria Japonica Extract, Fructooligosaccharides, Beta-Glucan, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Tocopherol, Citric Acid, Lithospermum Erythrorhizon Root Extract

name: Alpha-H Reusable Cotton Roundals (7 Pack)
description: Not your average cotton rounds, Alpha-H's Reusable Cotton Pads are a soft and - dare we say it - chic alternative to their disposable counterparts. Made with sustainable materials designed to be reused time and time again, these triangular pads (inspired by the brand's instantly-recognisable logo and also handy for getting in to all the nooks and crannies - sorry - of your features) are a mix of 50% organic cotton and 50% bamboo. Impressively gentle on your skin, they'll work with any tonic or toner, and you get a week-long supply (7 pads). When they're ready to be cleaned, simply pop them into their mesh bag and throw them in the washing machine. Easy peasy!
how_to_use: Simply pour a few drops of your preferred product onto the cotton pad and swipe across the face, neck and décolletage. Wash pads thoroughly after each use. Hand wash with soap and water or place inside the mesh bag, tighten the draw string and machine wash at 30 degrees. Allow to air dry naturally. Embossed logo fades after washing.
ingredient: 50% Bamboo, 50% Organic Cotton.

name: Herlum Copa Dew Oil 50ml
description: If you aren’t already acquainted with Herlum, trying this oil will certainly result in a new obsession. Taking you on a sensory journey to Brazil (think: Rio’s Copacabana beach), this silky formula is fast-absorbing and packed with restorative ingredients for a gorgeous dewy finish. Let’s start with a fun fact about the hero ingredient: copaiba oil. It’s been used in Brazil for centuries as a natural healer after locals observed animals rubbing themselves against the trunk of the copaiba tree when wounded. This, alongside cold-pressed rosehip and buriti oils, makes Copa Dew a true wonder product (and multi-tasker!), brimming with nourishing antioxidants and vitamins to give your skin, hair and body the ultimate glow-up. In fact, you can even use it as a bath oil. The uplifting scent has been created with a blend of upcycled apple oil and notes of white tea, cedarwood and lemon peel. Dreamy doesn’t even cut it.
how_to_use: Can be used on face, body and hair. For the face: apply a few drops to cleansed skin, taking some time to breath in the mood-lifting scent. Mix with your moisturiser for an extra shot of hydration. Use with your gua sha tool to aid lymphatic drainage. For the body: apply post-shower over damp skin and massage in circular motions for a boost of hydration and skin suppleness. Use on its own or mix a few drops with body lotion for extra nourishment. For the hair: apply to dry ends, brows and beard to lock in moisture, de-frizz and add major shine. Use as a pre-shampoo treatment overnight. For the bath: add a couple of drops into your bath and use as a nourishing bath oil. Bonus: Use as a cuticle oil for a longer-lasting mani, and wear as a light fragrance oil on your pulse points — breathe in and let the comforting fragrance boost positive emotions.
ingredient: Vitis Vinifera Seed Oil (Grapeseed Oil), Squalane (Olive), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride (Coconut Oil), Brassica Alba Seed Extract (Mustard Seed Oil), Parfum (Upcycled Apple Oil, Fragrance), Mauritia Flexuosa Fruit Oil (Buriti Oil), Rosa Canina Fruit Oil (Rosehip Oil), Copaifera Officinalis Resin (Copaiba Oil), Ribes Nigrum Seed Oil (Blackcurrant Seed Oil), Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil (Passion Fruit Oil), Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Glycine Soja Oil (Soy), Limonene, Linalool, Geraniol, Citral (Fragrance).

name: PIXI Vitamin-C Tonic 100ml Toner
description: Do you dream of gloriously glowing, healthy skin? Then you need to introduce your skin care routine to Pixi’s Vitamin-C Tonic. Instantly refreshing, this glow-giving tonic is jam-packed with citrus extracts and ferulic acid, this hard-working hero evens out skin tone, improves hydration and shields skin from free radicals. Astonishingly affordable, this is mild yet effective, making it suitable for all skin types – just apply a few drops to a cotton wool pad, and sweep all over skin after cleansing (morning and evening) to gradually diminish signs of sun damage, fine lines, scarring and other imperfections.
how_to_use: Use daily after cleansing.

name: Byoma Clarifying Serum Refill 30ml
description: Tired of random breakouts and unbalanced skin? Opt for this gentle-yet-effective serum that is designed to both balance and support spot-prone skin, promoting a calmer, clearer complexion. Already well-versed in this skin saviour and don’t want it to end? Simply keep your colourful container and opt for a handy refill instead. The road to glass skin can often be a bumpy one and here to smoothen that journey is the BYOMA Clarifying Serum. A brightly packaged bottle with an endless supply of skin-loving goodies that’ll surely stand out in your bathroom cabinet. Designed to target imperfections, signs of breakouts, calm inflammation, oiliness and redness, this bottle of goodness urges you to kiss stubborn skin goodbye! Rich in antioxidants from the potent blue tansy and infused with a unique blend of barrier boosting tri-ceramide complexes, this serum is sure to leave your skin feeling soothed, calm and clear. PHA paired with zinc work to gently exfoliate and help unclog pores without stripping away moisture or disrupting your delicate skin barrier. Seamlessly weave this bottle packed with skin-loving goodies into your current skin care routine and watch the magic happen… Dermatologist tested and approved, oil-free, non-comedogenic, alcohol and fragrance-free, vegan and cruelty free.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Magic Trilogy Set (Worth £220.00)
description: Featuring Charlotte's Magic Cream, Charlotte's Magic Eye Rescue and Charlotte's Magic Night Cream, count on this trio to boost a youthful complexion with a plethora of collagen-boosting, skin-firming hero ingredients. Powerfully firming and line-lessening, the Charlotte's Magic Cream is a rich, fast-acting formula that delivers a serious hit of hydration thanks to its hyaluronic acid booster: sodium hyaluronate to attract and retain much-needed moisture, alongside a patented bionymph peptide complex which helps turn back the clock (in mere moments). Charlotte's Magic Eye Rescue dramatically enhances elasticity and firmness with a cocktail of cell-energising winter daphne stem cell extract, rice and soy peptides, saccharide isomerate and free radical-fighting vitamins A, C and E for younger-looking eyes. Last but not least, Charlotte's Magic Night Cream also contains the cell-binding daphne extract and creates a barrier between complexion and the elements; sealing precious moisture into skin while deflecting environmental stresses as you slumber.
how_to_use: Charlotte's Magic Cream: Starting from the lower cheek, sweep cream out & up. Tap fingertips across cheeks avoiding eye contour. Place fingers under cheekbones, then smooth outwards and upwards along cheekbones. Gently pinch chin with your fingers, moving up your jawline in one sweeping motion. Starting in the middle of the forehead, massage in circular motions moving out to the temples. Pat any excess in with your ring finger. Charlotte's Magic Eye Rescue: Apply the Charlotte's Magic Eye Rescue to your ring fingers and gently dot under the eyes on the top of the cheekbones. Gently tap above the eyes across the brow bones. Repeat the tapping in a circular movement around the eyes to help reduce puffiness. Continue to tap gently under the eyes and across the tops of the cheekbones for a few seconds to allow the cream to work its magic for a wide-eyed, youthful effect. Charlotte's Magic Night Cream: Apply to the face and neck in small circular motions working from the centre of the face outwards using your fingertips.

name: REN Clean Skincare Radiance Brightening Dark Circle Eye Cream 15ml
description: Starring 95% nature-derived ingredients to brighten dark circles in only a week, REN CLEAN SKINCARE’s Radiance Brightening Dark Circle Eye Cream is great for those bothered by under-eye shadows. Completely non-irritating which makes it ideal for the sensitive-skinned (or the watery-eyed), this formula harnesses elderberry flower extract (a zero-waste by-product of the French perfume industry), alongside sustainably sourced glycogen (from non-GMO corn) to smooth, tone and brighten the entire eye area – including the eyelid. With no added fragrance, the luxurious, water-in-oil formula is lightweight and swiftly absorbed – simply tap in a circle around each eye, from just above the cheekbone round, and up along the brow bone – to help you look enviably rested. What’s more, the potion is housed in a bottle that uses industry-first Infinity Recycling technology, that helps to bring previously unrecyclable plastic into circularity, lessening the volume meant for landfill. And it’s PETA-approved cruelty-free and made using vegan ingredients.
how_to_use: After cleansing and applying moisturiser, split a rice-grain-sized amount between two fingers and gently massage over the under-eye, eyelid and brow bone area till absorbed. To use as a hydrating mask, apply a slightly thicker layer on the under-eye area at night. How to add to your daily routine; Cleanse skin thoroughly with Clean Jelly Oil Cleanser and gently pat dry, then follow by applying Daily AHA Tonic to freshly cleansed skin in the evening with a reusable cotton pad, by avoiding the eye area. Next, gently massage Dark Circle Eye Cream into the eye area. Finally, apply a hazelnut-sized amount of Dark Spot Sleeping Cream by massaging in circular motions over the face and neck until fully absorbed. Recycling; Brightening Dark Circle Eye Cream bottle and cap are made from 87% Infinity Recycled Plastic and are designed for recycling.* There’s no need to separate, simply keep the whole pack together and pop in the appropriate bin where facilities exist. *Recycling is subject to local policies and facilities.

name: Then I Met You The Giving Essence
description: The key to a luminous, dewy finish, The Giving Essence is crafted to quench your skin with a brightening blend of antioxidants, niacinamide, polyglutamic acid and ellagic acid... Never heard of that last one? Ellagic acid is a naturally produced acid found in berries that naturally brightens skin without impacting cell DNA, and it protects against UV rays, collagen degeneration and bacterial pathogens. It's one to look out for! The essence itself is made with 80% naturally fermented ingredients, including a derivative of fermented sake that clarifies the look of pores, as well as niacinamide and polyglutamic acid to boost moisture levels and reveal a radiant, even tone. A potent cocktail of antioxidant-rich red algae and berries (read: black chokeberry, a superfood with one of the highest recorded antioxidant levels) work to unveil a luminous complexion.
how_to_use: Use daily. After double cleansing and prepping the skin with the Birch Milk Refining Toner, dispense The Giving Essence into your hands and pat or press onto face. Continue with the rest of your skin care routine. With any expected sun exposure, always protect skin with sunscreen.

name: Pai Skincare Rosehip Bioregenerate, Rosehip Seed and Fruit Universal Face Oil 10ml
description: The ultimate multi-tasker for sensitive skin, Pai Skincare’s Rosehip Bioregenerate is one of the brand’s bestsellers, thanks to its extraordinary effects. Rosehip oil is renowned for its powerful skin healing, regenerative properties and Pai extracts the oil used in this formula via an ultra-advanced method. Volcanically sourced CO2 supercritical extraction (stay with us on this one…) is used to derive a unique blend of Andean rosehip fruit and seed oils, which is more effective, fresh and long-lasting than traditional cold-pressed oils. High concentrations of omegas 3, 6, 7 and 9, plus antioxidant carotenoids help to repair and protect skin against environmental stress and visible damage. The oil can be used to address a catalogue of complexion complaints without irritation, including dry, flaky patches, blemishes, dull skin tone, fine lines, scars and sun damage. With regular use, it will condition skin, improve firmness and elasticity and promote and clear, even skin tone.
how_to_use: Apply 2-3 drops to the palm of your hand and use fingertips to gently massage into clean, slightly damp skin on face or body. Allow the oil to fully absorb before dressing. For best results, we recommend using oils at night before bed and creams in the morning. For extra hydration, mix 2-3 drops of Rosehip BioRegenerate Oil with a pump of Chamomile & Rosehip Calming Day Cream.

Suitable for Vegans. Not tested on animals. Nut-Free Formula. Pai Skincare’s commitment to product purity means they never use artificial fragrances, alcohol (denat.), parabens (including japanese honeysuckle), phenoxyethanol, propylene glycol, formaldehyde (including sodium hydroxymethylglycinate), sodium lauryl sulfate or other skin irritants.

name: COSRX Oil-Free Ultra Moisturising Lotion with Birch Sap 100ml
description: A gentle-yet-effective moisturiser, COSRX’s Oil Free Ultra Moisturizing Lotion is formulated with heroically-hydrating, naturally-derived ingredients to nourish and soothe even the angriest and most irritated of complexions. While you might not be ultra-familiar with birch sap as a hydrator, it's a mainstay in K-beauty — and accounts for over 70% of this daily moisturiser’s formulation. Birch sap boasts an impressive 17 amino acids, antioxidants and vitamins, all of which make its something of a powerhouse in nourishing and hydrating skin while reducing inflammation. With a handy pump for hygienic dispensing, this lightweight cream is about the become a Holy Grail in your daily routine.

name: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser 50ml
description: Leave skin looking and feeling soft and bright, COSRX’s Low-pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser is the perfect AM cleanse for those beauties that want to wake up their complexions without straying into overly dry, ‘squeaky clean’ face territory. This mild-yet-effective cleanser (available in a full size or handy travel size) is the ultimate in multitasking skin care. Not only does it ‘rev’ up and refresh tired skin while removing oil and dirt build up, but it also protects the skin from environmental aggressors that cause dryness or damage throughout the day. This is because the lightweight gel — which creates a satisfying lather with a little rub between your fingertips — is formulated with a slightly acidic pH. In turn, this helps to balance your skin’s pH and strengthen that all-important moisture barrier. The result? Glowy, healthy skin that you’re guaranteed to love.

Immediately reassuring, this comforts and balances skin as it gradually works to restore luminosity, maximise ‘bounce’ and recover skin’s get up and glow.

name: NUXE Huile Prodigieuse Multi-Purpose Dry Oil 100ml
description: A best-smelling must-have, Nuxe's Huile Prodigieuse Multi-Purpose Dry Oil for Face, Body and Hair is a buffet of goodness for compromised skin - cherishing dry, scaly patches (and strengthening over-styled lengths!) with a medley of plant-derived oils. Completely non-greasy and quickly absorbed, this leaves a light lustre and works to replenish and comfort the scaliest limbs... A holiday hero (slather this all over post-sun skin), the blend of camellia, hazelnut, sweet almond, St. John's wort, macadamia and borage has impressive healing properties - working to elasticise and fortify while boosting moisture levels to promote a healthy glow. Rake through the ends of your hair to create a chic 'piecey-ness', smooth over shoulders or streak down the length of your shins to bestow an au naturel highlight. A multi-tasking wonder, there's a reason no routine should be without it.
how_to_use: Spray some Huile Prodigieuse® in the palm of your hand and add a drop of your usual moisturiser. Mix and apply to your skin using smoothing movements. Your face will be perfectly moisturised, and your skin softer and more supple. Apply to your shoulders, neckline, hands, or other areas that need attention. There is nothing quite like the unique quality of Huile Prodigieuse® to enhance the skin's texture in a single step. · In the palm of your hand, mix a drop of Huile Prodigieuse® with your foundation before applying: it will glide smoothly over your skin. Spray some Huile Prodigieuse® on a natural bristle hairbrush for naturally controlled and radiantly shiny hair. Exposure to the sun leaves your skin feeling dehydrated and in need of special care and attention. There is nothing better than Huile Prodigieuse® to nourish and repair it. Ideal as a massage oil, Huile Prodigieuse® glides smoothly over your skin, infusing it with its divine fragrance. Spray some Huile Prodigieuse® directly on your hair (from a distance of around 20 cm) and massage into your hair and scalp. Then wrap your head in a warm towel and leave for 15 to 20 minutes to allow Huile Prodigieuse® to penetrate before shampooing. Add a few drops of Huile Prodigieuse® to your bath water and drift away on its joyful and fragrant waves. A daily massage with Huile Prodigieuse® is ideal for alleviating stretch marks.

name: Dermalogica Deep Breakout Liquid Patch 15ml
description: Trust Dermalogica to sprinkle some healing magic into its blemish-fighting products. This liquid formula transforms into an invisible patch — soothing your breakout while keeping pollution and bacteria at bay. The best part? You can apply it over make up. Reach for this smart product as soon as you feel a breakout starting to form — thanks to 5% colloidal sulphur, it’ll help to keep it from surfacing. Working with your natural microbiome to minimise oil production, the Deep Acne Liquid Patch also features camphor to deliver a cooling sensation, alongside soothing niacinamide to fade post-acne marks. It has a gel-based, skin-mimicking formula that develops into a semipermeable patch when applied — encouraging airflow while protecting your skin from pollution and irritants. Genius? We think so.
how_to_use: Using fingertip, apply a small amount directly to skin at first feeling of breakout. Allow one minute to dry.

name: Dr.Jart+ Cryo Rubber Mask with Moisturising Hyaluronic Acid 44g
description: Made with dry, puffy skin in mind, Dr.Jart+'s Cryo Rubber Mask with Moisturizing Hyaluronic Acid is a two-step system that delivers a wave of cooling hydration and lowers the temperature of your skin to boost blood flow and the absorption of nourishing active ingredients for a radiant, healthy-looking complexion. Designed to help your skin adjust to whatever life throws at it, these Cryo Rubber Masks are sure to become your go-to pick-me-up treatment. The soft, flexible masks are made up of naturally derived algae and clay that work to cool and condition your skin. As for the ampoules, they're brimming with a prebiotic complex (fruit and plant extracts formulated with prebiotic microbes) that's carefully crafted to nourish and balance your skin's microbiome. With next-gen cooling technology, they also work to offer effective ingredient absorption as well as an instant cooling effect. In this specific mask, the active ingredients are hyaluronic acid that attracts moisture from the air and kelp extract that promotes moisture retention to ease dehydrated skin and encourage a plump, supple finish. Need some further proof that this mask is a future favourite? In a clinical study of 20 adult women aged 20-60, the cooling effect of rubber mask stimulated blood circulation and reduced redness: the look of red spots were reduced by 28.1%; skin temperature was temporarily reduced by 12.42°F and blood flow increased by 2.6%. Sold!
how_to_use: Step 1: Apply the stick ampoule (Step 01) onto skin. Step 2: Open rubber mask pouch (Step 02), remove from the film, and fit onto entire face. Proceed by applying the ‘lower mask’ by pulling both ends up to the ears.*Leave on for 30-40 minutes for deeper absorption. Step 3: Remove the mask and lightly pat skin to help absorb remaining ampoule. *Pro tip: For an even cooler condition, place both steps 1 and 2 in the refrigerator for 20-30 mins before application. *Pro tip: Follow up with Cicapair™ Tiger Grass Serum (sold separately) to maximize the soothing and repairing effect even further. You can use the remaining Ampoule Pack on your neck and arms as well. Precaution: Handle mask with care.

Created to soothe redness and bring swift relief from post-treatment irritation, this lightweight, fragrance-free formula boasts a replenishing cocktail of peptides, ceramides, ginger root and Tasmannia Lanceolata fruit extract to strengthen skin’s compromised barrier and bolster defences – keeping ‘good stuff’ in and ‘bad stuff’ out. Delivering long-lasting hydration to keep skin feeling comfortably plumped and dewy, this rich yet entirely non-greasy cream makes an excellent primer for make up – smoothing and softening dry, scaly patches to ensure your canvas is perfectly prepped.

description: Perfect for day and night, this lush cream moisturiser relieves damaged skin and locks in moisture for up to 100 hours — yes, one hundred, you read that right. Rich in texture but still light enough to use no matter the season, this moisturiser is a dream for skin that has seen harsh external damage. Be it the wind, sun or cold that ravages your skin, this moisturiser soothes and hydrates thanks to its star ingredient hyaluronic acid – but not as you know it! The ‘blue’ in the name refers to a form of hyaluronic acid that is fermented with deep sea algae, which has a low molecular weight. Translation? A swipe of this good stuff allows intense moisture to penetrate deep into the skin. It also strengthens the skin barrier and reduces redness, making it a treat for sensitive skin types.

name: The Seated Queen The Cold Cream 100ml
description: An intensely replenishing cleansing cream, The Seated Queen’s The Cold Cream is a multi-tasking marvel that dissolves your make up, double cleanses, makes a soothing mask and a rejuvenating night cream. Powered by single-source, organic ingredients of the highest quality, the vegan formulation is the surest way to streamline your regime. Described as ‘pared-back skin care for busy people’, the formula is gloriously versatile – delivering a hit of moisture, free radical-fighting antioxidants and skin-essentials fatty acids thanks to cold-pressed oils of rosehip (to elasticise), borage and sunflower seed, safflower, argan and apricot kernel – all of which work to negate the effects of aggressors and offer the nutrients needed to keep your skin supple and luminous. With a heavenly scent due to oils of patchouli leaf, lavender, clary sage, rose otto, bergamot, chamomile and frankincense, this potion is also a treat for your spirit – helping to foster a feeling of peace and bring calm at the end of a loooooong hectic day. So, whether you have a few minutes or full half-an-hour for much-needed ‘me time’, allow the The Seated Queen to elevate your nightly ritual.

description: Imagine if you could have a facial while you sleep… The Outset’s buttery-soft night cream is as good as. This restorative glow-giver works hard to restore suppleness as you dream, leaving you with a smooth and radiant complexion when you wake. As with all of The Outset’s products, Hyaluroset™ Complex is at its core — a botanical super-hydrator that plumps and nourishes the skin with long-lasting effects. It’s also formulated with brightening niacinamide and bakuchiol, which helps to improve the look of hyperpigmentation, fine lines and wrinkles (minus any dryness or irritation that’s often associated with retinol). Finally, evening primrose oil is added for its protective qualities against environmental stresses. And breathe… or in this case, dream.

An invigorating cleansing experience, this gel cleanser revives skin as it deeply removes daily dirt, make up and impurities to reveal a dewy, youthful complexion. Energising skin, the formula is turbocharged with minerals like magnesium, zinc and copper – alongside a trio of acids – to encourage collagen production, battle against damaging free radicals, balance blemished complexions, minimise the appearance of fine lines, break down the bonds between dead skin cells and intensely hydrate. Phew! Use this hardworking formulation if you fancy an invigorated visage that isn’t stripped of moisture, with reduced levels of excess oils and a side of smaller pores to boot.

description: 100% plant derived, THE INKEY LIST’s Squalane Oil is a natural wonder for all skin types. Lightweight and non-greasy, the oil helps to hydrate by bolstering your skin’s barrier, so preventing it from losing moisture. Great for dry skin, it helps to plump up your complexion’s appearance and so minimise fine lines; thanks to its ability to regulate oil production, Squalane is also great for oilier skin types – an all rounder if ever we saw one. Slot it into your routine morning or evening (or both) as a final step after serums and moisturiser to seal in all the goodness of your other products while hydrating.

name: COSRX Master Patch Intensive (36 Pack)
description: New and improved but packed with the same effective blemish-blasting ingredients, this pack of 36 pimple patches — made from wound-healing hydrocolloid — up the ante on healing acne in a discrete way. Hydrocolloid effectively absorbs excess sebum that can trigger further breakouts, while a tea tree oil blend aids in reducing inflammation around those angry imperfections. And if you’re a skin picker — we’re all guilty of it — these handy cover ups create a protective barrier that will prevent you from touching, squeezing or worsening pimples throughout the course of the day. Even better is the wearability of these pimple patches: ultra-thin and with an invisible finish to seamlessly blend into skin, they can easily be camouflaged under make up, discretely worn alone or overnight to heal that zip in no time.

Restoring your once-youthful complexion to plumped perfection, the Vitamin C + Lactic Deep Dewy Cream is a skin-smoothing creamy dream that you never knew you needed. Joining your arsenal of moisturising magic and clearly in a league of its own, this niacinamide-infused cream quenches the thirst of dehydrated skin cells and lubricates each and every layer with a replenishing boost that strengthens your skin’s barrier. There’s nothing better than a cream that doesn’t just sit like a filmy layer on top of your face but travels deep to dew its job. Fused lactic acid and squalane together, retain moisture for even longer to unlock the baby-soft skin you’ve dreamt about.

description: Not a fan of grainy exfoliating lip scrubs? Give Lanolips Lemonaid Lip Treatment a try. Laced with organic lemon oil, this lip treatment gently sloughs away dead skin to reveal fresh, smooth and even skin, which is then richly moisturised. The formula is enriched with pure lanolin, which has a unique molecular structure that closely resembles and mimics your own skin oils to restore moisture anything else, leaving you with the plump, hydrated lips of your dreams. Free from fragrance, parabens, petrolatum, mineral oil, sulphates and PEG’s, this hardworking hero treatment is a guilt-free indulgence.

Ideal for softening the look of fine lines, this lightweight and no-fuss mist restores hydration to both the inside and outer layers of skin – helping your complexion to retain moisture without feeling irritated or stripped. Derived from sugarcane, Biossance’s squalane then mimics skin’s natural oils to give weightless and seamless hydration while delivering active ingredients deep within the skin. Brimming with minerals, this multitasking formula can be used in multiple ways too: use it under or over your moisturiser to tone and boost hydration; to prep and set make up looks to give a dewy finish; anytime to refresh skin and revive make up; and even to cool the complexion after exercise.

Suitable for both face and body, the Pekee Bar rinses away pore-clogging debris, impurities and excess oil while also toning, increasing moisture retention and firming skin. name: Dr Dennis Gross Skincare Vitamin C and Lactic Biocellulose Brightening Treatment Mask 10ml
description: Reveal brighter, stronger and endlessly more hydrated skin in just 15 quick minutes with Dr. Dennis Gross’ Vitamin C Lactic Biocellulose Brightening Treatment Mask. A do-it-all mask that reveals a radiant complexion and biodegrades? Consider us sold! The latest skin-loving creation to arrive from Dr. Dennis Gross, the Vitamin C Lactic Biocellulose Brightening Treatment Mask harnesses antioxidant-rich L-ascorbic acid (vitamin C in its purest form) to firm and repair skin. An infusion of lactic acid gently rids the skin of dulling dead skin cells while delivering a much-needed dose of hydration and even reducing transepidermal water loss… you don’t get glowing skin without a lot of hydration after all! Finally, oil-absorbing niacinamide helps to balance out-of-whack complexions and calm redness, paving the way for a radiant finish when the time comes to remove this potent treatment mask.

name: Biossance Squalane and Vitamin C Dark Spot Serum 30ml
description: Powerful but lightweight, the Squalane + Vitamin C Dark Spot Serum is a 10% vitamin C treatment that works to brighten and fade dark, hyperpigmented areas. With vitamin C to visibly brighten, support collagen synthesis and provide antioxidant protection, the brand’s iconic sugarcane-derived squalane mimics the body’s natural hydrating oils to provide skin with moisture and deliver actives without drying your complexion. A white shiitake mushroom blend also instantly gets to work on degrading dark spots and continues to correct discolouration over time. All precisely calibrated not to irritate or lose potency, this innovative mushroom and vitamin C blend delivers quick, powerful, long lasting results – working to dissolve dark sparts immediately and preventing new ones from forming. In a study of 34 women over a span of 28 days, 100% agreed this formula helped to improve the look of dark spots, 100% agreed it improved the look of sun damage, and 97% said they experienced an improvement in uneven skin tone.
how_to_use: Massage 2-3 pumps of the serum onto a cleansed face and neck, morning and night. Use before other treatment products, and follow with moisturiser.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Squalane, Lentinus Edodes Mycelium Extract, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Citric Acid, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Acacia Senegal Gum, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Citrate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.

name: Glow Recipe Watermelon Glow Hyaluronic Clay Pore-Tight Facial 60ml
description: Glow Recipe's answer to less visible pores, smoother skin and a more even tone in just two weeks, the Watermelon Glow Hyaluronic Clay Pore-Tight Facial is destined to jump right to the top of your skin care wishlist... Clay but not as you know it, this mask is made with hyaluronic acid-infused whipped clay that hydrates as it purifies your pores so that it won't leave your skin feeling tight or dry. Quite the contrary - in a clinical study of 33 participants, subjects were seen to have a 133% improvement in hydration immediately after application. Plus after two weeks, 94% of subjects had a significant reduction in pore size; an infusion of congestion-clearing chemical exfoliants (think: watermelon enzymes, as well as beta and poly hydroxy acids) is to thank for that! Finally, it's also made with blueberry seed powder to gently exfoliate the surface of your skin, shifting dead skin cells and rough patches to reveal a beautifully smooth finish.
how_to_use: Apply a generous amount all over a cleansed, moist face. After 5 minutes, gently rinse with lukewarm water for an easy, no-tug wash-off and follow with the rest of your skincare routine.
